20107595|Morphological features of the minor claw and of the first and second maxillipeds of the fiddler crab, Uca arcuata were studied. Males have a claw with a longer dactylus and propodus than females, but differences are very small. No sexual difference was found in the width of claw. Males have a higher and deeper minor claw than females. There are no clear sexual differences in the numbers of hair-like setae that occur on the outer and inner surface of the minor claws. Sexual difference was observed in the length of basket setae but not in their number. No clear sexual differences were observed in the length and width of the first and second maxillipeds. The total number of setae that occur on the anterior half of the inner surface of the second maxilliped was counted. No sexual difference was found. The total number and density of the setae that occur on the outer surface of the basal endite of the first maxilliped were examined. No clear sexual differences were found. In the width of the third maxillipeds, we found no sexual difference, either. Our results thus suggest that no sexual differences in the mouthparts exist yet, studies of feeding behaviour show, that females scoop 70% more frequently than males with two chelipeds, and that males collect 46% more substratum in one scoop than do females. /// Les caractristiques morphologiques de la petite pince et des premier et second maxillipdes du crabe violoniste Uca arcuata ont t tudies. Les mles ont une pince dont le dactyle et le propode sont plus longs que chez les femelles, bien que la diffrence soit trs faible. Aucune diffrence entre les sexes n'a t trouve sur la largeur de la pince. Les mles ont une petite pince plus haute et plus profonde que celle des femelles. Il n'y a aucune diffrence claire entre les sexes dans le nombre des soies fines prsentes sur les surfaces interne et externe des petites pinces. Des diffrences ont t observes entre les sexes sur la longueur des soies de l'extrmit, mais pas dans leur nombre. Aucune telle diffrence n'a t observe dans la longueur et la largeur des premier et second maxillipdes. Le nombre total de soies situes sur la moiti antrieure de la surface interne du second maxillipde a t compt. Aucune diffrence n'a t trouve entre mle et femelle. Le nombre total et la densit des soies de la surface externe de l'endite basal du premier maxillipde ont t examins. L encore, aucune diffrence n'a t trouve. Dans la largeur du troisime maxillipde, nous n'avons trouv aucune diffrence entre les sexes. Nos rsultats suggrent qu'il n'y a aucune diffrence entre les sexes au niveau des appendices buccaux. Les tudes que nous avons menes sur le comportement nutritionnel de ces animaux montrent que les femelles ratissent avec les deux pinces 70% plus frquemment que les mles, mais que les mles transportent 46% de substrat de plus que les femelles en un seul geste.

27743395|Two new species of Kelleria, i.e., Kelleria indonesiana and Kelleria javaensis, and one previously known species, Kelleria pectinata (A. Scott, 1909) are described and illustrated from specimens collected in four areas of Java coastal waters and Lembeh Strait, North Sulawesi (Celebes), Indonesia. Kelleria indonesiana, collected from Cilacap Bay on the south coast of central Java, can be distinguished from other species of this genus by combination of several characters, i.e., mouthparts, segmentation of antennule and antenna, and shape of the fifth legs. Kelleria javaensis, which was collected off Surabaya, Java Sea, is distinguished from other species of the genus by having two lobes on the inner margin of the fifth leg, length proportion of prosome and urosome, and a combination of several characters of the mouthparts. Kelleria pectinata collected from off Tegal, north coast of central Java, and Lembeh Strait, North Sulawesi, was originally described and named a single female specimen from the Bali Sea as Pseudanthessius pectinatus by A. Scott (1909). Descriptions, measurements, and figures are given for these species, along with taxonomic remarks and ecological notes. /// Deux espces nouvelles de Kelleria, Kelleria indonesiana et Kelleria javaensis, ainsi qu'ne espce dj connue, Kelleria pectinata (A. Scott, 1909) sont dcrites et illustres  partir de spcimens collects dans quatre zones des eaux ctires de Java et du dtroit de Lembeh, au nord de Sulawesi (Cbes), Indonsie. Kelleria indonesiana, collecte dans la baie de Cilacap sur la cte mridionale de la partie centrale de Java, peut tre distingue des autres espces de ce genre par une combinaison de plusieurs caractres, soit, les pices buccales, la segmentation de l'antennule et de l'antenne et la forme des cinquimes pattes. Kelleria javaensis, qui a t rcolte au large de Surabaya, mer de Java, se distingue des autres espces du genre par la prsence de deux lobes au bord interne de la cinquime patte, les longueurs relatives du prosome et de l'urosome, et une combinaison de plusieurs caractres des pices busccales. Kelleria pectinata, collecte au large de Tegal, sur la cte nord de la partie centrale de Java, et dans le dtroit de Lembeh, au nord de Sulawesi, avait t dcrite et nomme  partir d'un unique spcimen femelle, sous le nom de Pseudanthessius pectinatus par A. Scott (1909). Les descriptions, les mesures et les figures sont fournies pour ces espces, ainsi que des remarques taxonomiques et des notes cologiques.

(family Peltidiidae), and Amphiascus sp. /// Neuf espces de coppodes harpacticodes on t trouves dans les plages sableuses, en gypte, durant la priode de novembre 1994  dcembre 1996. 41038653|The assemblages of peracarid crustaceans associated with the red alga Corallina elongata were studied from November 2006 to November 2007 in Rafraf, Tunisia (Mediterranean Sea). Monthly sampling yielded a total of 3593 individuals comprising 22 different species. The peracarids showed significant differences in mean density. Amphipoda were dominant in both numbers of individuals and species diversity. The amphipods Elasmopus pocillimanus, Caprella grandimana, and Stenothoe monoculoides were the dominant species and exhibited seasonal differences in density. The complex structure of C. elongata can provide a permanent refuge for peracarid Crustacea, and species such as the caprellid Caprella grandimana, in particular, seem to be are well adapted to this habitat. Les assemblages de Crustacs pracarides associs  l'algue rouge Corallina elongata ont t tudis de Novembre 2006  Novembre 2007  Rafraf, Tunisie (Mer Mditerrane). Les chantillons mensuels contenaient un total de 3593 individus comprenant 22 diffrentes espces. Les pracarides montrent des diffrences significatives dans leur densit moyenne. Les Amphipodes sont dominants  la fois en nombre et en diversit d'espces. Les amphipodes Elasmopus pocillimanus, Caprella grandimana et Stenothoe monoculoides ont t les espces dominantes et ont montr des diffrences saisonnires en densit. La structure complexe de C. elongata peut fournir un refuge permanent pour les Crustacs pracarides, et en particulier, les espces telles que le caprellid Caprella grandimana semblent bien adaptes  cet habitat.

La variation a t tudie  travers l'aire de distribution brsilienne. Les dimorphismes entre mles adultes et juvniles ont t analyss et la corrlation des types de disposition des taches avec les habitats observe. L'espce comprend deux formes de base en ce qui concerne cette disposition, laquelle n'est pas une rponse phnotypique aux conditions de l'environnement, mais ne prsente pas des diffrences caractristiques suffisantes pour justifier une sparation subspcifique. Ces diffrences s'observent dans les mmes aires gographiques, mais habituellement dans des habitats distincts.
27743273|This study investigates the differences in selectivity of commercially used 44 mm mesh size single and double codends for the deep-water rose shrimp, Parapenaeus longirostris by using the covered codend method. Experiments were conducted on the commercial fishing grounds of Kuadasi Bay and Siacik Bay of the eastern Aegean Sea, between 3 and 27 October 2007. Twenty-four hauls were carried out, eleven with single and thirteen with double codends. The mean fifty-percent retention length (L50) values of double and single codends were found to be 12.0  0.09 and 16.9  0.08 mm, respectively. Selection range (SR) values for double and single codends were 4.0  0.05 and 5.9  0.09 mm, respectively. Significant differences were found between L50 and selection factor (SF) values of double and single codends (p < 0.05) for the deep-water rose shrimp. However, towing duration and catch size did not have any significant effect on these parameters (p > 0.05). This work shows that the use of 44 mm mesh size knotless polyethylene (PE) diamond mesh codends is by itself destructive for immature shrimp. The use of narrower netting around it to establish a double codend further decreases the already insufficient selectivity for this species. /// Cette tude examine les diffrences de slectivit des culs de chalut commerciaux de 44 mm de vide de maille et  double cul pour la pche commerciale de la crevette rose d'eaux profondes Parapenaeus longirostris, teste par la mthode du cul de chalut couvert. Les exprimentations ont t ralises sur les zones de pche commerciale de la baie de Kuadasi et de la baie de Siacik dans l'est de la mer ge, entre le 3 et le 27 octobre 2007. Vingt-quatre chalutages ont t effectus, onze en simple et treize en double culs de chalut. Les valeurs moyennes de 50% de rtention (L50) pour le double et le simple cul de chalut sont de 12,0  0,09 et 16,9  0,08 mm de long, respectivement. Les valeurs du facteur de slection (SR) taient de 4,0  0,05 et 5,9  0,09 mm, respectivement. Des diffrences significatives ont t trouves entre les valeurs de L50 et du facteur de slection (SF) des simples et doubles culs de chalut pour la crevette rose profonde. Cependant, la dure du chalutage et la taille de la prise n'affectent pas significativement ces paramtres (p > 0,05). Ce travail montre que l'utilisation des culs de chalut  maille diamant en polythylne de 44 mm (PE) sans nud est en lui-mme destructeur pour les crevettes immatures. L'utilisation de maillage plus fin pour un double cul de chalut diminue de plus la slectivit dj insuffisante pour cette espce.
20105752|The sexuality of four species of deep-water pandalid shrimps, collected in the southern Tyrrhenian Sea during an experimental trawl survey, was studied. Sex was determined by the presence or absence of an appendix masculina on the second pair of pleopods. The relationship between shrimp size (carapace length) and the relative length of the appendix masculina was used to establish that the four species are dioecious. Moreover, descriptive statistics of the size (CL) in each species studied were calculated separately for males and females. /// Les caractres lis  la reproduction de quatre espces de crevettes Pandalidae profondes, rcoltes dans le sud de la mer Tyrrhnienne pendant une campagne exprimentale de chalutage, ont t tudis. Le sexe a t dtermin par rapport  la prsence ou l'absence d'un appendix masculina sur la seconde paire de plopodes. La relation entre la taille du crustac (longueur de la carapace) et la longueur relative de l'appendix masculina a t utilise pour dmontrer que les quatre espces taient gonochoriques. Par ailleurs, l'analyse statistique de la taille (CL), pour chaque espce tudie, a t effectue sparment pour les mles et les femelles.
20696226|Shrimp is the most important marine resource for the three communities of the Upper Gulf of California (UGC): San Felipe in the state of Baja California, and Golfo de Santa Clara and Puerto Peasco in the state of Sonora. This fishery generates 80% of the profits in the region. A fishery tendency analysis was made from 1996 to 2007 in the UGC. For the first time, this fishery analysis showed that the Biosphere Reserve and the recently declared Vaquita Refuge Area are important grounds for artisanal fishing. The CPUE and total catches used to describe the fishing effort in the area, could be used to establish any further relationship between shrimp population and environmental variables, because of their high correlation coefficient (0.85). Shrimp capture in the marine protected areas has maintained a continuous level of production with economic incentives, making it attractive to fishermen despite recent restriction on their activities. As shrimp vessels reduce in number, small boats gradually increase in number and productivity, maintaining high incomes from the fishery. A detailed interdisciplinary study of the fishing effort in the UGC must be conducted, because of the endangered species found in this area, which require adequate management for their conservation without compromising the welfare of the fishermen. El camarn es el recurso pesquero ms importante en el Alto Golfo de California (AGC) para las tres comunidades pesqueras que en ella se encuentran: San Felipe, Baja California, Golfo de Santa Clara y Puerto Peasco, Sonora. Esta pesquera por si sola genera el 80% de los ingresos pesqueros totales en la regin. Se hizo un anlisis de la tendencia de la pesca de camarn del periodo 1996 al 2007. Por primera vez se describe la importancia de la pesca dentro de la Reserva de la biosfera del Alto Golfo de California y del Refugio de la Vaquita Marina. Debido al alto coeficiente de correlacin (0,85), la captura total y el CPUE analizados para el esfuerzo pesquero pueden ser utilizados para establecer futuras relaciones entre las variables ambientales y la poblacin de camarn en la regin. La captura del camarn mantiene un continuo crecimiento en las reas naturales protegidas (ANP) siendo atractivo para los pescadores a pesar de las recientes restricciones a la pesca. Al disminuir el esfuerzo de las embarcaciones mayores dentro las ANP, se ha incrementado gradualmente la productividad de las embarcaciones artesanales, lo que ha propiciado un aumentando en el numero de embarcaciones y de los ingresos econmicos en la regin, mantenindose una alta rentabilidad de la pesquera. El esfuerzo pesquero realizado por pescadores de las comunidades en el AGC dentro de las ANP requiere de un estudio ms complejo e interdisciplinario, ya que en esta ANP se encuentran especies en peligro de extincin, el cual requieren de un manejo adecuado para su conservacin sin que afecte los intereses individuales de los pescadores.
20103008|Deux balanes  quatre plaques, avec une seule range de tubes dans la muraille et une base calcaire poreuse, provenant de roches du Pliocene moyen ou suprieur sur l'le Angel de la Guarda (Golfe de Californie) sont dcrites comme nouvelle espce, Tetraclita unisemita, et provisoirement rapportes au sous-genre Tesseropora Pilsbry. Ce sous-genre est par ailleurs connu de l'Oligocene d'Italie et compte des formes actuelles du Pacifique occidental et des ctes mridionales et occidentales d'Afrique.

20105750|Longnose lancetfish (Alepisaurus ferox) were caught in a longline survey and from their stomach contents Phronima sedentaria were observed to be associated with a gelatinous organism that occurred at a high frequency. A simple regression analysis was performed between the number of barrels and the number of P. sedentaria, and a highly positive correlation resulted (r = 0.978, p &lt 0.001, n = 118). Although the quantitative prevalence of the association of Phronima sedentaria and barrels in the zooplankton community of the study area can not be discussed from these limited seasonal data, it is clear that the association was an important food item for the dominating mesopelagic species, Alepisaurus ferox during the survey period in the North and tropical Atlantic Ocean. The distribution of the association is here reported because of the scarcity of the knowledge on this issue. /// Des lanciers long-nez (Alepisaurus ferox) ont t capturs au cours d'une campagne au long cours, et dans leurs contenus stomacaux, ont t observs des Phronima sedentaria associs  un organisme glatineux qui tait prsent en grand nombre. Une simple analyse de rgression a t calcul entre le nombre de "tonnelets" et le nombre de P. sedentaria, et une corrlation hautement positive en est rsulte (r = 0,978, p &lt 0,001, n = 118). Bien que la frquence de l'association de Phronima sedentaria et des tonnelets dans la communaut zooplanctonique de la rgion tudie ne puisse tre discute  partir de ces donnes saisonnires limites, il est clair que l'association tait une composante alimentaire importante pour l'espce msoplagique dominante, Alepisaurus ferox, au cours de cette priode d'investigations dans l'Atlantique nord et tropical. La rpartition de cette association est ici rapporte, en raison du manque de connaissance sur ce sujet.

23034313|The egg case is an extracellular structure that surrounds an egg cell and the embryo after fertilization. Its basic function is to protect the embryo from potentially harmful aspects of the external environment. Changes in the structure of the egg case at different stages of embryogenesis in the crayfish Astacus leptodactylus were studied, with observations made at the beginning of egg incubation, during incubation, and at the time of hatching. We studied the changes using images taken with transmission electron microscopy (TEM) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM). The egg case is made of three layers that are all close together. The outer layer was 4.590.23 m thick and composed of an electron-dense material; its external structure was rough. The middle layer was the thickest at 8.940.29 m and was slightly folded. It was made of polyhedral grains, interspersed with multiple aeropylar areas and channels. This second (middle) layer consisted of two sublayers of equal thickness but with variable grain size and aeropyle structure. The third and innermost layer was 3.140.33 m thick and made of tightly packed grains, smaller than those in the middle layer. It included a few, small aeropylar channels. La membrane de l'uf est une structure extra embryonnaire qui entoure l'uf ou l'embryon aprs la fcondation. Sa fonction de base est de protger l'embryon des aspects potentiellement nuisibles de l'environnement externe. Les changements de la structure de la membrane de l'uf chez l'crevisse Astacus leptodactylus ont t tudis, avec des observations faites au dbut de l'incubation de l'uf, durant l'incubation et au moment de l'closion. Nous avons tudi les changements  partir d'images prises en microscopie lectronique  transmission (TEM) et  balayage (SEM). La membrane de l'uf est faite de trois couches serres. La couche externe 4,590,23 m d'paisseur) est compose de matriel dense aux lectrons ; sa surface externe est ruguenx. La couche mdiane est la plus paisse (8,940,29 m) et est lgrement plie. Elle est constitue de grains polydriques entrecoups par de multiples zones aropyles et des canaux. Cette couche mdiane consiste en deux sous-couches de mme paisseur mais avec des tailles de grains et des structures aropyles variables. La troisime couche interne (3.140.33 m d'paisseur) est faite de grains troitement serrs, plus petits que ceux de la couche moyenne. Elle comporte quelques petits canaux aropyles.

20101807|L'ultrastructure du protocrbron de Chirocephalus diaphanus Prvost (Branchiopode, Anostrac), surtout par rapport au processus de neuroscrtion, a t tudi. Le prineurium du protocrbron n'est pas bien dvelopp. Le tissue glial entoure les neurones du protocrbron et il y a deux catgories de noyaux de cellules gliales. Les axones du neuropile contiennent des vsicules synaptiques, des granules lmentaires, des neurofilaments et des mitochondries allonges. Des synapses ont t observs dans le neuropile. Dans les pricaryons des neurones, trois catgories de granules lmentaires ont t observes. Les granules de la premire catgorie sont denses aux lectrons (800-1.000  de diamtre); les granules de la deuxime catgorie sont moyennement denses aux lectrons (550-700  de diamtre) et les granules de la troisime catgorie sont moyennement denses aux lectrons (1.100-2.000  de diamtre). Il semble que les granules lmentaires sont drivs des appareils de Golgi. Des rgions nettement dlimites du glycogne se trouvent dans un grand nombre des neurones. Des corps designs comme "les corps multilamellaires" sont frquemment prsents dans les neurones du protocrbron. 27743348|A new genus and new species of ethusid crab is described from Vanuatu. The new genus is superficially similar to Parethusa in its smooth carapace and long second and third perepods, but is unique in its bifurcated G2 and the absence of an interantennular septum. /// Eine neue Gattung und eine neue Art ethusider Krabben wird von Vanuatu hier beschrieben. Die neue Gattung hnelt Parethusa auf den ersten Blick wegen ihres glatten Carapaxes und der langen zweiten und dritten Pereiopoden, unterscheidet sich aber durch einen gegabelten zweiten Gnathopoden und das Fehlen eines interantennulren Septums.
20102360|The third note in the series on the Lamippidae has a detailed description of the type species of the genus Lamippella, L. faurei Bouligand & Delamare. This parasite occurs in Alcyonium, Parerythropodium, and in Eunicella, Octocorals which are phyletically very distant from one another, yet the specimens do not show any morphological differences. It is not known whether the specimens exhibit, according to the host, specific differences of a biological, physiological or chemical nature, or whether they form an exception to the host specificity, which is rule in the Lamippidae. In the fourth note, the species Lamippe aciculifera, L. brementi and L. papillifera are shown to belong to one and the same species Lamippina aciculifera, type of a genus established in a previous note, in which there is marked sexual dimorphism. Finally, it is shown that, although the rule of host specificity has few exceptions in the Lamippidae, no parallel evolution of the host species and the parasite could be demonstrated (note 5).
20103984|Dotilla bewohnt tropische und subtropische Strnde und Mangroven. Hauptnahrung dieser semiterrestrischen Krabben sind die organischen Bestandteile des Schlicks. Durch schrfende Bewegungen der Scheren wird das Epistrat einer Sortier- und Filtrierkammer zugefhrt, die durch die dritten Maxillipeden nach auen abgeschlossen wird. Die Hauptsortierarbeit leisten die lffelfrmigen Haare der zweiten Maxillipeden, die die kleineren organischen und anorganischen Partikeln des Schlicks zurckhalten und -- durch koordinierte Bewegungen der Mundwerkzeuge untereinander -- der Mundffnung zufhren, whrend die groben Bestandteile in Form von Frapillen nach oben abgegeben werden. Die morphologische Ausbildung der Setae erwies sich als arttypisch und korreliert mit den Biotopgegebenheiten. Der Sortiervorgang ist an den Atemwasserkreislauf gekoppelt; das Atemwasser dient dabei als Transport- und Flotations-mittel.

20103364|Eine neue Art der Gattung Antarcturus wurde in Proben von Macro-Algen epibenthischen Lebensgemeinschaften der Signy-Insel (eine der Sd-Orkney-Inselgruppe) gefunden. Die neue Art wird beschrieben. Die morphologischen Charaktere dieser neuen Art, Antarcturus signiensis nov. spec., stellen mehrere diagnostische Merkmale da. Diese zeigen, da eine deutliche Verbindung mit der Gattung Microarcturus vorhanden ist. Die Gattung Microarcturus sollte als ein jngeres Synonym der Gattung Antarcturus betrachtet werden.
20103563|Les larves de l'une des six pontes de Cancer pagurus tudies prsentaient une sgrgation d'isozymes dans le cas de l'enzyme Glucose Phosphate Isomerase, qui ne correspondrait pas aux simples esprances mendliennes. 20103403|Cymothoa pulchrum Lanchester, 1902, is an apparently uncommon and relatively little known Indo-West Pacific species. Some characteristic specimens (both males and females) have been collected in Takapoto (Tuamotu Islands; in 1975), in Moorea (Society Islands; in 1976) and in Fiji (in 1976). The known range of the species thus is now extended to include French Polynesia. In this region, Cymothoa pulchrum seems to be specifically parasitizing fishes of the genera Arothron (A. alboreticulatus and A. meleagris) and Diodon (D. hystrix). The present specimens are described and the main features of the species emphasized.
20106226|During contests between evenly size-matched Cambarus bartonii bartonii crayfish males of reproductive form (Form I), the eventual winners performed significantly more total initiation acts, Lunge and Claws Raised initiation behaviours than the eventual losers. There were no significant differences between the numbers of Ambivalent Contact initiation acts and tail flip escape behaviours, respectively, performed by the winners and the losers. During intraspecific, intra-form contests, C. b. bartonii Form I males used the same three main types of initiation acts as Form I males of the closely related species Cambarus robustus. The highly aggressive Lunge initiation act plays a much more important role in the establishment of the dominant-subordinate relationship in the C. robustus intraspecific, intra-form Form I contests than in the C. b. bartonii contests of the same type. The eventual C. b. bartonii losers were considerably less submissive in the intraspecific contests in comparison to the interspecific contests against C. robustus. The decline in both the number of fights and the time spent fighting, which accompanied the establishment of the dominant-subordinate relationship in the C. robustus intraspecific contests, did not take place during the C. b. bartonii intraspecific contests. /// Pendant les confrontations entre crevisses mles de taille assortie de l'espce Cambarus bartonii bartonii, appartenant  la forme reproductive (Forme I), les gagnants ventuels accomplissent de faon significative un plus grand nombre total d'actes d'engagement ("Lunge" et "Claws Raised") que les perdants ventuels. Il n'y avait pas de diffrences significatives entre les nombres des actes d'engagement "Ambivalent Contact" et de dgagement "en coup de queue", respectivement, accomplis par les gagnants et les perdants. Pendant les confrontations intraspcifiques, intraformes, les mles de C. b. bartonii utilisaient les trois mmes types principaux d'actes d'engagement que les mles Forme I de l'espce trs proche Cambarus robustus. L'acte d'engagement hautement agressif "Lunge" joue un rle beaucoup plus important dans l'tablissement de la relation dominant-domin dans les confrontations intraspcifiques, intraformes Forme I, chez C. robustus, que dans les confrontations de mme type chez C. b. bartonii. Les ventuels perdants de C. b. bartonii taient considrablement moins soumis dans les combats intraspcifiques que dans les combats interspcifiques contre C. robustus. Le dclin,  la fois dans le nombre des combats et dans le temps pass  combattre, qui accompagnait l'tablissement de la relation dominant-domin dans les rencontres intraspcifiques chez C. robustus, n'intervenait pas pendant les rencontres intraspcifiques chez C. b. bartonii.
20104336|A new genus of Conchostraca belonging to the Leptestheriidae is described from Morocco. The diagnosis is followed by some ecological and biological remarks and a key to distinguish the genus Maghrebestheria from four other genera of the family.
23034249|Field sampling and laboratory experiments were used to examine the mating system of an anomuran crab, Pachycheles rudis, which typically occurs in heterosexual pairs. Paired crabs occurred over a large size range and were strongly size correlated, suggesting the possibility of long-term pairings. Moreover, both sexes exhibited aggression towards conspecific strangers of the opposite sex. Crabs were separated from their mates for periods of 24, 48, 72, 96, or 120 hours, and their behavior monitored following reintroduction. Resident males showed an elevated level of aggression towards their returning mates following periods of separation greater than 48 hours, and the number of pushes and other acts of aggression were comparable to that shown against strange females. The formation of new pairings involves agonistic interactions between sexes, and females appear to be dominant in stable pairs. Pachycheles rudis appears to fit models that were previously constructed for monogamous Crustacea remarkably well. Des prlvements de terrain et des expriences de laboratoire ont t utiliss pour examiner le type d'accouplement du crabe anomoure, Pachycheles rudis, qui se trouve typiquement par paires htrosexuelles. Les paires de crabes existent sur une large gamme de taille et sont fortement corrles  la taille, suggrant la possibilit de couple  long terme. De plus les deux sexes montrent de l'agression  l'gard des trangers intra spcifiques de sexe oppos. Les crabes ont t spars de leur partenaire pour des priodes de 24, 48, 72, 96, ou 120 heures, et leur comportement enregistr  la suite de leur rintroduction. Les mles rsidants montrent un degr d'agression plus lev contre leur partenaire initial  la suite d'une priode de sparation plus longue que 48 heures, et le nombre de coups et d'autres actes d'agression a t comparable  celui montr  l'gard des femelles trangres. La formation de nouveaux couples implique des interactions agonistes entre les sexes, et les femelles apparaissent tre dominantes dans les couples stables. Pachycheles rudis semble s'ajuster remarquablement bien au modle qui a t prcdemment construit pour les Crustacs monogames.
20103357|The European edible crab, Cancer pagurus, was investigated to determine whether there is a malestimulating pheromone produced in the urine of pre-moult females. Bioassays were conducted by monitoring the gross behavioural response and the rate of heart beat of male subjects in the presence of samples of pre-moult female urine. In each case the results were negative, and offered no evidence for the production of a pheromone.
20107651|The mud-shrimp, Austinogebia edulis (Ngoc-Ho & Chan, 1992) is mainly found on the western Taiwan coast and in northern Vietnam. Since this species is a locally traditional sea food in central western Taiwan, trace metals in muscle, hepatopancreas, and the exoskeleton of A. edulis as well as in its habitat sediment were analysed, in order to study whether there would be any relationship between the metal content in A. edulis and that of its habitat sediment. Tissue samples were completely digested in aqua regia on a hot plate prior to measurement. Sediment samples were measured by sequentially leaching into five fractions (Tessier et al., 1979). The total concentrations of trace metals in A. edulis followed the sequence: Fe &gt Mn &gt Cu &gt Zn &gt Ni &gt Pb &gt Cr &gt Co &gt Cd. Concentrations of Fe, Mn, and Pb were primarily found in the exoskeleton; Cu and Cd were mainly present in the hepatopancreas; the concentrations of Ni and Zn were nearly equal in all three tissues studied. The contents of Cu, Fe, Mn, and Ni in the tissues of A. edulis are generally higher than in other species of shrimps reported in the literature. With the exception of Cu and Mn, more than 60% of the metals studied were present in the residual fraction. In contrast, Cu and Mn were dominant in the nonresidual fraction, which indicates that the Cu and Mn concentrations in hepatopancreas and muscle of A. edulis were relatively higher than those of the other metals. /// Le crustac thalassinide Austinogebia edulis (Ngoc-Ho & Chan, 1992) se rencontre principalement sur la cte occidentale de Taiwan et dans le nord du Vietnam. Ce crustac tant consomm comme fruit de mer local traditionnel dans la rgion occidentale centrale de Taiwan, les mtaux traces du muscle, de l'hpatopancras et de l'exosquelette de A. edulis, ainsi que du sdiment-habitat ont t analyss, afin d'tudier s'il existe une quelconque relation entre la concentration en mtaux de A. edulis et celle du sdiment. Les chantillons de tissus ont t compltement digrs dans l'eau rgale sur une plaque chaude avant d'tre mesurs. Des chantillons de sdiment ont t analyss par extraction squentielle en cinq fractions (Tessier et al., 1979). Chez A. edulis, les concentrations totales en mtaux traces suivaient la squence: Fe &gt Mn &gt Cu &gt Zn &gt Ni &gt Pb &gt Cr &gt Co &gt Cd. Les concentrations de Fe, Mn et Pb ont t tout d'abord trouves dans l'exosquelette; Cu et Cd taient principalement prsents dans l'hpatopancras; les concentrations de Ni et Zn taient presque gales dans les trois tissus tudis. Les quantits de Cu, Fe, Mn et Ni dans les tissus de A. edulis taient gnralement plus leves que chez les autres espces de crevettes mentionnes dans la littrature. A l'exception de Cu et de Mn, plus de 60% des mtaux tudis taient prsents dans la fraction rsiduelle. Au contraire, Cu et Mn taient dominants dans la fraction non-rsiduelle, ce qui indique que les concentrations en Cu et en Mn dans l'hpatopancras et le muscle de A. edulis taient relativement plus leves que celles des autres mtaux.
20107580|Orchid Island (Lan-Yu) (22 1N 1215E), Taitung county, a remote island off Taiwan, harbours well developed hard coral communities. These may provide various favourable habitats for their obligate symbionts, gall crabs. Until now, not even a single species of these crabs had been recorded from Orchid Island. For this study, we collected hard corals by SCUBA diving at the coral reefs surrounding Orchid Island. We identified nine species of gall crabs belonging to nine genera. They include Cryptochirus coralliodytes inhabiting Goniastrea australensis; Lithoscaptus paradoxus on G. australensis; Hiroia krempfi on Hydnophora exesa; Neotroglocarcinus hongkongensis on Turbinaria mesenterina and T. peltata; Pseudocryptochirus viridis on T. mesenterina; Dacryomaia edmonsoni on Psammocora contigua; Opecarcinus crescentus on Coscinaraea columna and Pavona venosa; Utinomiella dimorpha on Pocillopora verrucosa; and Hapalocarcinus marsupialis on P. verrucosa. Including the new records from Orchid Island in this study, the established brachyuran crab fauna of Taiwan now stands at 611 species. /// Orchid Island (Lan-Yu) (221N 1215E), Taitung county, une le loigne au large de Taiwan, abrite des communauts de coraux bien dveloppes. 20104504|Le statut taxonomique de la crevette Paraenaeopsis stylifera coromandelica Alcock est discut. D'aprs l'examen d'un matriel provenant de diverses ctes du sous-continent Indien, la reconnaissance de deux sous-espces,  savoir P. stylifera stylifera (Milne Edwards) et P. stylifera coromandelica Alcock, semble justifie et correcte. Cependant, les deux populations tant largement allopatriques, avec une certaine integradation/hybridation le long des ctes sud-ouest de l'Inde, leur reconnaissance comme espces distinctes ne parat pas taxonomiquement approprie. D'autre part, "Parapenaeopsis stylifera var. cochinensis George", n'est pas acceptable du point de vue taxonomique.

20104262|The mouth-parths and the thoracic appendages of the cavernicolous Mysidacea Antromysis juberthiei were studied by means of scanning electron microscopy to reveal the distribution and the fine morphology of their setae; twelve types of setae are reported; they are compared to antennary setae of the same animal previously studied and to setae of other Crustacea.
20105527|Weight gain, moulting frequency, survival response, and analyses of fatty acid composition of tissues were used to investigate the nutritional value of polyunsaturated fatty acids (PUFA) to juvenile mud crab, Scylla serrata in a purified diet. Five isonitrogenous and isoenergetic diets contained pure triglycerides of 18:3n-3 (trilinolenin), 18:2n-6 (trilinolein), 20:4n-6 (triarachidonin), and 22:6n-3 (tridocosahexaenoin), either alone or in combination. All diets were formulated to contain a total of 2% lipid. A diet containing only saturated (14:0, 16:0, 18:0) and monounsaturated (16:1n-7, 18:1n-9) fatty acids as lipid sources, in proportions similar to that found in a 2: 1 cod liver oil/corn oil mixture, served as a control diet. The survival of crabs ranged from 87 to 100% for all dietary treatments. Levels of n-3 and n-6 PUFAs decreased in the neutral lipid of the whole body tissue, when not provided in the diet. Levels of 20:4n-6, 20:5n-3, and 22:6n-3 were conserved in the polar lipid of the whole body tissue of mud crabs when these were not provided in the diets. After feeding trials of 70 days, weight gain of crabs fed diets containing 18:2n-6 or a control diet were not significantly different. A dietary source of 22:6n-3, 20:4n-6, and 18:3n-3 is required by juvenile crabs, as indicated by a significant increase in weight gain of these crabs. /// Le gain de poids, la frquence des mues, la survie et les analyses d'acides gras des tissus ont t utiliss pour tudier la valeur nutritionnelle des acides gras polyinsaturs (PUFA) pour les juvniles de Scylla serrata. Cinq rgimes isonergtiques et isoazots contenaient des triglycrides purs de 18:3n-3 (trilinolenin), 18:2n-6 (trilinolein), 20:4n-6 (triarachidonin), et 22:6n-3 (tridocosahexaenoin), soit seuls, soit en mlange. Tous les rgimes ont t formuls pour contenir un total de 2% de lipides. Un rgime contenant seulement des acides gras saturs (14:0, 16:0, 18:0) et monoinsaturs (16:1n-7, 18:1n-9) comme sources de lipides, dans des proportions analogues  celles trouves dans un mlange huile de foie de morue/huile de mas 2: 1, a servi de rgime tmoin. La survie des animaux a t observe entre 87 et 100% pour tous les essais de rgime. Les niveaux de PUFAs n-3 et n-6 ont diminu dans les lipides neutres des tissus du corps, quand ils n'taient pas prsents dans la nourriture. Les niveaux de 20:4n-6, 20:5n-3, et 22:6n-3 ont t conservs dans les lipides polaires des tissus du corps quand ils n'taient pas fournis dans la nourriture. Aprs des expriences de nutrition de 70 jours, le gain de poids des Scylla nourris avec des rgimes contenant des 18:2n-6 ou un rgime tmoin n'tait pas significativement diffrent. Une source alimentaire de 22:6n-3, 20:4n-6, 18:3n-3 est ncessaire pour les juvniles, comme l'indique l'augmentation significative du poids de ces spcimens.

20105928|Fine structural observations of the hepatopancreas of Saduria entomon (Linnaeus, 1758) infected with Cryptococcus laurentii (Kufferath) Skinner revealed distinct pathological changes in epithelial cells A and B. The lesions were characterized by a distortion of microvilli, disorganization of the basal labyrinthial system, and abnormal arrangement of nuclear chromatin in A and B cells. In A cells mitochondria are damaged. In B cells there appear numerous secondary lysosomes, and the endoplasmic reticulum is reduced and turns vesicular. In all A cells pathological changes were similar, while in B cells the level of their destruction varied. /// Des observations fines de la structure de l'hpatopancras de Saduria entomon infect par Cryptococcus laurentii a rvl des changements pathologiques distincts dans les cellules pithliales A et B. Les lsions taient caractrises par une distorsion des microvilli, une dsorganisation du systme labyrinthique basal, et un arrangement anormal de la chromatine nuclaire dans les cellules A et B. Dans les cellules A, les mitochondries sont endommages. Dans les cellules B apparaisent de nombreux lysosomes secondaires et le rticulum endoplasmique est rduit et devient vsiculaire. Dans toutes les cellules A, les changements pathologiques taient similaires, alors que dans les cellules B le niveau de leur destruction variait.
20101638|The mandible and the first and second maxilla of Hippolyte inermis are described for the first three zoeal stages. Evolution of these appendages during the larval development has been observed. Structural changes occurring at each moult are gradual without abrupt changes; they lead to: (1) the best adaptation to a rough and hard food by the improvement of cutting and crushing parts; and (2) the formation of a pre-oral chamber serving for a longer trituration of the food before its ingestion.
20103813|In-field sex distribution of three copepod populations off the west coast of Barbados, West Indies, was determined at two-weekly intervals over a period of two years. For the small cyclopoid Oncaea mediterranea there was a roughly even distribution between the sexes, but for the two calanoids Temora stylifera and Undinula vulgaris, though the ratios varied considerably, the imbalance was nearly always in favour of the females. It is suggested that sex ratio is a behavioural response induced by a net environmental effect during the early developmental stages, that species of organism living in the complex tropical marine communities retain sex ratio flexibility as a reproductive strategy and hence as an attribute of fitness for survival, and that this flexibility may be of higher adaptive value than a fixed or 1:1 sex ratio.
23034322|The morphology of the burrows of the ghost crab Ocypode ceratophthalmus (Pallas, 1772) was studied at Ao Yon and Cape Panwa on the west coast of Thailand and, previously, at Sai Kaew on Thailand's east coast. Granulometric analysis showed that the sediment grain size and composition differed between sites. Thirty-three of 54 burrows (61%) from the west coast and 50 of 104 (48%) on the east coast were Y-shaped, the most common shape at all sites. Y-shaped burrows had one arm that opened on the surface and one which terminated just below the surface. The angles of descent of the two arms of the Y and the angle of the single descending shaft relative to the vertical, did not differ between: (1) juvenile and young adult crabs at Ao Yon, (2) juvenile crabs from Ao Yon and Cape Panwa, (3) juvenile crabs from both coasts. The precision with which this crab constructs Y-shaped burrows across sites and sediment types, indicates that burrow morphology is functionally important, perhaps for defence against predators. La morphologie des terriers du crabe-fantme Ocypode ceratophthalmus (Pallas, 1772) a t tudie  Ao Yon et  Cape Panwa sur la cte occidentale de la Thalande et auparavant,  Sai Kaew sur la cte orientale. L'analyse granulomtrique montre que la taille des grains du sdiment et leur composition diffrent entre les sites. Trente-trois des 54 terriers (61%) de la cte Ouest et 50 sur les 104 (48%) de la cte Est taient en forme de Y, la forme la plus commune dans tous les sites. Les terriers en Y avaient un bras ouvrant  la surface et l'autre se terminant juste sous la surface. Les angles de pente des deux bras du Y, et l'angle de l'axe unique descendant par rapport  la verticale, ne diffraient pas entre (1) les juvniles et les jeunes crabes adultes de Ao Yon, (2) les crabes juvniles de Ao Yon et de Cape Panwa, (3) les crabes juvniles des deux ctes. La prcision avec laquelle ce crabe construit les terriers en Y sur les diffrents sites et avec des types diffrents de sdiments indique que la morphologie du terrier est fonctionnellement importante, peut-tre pour la dfense contre les prdateurs.

20106367|Sampling in the northern Aegean Sea, in depths of 250-1000 m revealed the presence of eight species of pelagic shrimps and gave information on the vertical distribution patterns for some of them. Two species of Pasiphaeoidea (Pasiphaea multidentata, P. sivado), 1 species of Oplophoroidea (Acanthephyra pelagica), 1 Penaeoidea (Gennadas elegans), and 4 Sergestoidea (Sergestes arcticus, S. atlanticus, S. sargassi, and Sergia robusta) were found. The most abundant of these were S. arcticus and G. elegans, with similar abundances, followed by S. robusta and A. pelagica. The other four species had a very low abundance. During daytime, S. arcticus had the widest range of vertical distribution and the bulk of its population occurred at 500 m, while A. pelagica, G. elegans, and S. robusta had less extensive ranges of vertical distribution and the bulk of their populations lay in the zone of 750 m. The vertical distribution of the species found in the Aegean Sea is compared with those of other areas. /// Des chantillonnages au nord de la mer Ege,  des profondeurs de 250-1000 m, ont rvl la prsence de huit espces de crevettes plagiques et ont apport des informations sur des modles de rpartition verticale pour certains d'entre eux. Les plus abondants taient S. arcticus et G. elegans, avec des abondances analogues, suivies par S. robusta et A. pelagica. Les quatre autres espces avaient une abondance trs faible. Durant la journe, S. arcticus avait la plus large rpartition verticale et le maximum de sa population  500 m tandis que A. pelagica, G. elegans et S. robusta avaient une rpartition verticale moins tendue et le maximum de leurs populations dans la zone de 750 m. La rpartition verticale des espces trouves dans la mer Ege est compare  celle des autres zones.

This paper describes the growth of male and female crabs in each moulting stage, with details of their carapace width and length, chelar length and height, abdominal width and length, and total weight. 23034288|The blue and red shrimp Aristeus antennatus (Risso, 1816) is one of the most important fishery resources in the Mediterranean Sea. Monthly samplings of blue and red shrimp from June 2006 to May 2007 were landed by the trawl fleet in two northwest Sicilian fishing harbours (San Vito Lo Capo and Terrasini). The carapace length (CL) frequency distribution of females ranged between 15.00 and 59.00 mm, whereas male CLs ranged between 17.00 and 34.00 mm. The estimated parameters of the Von Bertalanffy growth function (VBGF) for San Vito lo Capo females and males were: CL = 65 mm, K = 0.58 y -1 and CL = 41 mm, K = 0.71 y -1 , respectively; while for Terrasini females and males these were: CL = 69 mm, K = 0.65 y -1 and CL = 37 mm, K = 0.8 y -1 , respectively. In this study, we update the information on stock structure and growth parameters of the blue and red shrimp in two northwest Sicilian fishing grounds and compare these results with other data recorded in the Mediterranean Basin. Il gambero viola Aristeus antennatus (Risso, 1816)  una delle risorse da pesca pi importanti nel Mar Mediterraneo. L'indagine  stata effettuata in due marinerie della sicilia nord-occidentale (San Vito Lo Capo e Terrasini) dove mensilmente e in un periodo compreso tra giugno 2006 e maggio 2007, venivano acquistati allo sbarco campioni di gambero viola. La distribuzione di frequenza di lunghezza carapace (LC) delle femmine era compresa tra 15,00 e 59,00 mm, mentre nei maschi tra 17,00 e 34,00 mm. I parametri di crescita stimati con la funzione di Von Bertalanffy (VBGF) per le femmine e i maschi di San Vito Lo Capo sono risultati rispettivamente di: CL = 65 mm, K = 0,58 y -1 e CL = 41 mm, K = 0,71 y -1 , mentre per le femmine ed i maschi di Terrasini sono stati: CL = 69 mm, K = 0,65 y -1 e CL = 37 mm, K = 0,8 y -1 . In questo studio vengono aggiornate le informazioni sulla struttura dello stock e i parametri di crescita di questa specie in due aree precedentemente indagate e vengono, inoltre confrontati questi risultati con altri riportati in altre aree del Mediterraneo.

Une rgression linaire significative reliant la taille de la ponte au poids sec par crabe explicait pour 77,3% la variation du nombre global d'ufs. Cependant, une rgression multiple, reliant le nombre d'ufs dposs aux poids secs du crabe et de la coquille, explicait pour 89,9% la variation du nombre global d'ufs, ce qui reprsente une nette augmentation par rapport au cas prcdent. Les grandes coquilles (2-7 g) taient presque toutes occupes par des mles. La structure de la population des crabes, ainsi que la rpartition des tailles des coquilles disponibles, peuvent donc limiter la production.

20102150|Description of two new species of Diastyloides (Cumacea, Diastylidae): D. atlantica and D. ornata. This genus was previously known from the North Atlantic and the Mediterranean. D. atlantica is the first species of Diastyloides found in the South Atlantic. The genus occurs essentially in bathyal and abyssal depths. A key to the species is provided.
41038617|Fifteen live specimens of Conchoderma virgatum were attached to a grey triggerfish (Batistes capriscus) caught in S.W. Portugal. The barnacles were distributed in three groups (right abdominal external face, anterior side of the insertion of the pelvic spine, and close to (5 mm) the left eye (on the lacrymal bone)). The specimens were very different in size, ranging from 2 mm to 18.9 mm (maximum capitular length, CL). The four largest barnacles (CL  16.4 mm) had egg lamellae. Signs of potential predation on the barnacles (rests of barnacles and half-cut cirri in a barnacle) were detected. The left-eye blindness of the grey trigger fish could have been caused by traumatic action performed by the barnacles that settled close to the eye. The skin surrounding the barnacle cluster attached to the right abdominal external face was inflamed. Skin lesions were of sub-acute or chronic nature and the gall-bladder dilatation was consistent with a prolonged status of injury. Both traumatic and inflammatory lesions could have contributed to the loss of body condition of the grey triggerfish. This study is the first report of C. virgatum in S.W. Portugal and the first record of attachment to a grey triggerfish. Foram observados quinze exemplares de Conchoderma virgatum fixos num pampo (Balistes capriscus) capturado na costa SW de Portugal continental. Os cirrpedes encontravam-se distribudos em trs grupos (face abdominal externa direita, face anterior da insero da barbatana plvica e proximo (5 mm) do olho esquerdo (no osso lacrimal)). Os espcimes eram muito diferentes em tamanho, variando de 2 mm a 18,9 mm (comprimento mximo do capitulum, CL). Os quatro exemplares maiores (CL  16,4 mm) tinham lamela de ovos. Foram observados presumveis sinais de predao sobre os cirrpedes (restos de C. virgatum e cirros cortados). A cegueira do olho esquerdo do pampo pode ter sido causada pela aco traumtica dos cirrpedes localizados prximos deste olho. A pele envolvente do aglomerado de cirrpedes localizado na face abdominal externa direita estava inflamada. As leses da pele eram de natureza sub-aguda ou crnica e a dilatao da vesicula biliar era consistente com um estado prolongado de doena. Ambas as leses, traumtica e inflamatria podem ter contribudo para a perda de condio corporal do pampo. Este estudo  o primeiro registo de C. virgatum em Portugal continental e tambm o primeiro registo da sua fixao num pampo.

20105927|A new species of Lobothelphusa, L. gibbosa, is described from rice (= paddy) fields near Rangoon in southern Burma. This, the seventh species recognized in the genus, is the most southerly record of any Lobothelphusa species thus far. Lobothelphusa gibbosa is closest to L. burmensis (Bott) with regards to the general carapace physiognomy, but has a different male first pleopod structure. /// Une nouvelle espce de Lobothelphusa, L. gibbosa, est dcrite de champs de riz (paddy) prs de Rangoon, en Birmanie mridionale. C'est la septime espce reconnue dans le genre et la mention la plus mridionale du genre jusqu' prsent. 20104870|Torpid, highly desiccated juveniles of the freshwater ostracod Candona patzcuaro Tressler, 1954, were collected from dry playa lake soil (4 to 5% moisture) on the South Plains of Texas, U.S.A. To ascertain their tolerance to drying 7th instar desiccated juveniles were subjected to temperatures of -20 C and +32 C, and several humidities (0, 14, 40% R.H.) for up to 30 months. Torpid juveniles survived for 18 months in high percentages at the various temperatures and humidities, except at 0% R.H. High mortality after 24 months occurred in all torpid juveniles at 20 C, but at -20 C the desiccated juveniles experienced low mortality for up to 30 months. Low temperature also influenced the rate of revival from torpor and the time necessary for the terminal molt to the sexually mature adult. Candona juveniles can survive well over a year in dry pond soil between -20 and 32 C and in dry soil with water moisture values as low as 4 to 5%, and are able to develop from desiccated 7th instar larvae to second generation 7th instars in about four weeks. Ecological implications of such an unusual survival strategy to escape desiccation are discussed.
20106350|An updated phylogenetic analysis of the Conchostraca and Cladocera (Branchiopoda, Diplostraca) is presented in response to a recently published critique of Olesen (1998). Some errors are corrected and some scorings are modified. Practically all earlier conclusions are supported. Among these are (1) monophyletic Diplostraca and Cladocera; (2) an uncertain status of the Conchostraca and Spinicaudata, probably they are both paraphyletic with respect to the Cladocera; (3) uncertain relationships between the four distinct taxa within the Cladocera, though some support was found for the Gymnomera (Haplopoda and Onychopoda). /// Als Antwort auf eine jngst publizierte Kritik an Olesen (1998) wird eine aktualisierte phylogenetische Analyse der Conchostraca und Cladocera (Branchiopoda, Diplostraca) prsentiert. Einige Fehler der frheren Analyse werden korrigiert, einige Merkmals-Kodierungen modifiziert. Praktisch alle Schlufolgerungen werden erneut untersttzt, so 1. die Monophylie der Diplostraca und der Cladocera, 2. der unsichere Status der Conchostraca und der Spinicaudata, beide Taxa sind wahrscheinlich paraphyletisch, und 3. die unsicheren Verwandtschaftsbeziehungen der vier hheren Taxa innerhalb der Cladocera, obwohl insbesondere die Gymnomera (Haplopoda und Onychopoda) einige Untersttzung erfahren.
20105164|From plankton samples taken at a reef lagoon off Puerto Morelos, on the northern portion of the eastern coast of the Yucatan Peninsula, a new tropical subspecies of Monstrilla wandelii, only known from temperate-cold latitudes, is described from male specimens. The analysis of the main characteristics in the taxonomy of monstrilloids allowed its identification as M. wandelii. The new subspecies differs from the nominal species in the relative length and armature of the antennular segments, in the structure of the genital lappets of the fifth legs and in its total size, which is nearly 2.5 times that of the nominal subspecies. /// A partir de muestras de plancton obtenidas en una laguna arrecifal frente a Puerto Morelos, en la porcin norte de la costa oriental de la Pennsula de Yucatn, se describe, a partir de especmenes machos, una nueva subespecie tropical de Monstrilla wandelii, especie solamente conocida en latitudes templado-fras. El anlisis de las principales caractersticas en la taxonoma de los monstriloides, permiti la identificacin de M. wandelii. La nueva subespecie difiere de la subespecie nominal en las longitudes relativas y armamento de los segmentos antenulares, en la estructura de las tapas genitales del quinto par de patas y en su tamao total, que es casi 2.5 veces mayor que el de la subespecie nominal.

20105200|Earlier publications include the suggestion that larval transfer (the transfer from one phylogenetic lineage to another of genes coded for larval features) provides the best explanation of anomalies between adult and larval morphologies in the Dromioidea and in the crab Dorhynchus thomsoni. It is now suggested that most crustacean larvae, other than postlarvae and megalopas, evolved from transferred larvae. Examples include zoeas (except those of the Polychelidae), phyllosomas, mysid larvae, protozoeas, and nauplii. The 2nd and 3rd appendages of nauplii are similar and postoral. The 2nd appendages are preoral in most extant non-naupliar crustaceans, but they remain postoral in the Ostracoda and Mystacocarida and in the Cambrian Martinssonia. The evolution of these groups is briefly discussed, and it is postulated that nauplii and similar forms were originally transferred from non-crustacean arthropods. The Sergestoidea and the Amphionidacea provide striking examples of the problems faced by those who would dismiss the concept of larval transfer in crustacean evolution. The taxonomic value of the characters of transferred larvae is discussed. /// Des publications antrieures incluaient la suggestion que le transfert larvaire (le transfert des gnes cods pour les traits larvaires d'une ligne phylogntique  une autre) fournit la meilleure explication des anomalies entre morphologies adulte et larvaire chez les Dromioidea et le crabe Dorhynchus thomsoni. Il est maintenant suggr que la plupart des larves de Crustacs, en dehors des postlarves et des mgalopes, voluent  partir de larves transfres. Les exemples comprennent les zos (sauf celles des Polychelidae), les phyllosomes, les larves mysis, les protozos et les nauplii. Les 2mes et 3mes appendices des nauplii sont semblables et post-oraux. Les 2mes appendices sont pr-oraux chez la plupart des Crustacs non naupliens existants, mais restent post-oraux chez les Ostracodes et les Mystacocarides et chez Martinssonia du cambrien. L'volution de ces groupes est brivement discute, et il est postul que les nauplii et les formes similaires ont t originellement transfrs  partir d'Arthropodes non-Crustacs. Les Sergestoidea et les Amphionidacea sont des exemples frappants des problmes auxquels doivent faire face ceux qui voudraient carter le concept de transfert larvaire dans l'volution des Crustacs. La valeur taxonomique des caractres des larves transfrses est discute.

20105257|Specimens of Archaeomysis kokuboi Ii, 1964 from South Korea were reared in the laboratory at 10, 15, 20 and 25C under controlled conditions (34; 12/12 L/D) from hatching through a series of instars. The effects of temperature on growth were investigated. Each specimen was maintained individually, the instar size was determined from exuvia, and the intermoult period was recorded. At higher temperatures survival in terms of a given stage was better and juveniles reached later instars. In both males and females the sexual moult at which sexual characteristics were firstly observed was consistently the 3rd moult at 10C and 15C, and the 4th moult at 20C and 25C, indicating variation in the position of sexual moult with temperature. The puberty instar was the 8th at the two higher temperatures (it was not reached at the lower temperatures). Intermoult duration increased with instar number, and was greatly extended at the lower temperature. Although the moult increment showed modest reduction with instar number, it varied little with temperature. This led to a lower growth rate with decreased temperature. /// Des spcimens de Archaeomysis kokuboi Ii, 1964 provenant de Core du Sud ont t levs au laboratoire  10, 15, 20 et 25C en conditions contrles (34; 12/12 L/D) depuis l'closion et en suivant les divers stades de dveloppement. Les effets de la temprature sur la croissance ont t tudis. Chaque spcimen a t maintenu individuellement, la taille du stade a t dtermine  partir de l'exuvie, et la priode d'intermue note. Aux tempratures plus leves, la survie pour un stade donn tait meilleure et les juvniles ont atteint les derniers stades. Chez les mles comme chez les femelles, la mue sexuelle,  laquelle les caractristiques sexuelles ont t observes pour la premire fois, tait la troisime mue  10C et 15C, et la quatrime mue  20C et 25C, indiquant une variation de la mue sexuelle avec la temprature. Le stade de pubert tait le huitime aux deux tempratures les plus leves (il n'a pas t atteint aux tempratures les plus basses). La dure de l'intermue augmentait avec le nombre de stades, et tait largement allong  basse temprature. Bien que l'augmentation  la mue ait montr une rduction modeste avec le nombre de stades, elle variait peu avec la temprature. Ceci a conduit  un taux de croissance plus faible avec la dcroissance de la temprature.

20103669|Die Filterstrukturen von Daphnia pulex, Daphnia magna und Daphnia pulicaria wurden mit dem Rasterelektronenmikroskop untersucht. Geometrische Beschreibungen der Filter dieser Arten werden gegeben, und es wurden die Werte fr folgende Parameter bestimmt: 1. Lnge der Filter; 2. Lnge der Filterborsten; 3. Abstand zwischen den Borsten; 4. Durchmesser der Borsten; 5. Verhltnis von Lnge der Borsten zu Abstand von der Basis der Borste bis zu der Stelle, an der sich ihr Durchmesser verengt; 6. Verhltnis von Durchmesser der Borsten zu Hhe des Kamms, der entlang ihrer medialen Flche verluft; 7. Breite des Kamms; 8. Lnge der Fiedern; 9. Regressionskoeffizient fr die lineare Verringering des Durchmessers der Fiedern; 10. Strecke fr die lineare Verringerung der Fiedern; 11. Abstand zwischen den Fiedern; 12. Winkel, in dem die Fiedern von der Ebene der Borsten mediad vorspringen. Bei D. pulicaria zeigen die Werte der Parameter nur geringe Variation zwischen den verschiedenen Abschnitten des Filters, zwischen den Filtern der 3. und 4. Extremitt und zwischen verschiedenen Individuen natrlicher Populationen. Es gibt jedoch Ausnahmen, wobei die festgestellten, signifikanten Unterschiede sich gegenseitig kompensieren drften, und so das Leitungsvermgen des Filters fr die Flssigkeit in seinem Bereich weitgehend einheitlich sein knnte. Dies sttzt die Annahme, da die Filter von D. pulicaria ausgesprochen gleichmig sind. Die Struktur des Filters scheint der Aufrechterhaltung der Gleichmigkeit zu dienen und keine Flexibilitt des Verhaltens zu gestatten. Reynolds-Zahlen fr die Strmung durch die Filter deuten auf laminare Strmung. Hydrodynamische Erwgungen auf der Basis von Modellen fr laminare Strmung lassen erkennen, warum einheitliche Maschenweite vorteilhaft sein kann. Das Modell von Lam & Frost (1976), das laminare Strmung annimmt, und das von Lehman (1976) drften geeignet sein, die Filtrationsprozesse bei D. pulex, D. magna und D. pulicaria zu beschreiben, die sich von Partikeln von Algengre ernhren.
20105210|The leptostracan Nebalia daytoni new species, is common of the San Diego coast (Southern California), USA, on the sandy sea floor from 8 to 35 meters in depth. Unlike other California Nebalia it inhabits clean, oligotrophic sands rather than enriched sediments. The species is most easily recognized by its eye which has a flat anterior margin bordered by a superior and inferior protuberance. It is also easily distinguishable from other California Nebalia by its short antennular flagellum. /// Le Leptostrac Nebalia daytoni espce nouvelle, est commun au large de la cte de San Diego (Southern California), E.U.A., sur le fond sableux, de 8  35 mtres de profondeur. A la diffrence des autres Nebalia de Californie, elle habite les sables oligotrophes propres plutt que les sdiments enrichis. Elle est aussi facile  distinguer des autres espces californiennes par son flagelle antennulaire court.
20696256|The dominant copepod species, Canthocalanus pauper (Giesbrecht, 1888), Oncaea venusta Philippi, 1843, Temora turbinata (Dana, 1849), and Undinula vulgaris (Dana, 1849), collected from the sea around northern Taiwan and from the southern East China Sea extending to the Okinawa Trough, were analysed for trace metals (Cd, Co, Cr, Cu, Fe, Mn, Ni, Pb, and Zn) to study possible spatial heterogeneity in these species of copepods. Trace metal concentrations ranged as follows: Cd, 0.39-141.78 g/g; Co, 0.03-91.9 g/g; Cr, 2.26-243.5 g/g; Cu, 4.36-195.5 g/g; Fe, 19.96-2886.9 g/g; Mn, 5.34-735.8 g/g; Ni, 1.69-954.9 g/g; Pb, 0.04-85.8 g/g; and Zn, 5.57-941.8 g/g. The average concentration of trace metals in the copepod samples analysed follows the sequence: Fe > Zn > Ni > Mn > Cu > Cr > Cd > Co > Pb. The sequence of total metal contents in the copepods is: Oncaea venusta > Temora turbinata > Canthocalanus pauper > Undinula vulgaris. The content of the same metal shows considerable variation both intra- and inter-specifically, and the difference in concentration can vary 1 to 3 orders of magnitude. We also found that metal concentrations in males are higher than in females in Oncaea venusta and Undinula vulgaris. In addition, copepod metal quota also display spatial variation: coastal water > southern East China Sea > Kuroshio Water, suggesting that the metal contents of copepods are influenced by the water quality of their marine environment. Les espces dominantes de coppodes, Canthocalanus pauper (Giesbrecht, 1888), Oncaea venusta Philippi, 1843, Temora turbinata (Dana, 1849), et Undinula vulgaris (Dana, 1849), collectes de la mer autour du nord de Taiwan et au sud-est de la mer de Chine jusqu'a la fosse Ocanique d'Okinawa ont t analyses pour les mtaux traces (Cd, Co, Cr, Cu, Fe, Mn, Ni, Pb, et Zn) afin d'tudier une possible htrognit spatiale chez ces espces de coppodes. Les concentrations de ces mtaux prsentent les valeurs suivantes: Cd, 0,39-141,78 g/g; Co, 0,03-91,9 g/g; Cr, 2,26-243,5 g/g; Cu, 4,36-195,5 g/g; Fe, 19,96-2886,9 g/g; Mn, 5,34-735,8 g/g; Ni, 1,69-954,9 g/g; Pb, 0,04-85,8 g/g; et Zn, 5,57-941,8 g/g. La concentration moyenne de ces mtaux dans les chantillons de coppodes analyss suit la squence: Fe > Zn > Ni > Mn > Cu > Cr > Cd > Co > Pb. La squence du contenu total en mtaux dans les coppodes est: Oncaea venusta > Temora turbinata > Canthocalanus pauper > Undinula vulgaris. La quantit d'un mme mtal montre des variations intra- et inter-spcifiques considrables, et la diffrence en concentration peut varier entre 1 et 3 d'ordre d'amplitude. Nous avons aussi trouv que les concentrations en mtal chez les mles sont plus leves que chez les femelles chez Oncaea venusta et Undinula vulgaris. De plus, les quotas de mtaux par coppode montrent des variations spatiales: eau ctire > sud-est de la mer de Chine > eaux de Kuroshio, suggrant que le contenu en mtal des coppodes est influenc par la qualit de l'eau de leur environnement marin.
20106051|Spelaeogriphacea are reported for the first time from Australia. A new genus and species, Mangkurtu mityula, are described and the only other two genera diagnosed. The species, the third extant in the order, seems more similar to the Brazilian Potiicoara brasiliensis than to the South African Spelaeogriphus lepidops but all have unique apomorphies. The species is found in the aquifer in the Tertiary Millstream Dolomite of the Pilbara region of Western Australia. It is part of a fauna with clear Gondwanan affinities. This fauna is distinct from those found in aquifers in the lower and upper parts of the same drainage basin. /// Des Spelaeogriphacea ont t dcouverts pour la premire fois en Australie. Un nouveau genre et une nouvelle espce, Mangkurtu mityula sont dcrits et une diagnose est donne pour les deux seuls autres genres. L'espce, la troisime de l'ordre, apparat plus proche de l'espce brsilienne Potiicoara brasiliensis que de l'espce d'Afrique du sud Spelaeogriphus lepidops mais toutes prsentent des apomorphies uniques. L'espce a t rcolte dans le systme aquifre du dolomite tertiaire Millstream de la rgion de Pilbara en Australie Occidentale. Elle fait partie d'une faune prsentant clairement des affinits gondwaniennes. Cette faune est distincte de celles trouves dans les aquifres des parties infrieure et suprieure du mme bassin de drainage.
20105077|A new criterion for the identification of some Crustacea Decapoda is described, based on SEM-observations. Carapace micro-structures have been found to differ at a specific level within the same genus, i.e., Ebalia. All Mediterranean species of this genus have been investigated as to this character, because of the well-known difficulties with regard to their classification. The usefulness of SEM-observations for the identification of damaged and fossil specimens is pointed out as well. /// Viene descritto un nuovo criterio per l'identificazione di alcuni Crostacei decapodi. In particolare viene osservata, tramite Microscopio Elettronico a Scansione, la micromorfologia del carapace di specie appartenenti al genere Ebalia (Famiglia Leucosiidae). Le osservazioni al SEM possono diventare particolarmente utili per l'identificazione di campioni danneggiati o fossili.
23034348|The type series of Paramysis festae Colosi, 1921, contained material from two different genera. Nonetheless the specific status of P. festae is confirmed, based on a revised set of characters. Its acknowledged distribution is restricted again to the type locality, a brackish lagoon on the coast of Libya. First records are given for P. bacescoi Labat, 1953, in the Mediterranean (Levantine Sea), and for P. helleri (G. O. Sars, 1877) and P. agigensis Bcescu, 1940, in the Sea of Marmora. New records support the previously not acknowledged occurrence of P. helleri in the Black Sea. Not counting the doubtful taxa P. proconnesia Colosi, 1922, and P. portzicensis Nouvel, 1950, a total of ten species of the genus Paramysis Czerniavsky, 1882, is definitively acknowledged for the NE-Atlantic, Mediterranean, and Marmora basins. A key to these ten species is given. Among 15 species of the genus Paramysis examined, 14 have statoliths mineralized with vaterite (CaCO 3 ); only P. arenosa (G. O. Sars, 1877) has fluorite (CaF 2 ). Among the vaterite-bearing species, a Ponto-Mediterranean-Atlantic group with seven species is marked by thoracic sternites with smooth median processes, clearly different from sternites with hair-like or spine-like scales in six Ponto-Caspian and one Anatolian species. Together with published data on the fossil record and genetics, the new findings on the distribution, morphology, and statolith composition in Ponto-Mediterranean and Pontic species of Paramysis fit well to scenarios of remote Paratethyan origin, possible divergence of taxa in the Messinian Mediterranean, and later return of some descendants to the Black Sea. Das Typenmaterial von Paramysis festae Colosi, 1921, enthielt Individuen aus zwei verschiedenen Genera. Basierend auf revidierten Merkmalen wurde der Status von P. festae dennoch am Artniveau besttigt. Die anerkannte Verbreitung von P. festae wird neuerlich auf die Typlokalitt, eine brackige Lagune an der Kste Libyens, reduziert. Erstnachweise erfolgten fr P. bacescoi Labat, 1953, im Mittelmeer (Levante Becken), und fr P. helleri (G. O. Sars, 1877) plus P. agigensis Bcescu, 1940, im Marmarameer. Neue Belege besttigten das zuvor verworfene Auftreten von P. helleri im Schwarzen Meer. Nach Abzug der fraglichen Taxa P. proconnesia Colosi, 1922, und P. portzicensis Nouvel, 1950, verbleiben insgesamt zehn als sicher anzuerkennende Arten der Gattung Paramysis Czerniavsky, 1882, fr den Einzugsbereich von NO-Atlantik, Mittelmeer und Marmarameer. Ein Bestimmungsschlssel wird fr diese zehn Arten gegeben. Von 15 untersuchten Arten der Gattung Paramysis hatten 14 Arten Statolithen aus Vaterit (CaCO 3 ), einzig P. arenosa (G. O. Sars, 1877) aus Fluorit (CaF 2 ). Unter den Arten mit Vaterit Statolithen konnte eine pontomediterran-atlantische Gruppe mit sieben Arten durch oberflchlich glatte, mediane Fortstze an den Thorakalsterniten von sechs pontokaspischen und einer anatolischen Art mit beschuppten Sterniten klar abgegrenzt werden. Zusammen mit publizierten Fossilbefunden und genetischen Daten, passen die neuen Befunde zur Verbreitung und Anatomie der Arten und zur Zusammensetzung der Statolithen bei den ponto-mediterranen und pontischen Paramysis Arten gut zu Szenarien zeitlich ferner Herkunft aus der Paratethys, mglicher Aufspaltung von Taxa im Mittelmeer whrend des Messinians, und spterer Rckkehr einiger Abkmmlinge in das Schwarze Meer.

20107749|The rare thalassinid shrimp, Eutrichocheles modestus (Herbst, 1796) is now recorded from South Vietnam. It was previously collected in Thailand and Malaysia, and was dealt with in Ngoc-Ho (1998) and Ngoc-Ho et al. (2005). The Vietnamese specimens are described in detail and variations are discussed. They are compared with specimens from Thailand and Malaysia, and with the female holotype of Eutrichocheles crosnieri Ngoc-Ho, 1998, also from Vietnam. Additional remarks, especially on the status of the latter species, are presented. A note on the habitat, fishery, and economic importance of E. modestus in Vietnam is provided. This study shows that the only female of E. modestus from Vietnam, as well as the one from Thailand, differ from the holotype of E. crosnieri by certain features, and no males examined can be assigned to this latter species. The two species are here kept separate, pending a future study of additional material, especially from the type locality of E. crosnieri. /// La rare crevette thalassinide Eutrichocheles modestus (Herbst, 1796) est maintenant rcolte au Sud Vietnam. Elle a t signale auparavant en Thailande et Malaisie et traite dans Ngoc-Ho (1998) et Ngoc-Ho et al. (2005). Les spcimens du Vietnam sont dcrits en dtail et les variations sont discutes. Ils sont compars  ceux de Thailande et Malaisie et  la femelle holotype d'Eutrichocheles crosnieri Ngoc-Ho, 1998, celle-ci aussi originaire du Vietnam. Quelques remarques, spcialement sur le statut de cette dernire espce, sont prsentes. Une note sur l'habitat, la pche et l'importance conomique d'E. modestus du Vietnam est fournie. Cette tude montre que la seule femelle d'E. modestus du Vietnam, comme celle de Thailande, se distingue de l'holotype d'E. crosnieri par certains caractres et aucun mle tudi ne peut tre attribu  cette dernire espce. Ces deux espces sont ici spares en attendant un apport supplmentaire de matriel, provenant de la localit type d'E. crosnieri spcialement.
20104330|Se describe Alpheus colombiensis, especie nueva, de Baha Malaga, Colombia. 20106041|The small ocypodid crab Ilyoplax ningpoensis exhibits two mud-using territorial behaviours against burrow-holding neighbours: building a barricade near the neighbour's burrow, and plugging the neighbour's burrow while the neighbour is in that burrow. Most barricade-builders and pluggers were large-sized males and, in general, barricade-builders and pluggers were larger than their opponents. Activity space of a barricaded crab was biased toward the side opposite the barricade. When the barricade was removed, the crab freed from it advanced toward the barricade-builder's burrow, suggesting that the barricade functions to deter the neighbour's approach. In neighbour burrow-plugging, the time to the pluggee's reemergence was mostly less than 5 min. The pluggee's activity site, immediately after reemergence, was not always shifted farther from the plugger's burrow. These features of barricade building and neighbour burrow-plugging are compared with those of three congeneric species that have been so far described. /// Le petit crabe ocypodide Ilyoplax ningpoensis montre deux comportements territoriaux utilisant la vase contre les voisins occupant des terriers: ils batissent une barricade prs du terrier du voisin, et bouchent ce terrier alors que le voisin est  l'intrieur. La plupart des batisseurs de barricades et des boucheurs taient des mles de grande taille. Ils taient plus grands que leurs adversaires. L'espace d'activit du crabe barricad tait repouss vers le ct oppos  la barricade. Lorsque celle-ci tait enleve, le crabe libr s'avanait vers le terrier du batisseur, ce qui suggre que la fonction de la barricade est de dcourager l'approche du voisin. Dans l'obturation du terrier voisin, la rmergence de l'occupant se faisait surtout dans les 5 minutes. Le site d'activit de cet occupant aussitt aprs sa rmergence n'tait pas toujours plus loign du terrier du boucheur. Ces faits de barricade et de bouchage du terrier du voisin sont compars  ceux dcrits chez trois espces congnriques.

Des cellules neuroscrtrices sont prsentes dans le cerveau, le ganglion sousoesophagien, les ganglions gnaphocphaliques, les ganglions thoraciques et les ganglions abdominaux, la medulle optique et les organes de Bellonci. Un organe neurohmal, la glande du sinus, a t trouv sur le ct dorsal, loign du nerf optique du pdoncule oculaire. Les produits de neuroscrtion, venus des cellules neuroscrtrices du cerveau, en particulier du protocrbron, sont transports jusqu' la glande du sinus.
