27743396|While collecting Foraminifera shells from the bottom substrate around Peljeac Peninsula (southern Adriatic), the presence of Pontonia pinophylax (Otto, 1821) in mussels, Pinna nobilis Linnaeus, 1758, living in Posidonia oceanica (L.) Delile sea grass meadows, was recorded. According to avilable data, it was obvious that detiled investigations of that species had never been made for the southern Adriatic. Ten samples of Pinna nobilis were obtained and only four specimens from the P. nobilis population were removed for investigation, from which eight individuals of Pontonia pinnophylax were isolated. The numbers and positions of the individuals were recorded. All of these were associated with their Pinna host in Pairs, so the sex-ratio was 50% males and 50% females. Morphological study identified the left chela as the major chela in male shrimps. The largest host had the largest individuals of commensal shrimp. Total length appeared to be larger in male shrimps than in females. /// Lors de prlvements de tests de Foraminifres du fond autour de la pninsule de Peljeac (sud de l'Adriatique), la prsence de Pontonia pinnophylax (Otto, 1821) a t observe dans les coquilles de Pinna nobilis Linnaeus, 1758 vivant dans les herbiers  posidonies Posidonia oceanica (L.) Delile. Selon les donnes disponibles, il est manifeste que des recherches dtailes concernant cette espce n'avaient jamais t menes dans le sud de l'Adriatique. Dix chantillons de Pinna nobilis ont et obtenus et seuls quatre spcimens de la populations de P. nobilis ont t retenus, desquels huit individus de Pontonia pinnophylax ont t isols. Le nombre et la position des individus ont t nots. Tous taient associs par paires  leur hte Pinna, d'o la sex-ratio de 50% de mles et 50% de femelles. L'tude morphologique a permis d'identifier la pince gauche comme la pince majeure chez les crevettes mles. L'hte de plus grande taille renfermait les individus de la crevette commendale les plus grands. La longueur totale est apparue plus grande chez les crevettes mles que chez les femelles.

27743383|An annotated checklist of the intertidal species of Thalassinidea of the west coast of Baja California, Mexico, and an updated comparative list of their commensals and parasites that live inside the burrows of these crustaceans or on their body, is provided. Four species of burrower shrimps, the mud shrimp, Upogebia macginiteorum (Williams, 1986) [Upogebiidae] and the ghost shrimps, Neotrypaea biffari (Holthuis, 1991), N. californiensis (Dana, 1854), and N. gigas (Dana, 1852) [Callianassidae] were collected during our survey. For each species, the diagnostic features, distribution, and some ecological remarks are recorded, which include: (1) a revised diagnoses for the Neotrypaea species; (2) a range extension for N. californiensis and N. gigas from San Quintin Bay, Baja California, Mexico to El Coyote Estuary, near Point Abreojos, Baja California Sur, Mxico; (3) nine new records of symbiotic associations; and (4) the first record for Mexico of the commensal copepod, Clausidium vancouverense (Haddon, 1912). An illustrated key to the identification of the intertidal species of thalassinideans of the Californian Province is included as well. /// El presente estudio proporciona una lista faunstica comentada de las especies de Talasnidos intermareales de la costa oeste de Baja California, Mxico, y una lista comparativa actualizada de los comensales y parsitos que viven dentro de la madriguera de estos crustceos o sobre su cuerpo. Cuatro especies de camarones amadrigadores fueron recolectados durante nuestro estudio, el camarn de fango Upogebia macginiteorum (Williams, 1986) [familia Upogebiidae] y los camarones fantasma Neotrypaea biffari (Holthuis, 1991), N. californiensis (Dana, 1854) y N. gigas (Dana, 1852) [familia Callianassidae]. Para cada especie, las caractersticas diagnosticas, la distribucin y algunas observaciones ecolgicas son registradas, lo cual incluye: (1) una diagnosis revisada para las especies de Neotrypaea; (2) la extensin del mbito geogrfico para N. californiensis y N. gigas de la Baha de San Quintn, Baja California, Mxico hasta el estero El Coyote, cerca de Punta Abreojos, Baja California Sur, Mxico; (3) el registro de nueve nuevas asociaciones simbiticas y (4) el primer registro para Mxico del coppodo comensal Clausidium vancouverense (Haddon, 1912). Se incluye tambin una clave de identificacin de las especies de talasnidos intermareales de la provincia Californiana.

20104288|Description de la rorganisation micro-anatomique et ultrastructurale qui a lieu durant la migration du pigment dans un chromatophore typique de crevette palmonide. Ce type de chromatophore contient comme organites caractristiques, des granules de pigment, des formes spcialises de rticulum endoplasmique lisse (systmes de citernes tubulaires allonges, de septes scalariformes fenestres et de rseaux), des microtubules, des mitochondries de formes diverses, de lysosomes et des dictyosomes. La migration du pigment implique un dplacement massif de la plupart des organites cellulaires qui se traduit, dans le cas d'un mouvement centripte, par le collapsus des prolongements distaux du chromatophore. Les microtubules sont distribus uniformment dans les prolongements sans pigment, mais ils forment un faisceau central dans les prolongements contenant des granules de pigment. Leur densit par unite de surface en coupe transversale augmente dans les prolongements dpourvus de granules bien que leur distance centre  centre ne varie pas de faon significative avec le degr de dispersion du pigment. La prsence du calcium est ncessaire pour la concentration des grains de pigment et il est suggr que le mcanisme d'entre et de distribution de cet ion est associ au systme de rticulum septal.

20103496|Geographisch beeinflute Variation im ersten Schwimmfu des Form I Mnnchen des Zwergkrebses, Cambarellus puer, wurde untersucht. Berechnungen, die unternommen wurden, grndeten sich auf acht morphologische Messungen von 140 mnnlichen Exemplaren der Form I aus 20 Gebieten. Statistische Methoden mit einer Merkmalsvariabele und mit mehreren Merkmalsvariabelen wurden auf abgestufte Angaben angewandt, um Analysen durchzufhren. Eine Korrelationsmatrize unter sechs abgestuften Charakteren wurde berechnet und die ersten drei Hauptkomponenten gezogen, die fr 85,7% (Komponente I = 42,0%, II = 26,2%, III = 17,6%) der Variation in der Charakterreihe verantwortlich waren. 23065212|There is a debate about the systematic status of Leptobathynellidae Noodt, 1965. Are they a highly specialized offshoot of Parabathynellidae or do they deserve separate familial status? The arguments for the latter point of view are critically evaluated and as a result it is suggested to merge Leptobathynellidae with Parabathynellidae as had already been done earlier. Separate familial status for Leptobathynellidae would leave Parabathynellidae as a paraphyletic rest. The probably most plesiomorphic species within Bathynellidae is Baicalobathynella magna (Bazikalova, 1954), which belongs to the first Bathynellacea ever described. Its redescription presented here adds important new details. The morphological differences between Bathynellidae and Parabathynellidae are listed. There is some confusion about the year of publication of their names. The correct citations are: Bathynellidae Grobben, 1905 and Parabathynellidae Noodt, 1965. ber den systematischen Status der Leptobathynellidae Noodt, 1965 wird eine kontroverse Auseinandersetzung gefhrt. Handelt es sich bei ihnen um einen hoch spezialisierten Seitenzweig der Parabathynellidae oder ist es berechtigt, sie als eigenstndige Familie zu betrachten? Die Argumente fr den letzteren Standpunkt werden kritisch mit dem Ergebnis errtert, Leptobathynellidae und Parabathynellidae zu vereinigen, wie das schon frher geschehen war. Ohne Leptobathynellidae wren Parabathynellidae ein paraphyletischer Rest. Die vermutlich relativ am meisten plesiomorphe Art der Bathynellidae ist Bacailobathynella magna (Bazikalova, 1954), die zu den ersten Bathynellacea gehrt, die beschrieben worden sind. Die hier vorgenommene Nachbeschreibung liefert wichtige neue Details. Die morphologischen Unterschiede zwischen Bathynellidae und Parabathynellidae werden aufgelistet und es wird Licht in die Verwirrung um das Jahr der Verffentlichung ihrer Namen gebracht. Die korrekten Zitate lauten: Bathynellidae Grobben, 1905 und Parabathynellidae Noodt, 1965.

Milne Edwards berein. C. gurnardi Kryer wurde von R. R. Parker (1965) neu beschrieben und ist C. rapax H. Milne Edwards sehr hnlich; trotz des Mangels an Zwischenbeispielen wurden jedoch bestndige Unterschiede wahrgenommen. Das Material kann als ausreichend betrachtet werden, um die Art C. gurnardi aufrecht zu erhalten.

In this context, selective stocking is very important. Various morphological changes, including colouration, take place during juvenile phase rendering the segregation of seed of different species even more difficult. (P.) semisulcatus, (3) Penaeus (Fenneropenaeus) merguiensis, (4) P. The key is based on colour in live condition, habitat and salinity preference, swimming and burying behaviour, morphological, meristic and morphometric studies. /// Malgr les progrs de la technologie pour la culture de la crevette rose dans plusieurs parties du monde, l'Inde dpendra encore des gniteurs sauvages pendant un certain temps encore. 20105492|The cuticle of the freshwater crayfish, Procambarus clarkii (Girard, 1852), has several extracellular, cuticular isozymes for carbonic anhydrase (CA) which were isolated and purified via affinity chromatography. To denature proteins not entombed in cuticle calcite the ground cuticle was washed twice with both a 0.5% SDS and 1.5% sodium hypochlorite solution prior to CA isolation. Total water soluble protein (WSP) was 133  68 (SD) mg/100 g (6) cuticle, whereas affinity column bound protein, CA, was 191  108 (SD) g/100 g (6) cuticle. CA was 0.144% WSP. EDTA dissolved the calcium carbonate and freed the CA along with the other WSP. The CA fraction was positive to bovine CA II antibodies (ELIZA and Western Blot) and had low CA enzyme activity. The estimated molecular weights using PAGE showed one isozyme with a molecular weight of 29 kDa, which is similar to that in vertebrates, and two larger isozymes (53 and 66 kDa). All four isozymes were detected in only one sample, whereas the two larger isozymes were detected in all six cleaned cuticle samples. The larger isozymes may be dimers of the smaller isozyme and are more like those detected in oyster pearls and shell with weights of 60 kDa. /// La cuticule de l'crevisse Procambarus clarkii (Girard, 1852) contient plusieurs isoenzymes extracellulaires de l'anhydrase carbonique (CA), qui ont t isoles et purifies par chromatographie. Afin de dnaturer les protines non incluses dans le calcite cuticulaire, la cuticule a t lave deux fois  l'aide d'une solution  0,5% de SDS et 1,5% d'hypochlorite de sodium avant l'extraction de la CA. Les protines totales solubles dans l'eau (WSP) reprsentaient 133  68 (SD) mg/100 g (6) de cuticule, tandis que la protine associe CA, tait de 191  108 (SD) g/100 g (6) de cuticule, soit CA = 0,144% WSP. L'EDTA a dissous le carbonate de calcium et libr la CA avec les autres WSP. La fraction de CA s'est rvle positive aux anticorps bovins CA II (ELISA et Western Blot) et a une activit enzymatique CA dtectable. Les poids molculaires estimes en utilisant PAGE, ont rvl une isoenzyme avec un poids molculaire de 29 kDa, qui est analogue  celle trouve chez les Vertbrs, et deux plus grands isoenzymes (53 et 66 kDa). Les quatre isoenzymes ont t dtectes seulement dans un chantillon tandis que les deux plus grandes ont t dtectes dans tous les six chantillons de cuticule lavs. Les plus grandes pourraient tre des dimres de la plus petite et sont comparables  celles dtectes dans les perles et la coquille d'hutre avec des poids molculaires de 60 kDa.

20104353|Die Zellen der Verdauungsdrse von Gammarus roeselii wurden mit dem TEM untersucht. Von distal nach proximal lassen sich 4 Zonen unterscheiden: eine Zone embryonaler Zellen, eine bergangszone, eine "Reife" zone, eine Zone ausschliesslich aus Reservezellen. Die embryonalen Zellen weisen Mikrovilli auf und enthalten kleine Lipidtrpfchen. Dies deutet auf Beteilung an der Absorption und auf eine gewisse Speicherfunktion. Die hufigen Zellteilungen der Embryonalzellen dienen grundstzlich die Erneuerung der Epithelzellen der Verdauungsdrse. Die bergangszone besteht aus Fibrillarzellen (F-Zellen) und Reservezellen (R-Zellen). Die F-Zellen sind durch viele Pinocytoseblschen und eine Vakuole characterisiert, was auf intrazellulre Verdauung hindeutet. Die R-Zellen haben vielfltige Funktion und kommen in allen Zonen ausser der Zone embryonaler Zellen vor. Ihre sehr langen Mikrovilli und die Konzentration der Mitochondrien im apikalen Bereich weisen auf Absorption als Hauptfunktion. Daneben gibt es Hinweise auf Enzymsynthese und Sekretionsttigkeit: das Zytoplasma ist reich an rauhen ER, die Zisternen des Golgi-Apparates sind geschwollen; in der Nhe des Golgi-Apparates und im apikalen Teil der Zelle finden sich von einer Membran umgebene und feinkrniges Material enthaltende Vesikel, die ihren Inhalt durch Exocystose entleeren. R-Zellen enthalten auch grosse Lipid-Mengen und in ganz geringen Mengen Glykogen-Krnchen. Die characteristischen Zellen der "Reife" zone sind die B-Zellen. Sie hneln den F-Zellen, haben aber eine viel grssere Vakuole.

Une attention particulire a t accorde  la structure des pices buccales et des autres appendices, et aux proportions du corps. D'aprs ces observations, l'auteur a conclu que C. dubia est une espce valide, alors que la Clavella du Merlan est un cotype de C. adunca. Il propose de nommer cet cotype C. adunca f. devastatrix. Il a aussi observ des diffrences entre C. dubia, d'une part, et C. adunca de la Morue, et du Merlan, d'autre part, en ce qui concerne la distribution sur l'hte. La premire ne manifeste pas de prfrence pour un arc branchial particulier et s'attache principalement  la partie proximale des filaments branchiaux, tandis que la seconde prfre nettement le premier arc branchial. C. a. f. devastatrix vite les filaments branchiaux et s'attache presque uniquement aux branchiospines. Ceci est peut-tre d  ses relations antagonistes avec Diclidophora, un parasite commun sur les filaments branchiaux du Merlan. L'auteur attire l'attention sur les similitudes entre Clavella et Lernaeocera dans leur infestation de la Morue, du Merlan et du Lieu. Dans les deux cas on trouve les mmes espces sur la Morue et sur le Merlan, mais une espce diffrente sur le Lieu.

20105398|A new nannastacid cumacean, Cumella biformis, is described from the Argentinean continental shelf. C. biformis is readily distinguished from the other known species of Cumella by having: (1) a short, upturned pseudorostrum lacking projecting siphons and (2) uropods with distal spines fused to the rami and endopods slightly arched. Two distinct forms are recognized for ovigerous females: one large (2.32-2.55 mm) with rudimentary exopods on the third maxilliped and first two peraeopods, and another smaller (2.07-2.24 mm) with fully-developed exopods. The type material of C. vicina Zimmer, 1944 from the Caribbean Sea was examined and a partial redescription of this species is provided. /// Se describe una nueva especie del gnero Cumella (C. biformis) del Mar Argentino. Esta especie se distingue de las restantes del gnero por presentar: (1) un pseudorrostro corto dirigido hacia arriba con vlvulas pseudorrostrales (sifones) que no sobrepasan el pseudorrostro, y (2) urpodos con endopoditos ligeramente arqueados y espinas distales fusionadas a las ramas. C. biformis n. sp. presenta dos morfotipos: uno compuesto por hembras marsupiales grandes (2,32-2,55 mm) con exopoditos rudimentarios y unas pocas sedas diminutas sobre el tercer maxilipedio y los dos primeros pereipodos, y el otro por hembras marsupiales pequeas (2,07-2,24 mm) con exopoditos bien desarrollados que portan largas sedas plumosas. Se redescribe brevemente el material tipo de Cumella vicina Zimmer, 1944 (Mar Caribe).
20102842|Calanopia sewelli n. sp. wird aus dem Seichtwasser um die Gesellschafts-, Marquesas- und Tuamotu-Inseln beschrieben. C. sewelli hat Seitenhaken wie C. thompsoni A. Scott. Das Genital-segment des Weibchens besitzt keinen Ventralfortsatz, die Furka ist asymmetrisch.
20107607|In order to examine the larval stage composition and morphological change during larval development of the Japanese mantis shrimp, Oratosquilla oratoria (De Haan, 1844) (Stomatopoda, Squillidae), sampling surveys using a plankton net with a 50 cm mouth diameter, 170 cm length, and 0.497 mm mesh were conducted in Tokyo Bay, Japan, at 8-30 m depth. Two procedures, slope towing and bottom horizontal towing, were adopted. All eleven larval stages occurred, and larvae in stage III, which is the first pelagic stage, were numerically dominant in the present study. Bottom horizontal towing collected significantly more later stages than slope towing. For slope towing, the estimated density tended to decrease from stage III to the final stage XI, reflecting natural mortality. For bottom horizontal towing, the density apparently increased during the three latest stages, IX to XI. This was probably caused by the transition from pelagic to demersal life. The growth of both carapace length (CL) and total length (TL) per larval stage were best described by a logistic equation. Based on the minimum value of the residual sum of squares in the regression analysis, the relative growth of TL to CL was divided into two phases: early phase, stages I to VIII, and late phase, stages IX to XI. The estimated slope of the regression for the late phase was sigficantly greater than that for the early phase, reflecting relative growth of the abdomen during the late phase. /// Dans le but d'examiner la composition des stades larvaires et les changements morphologiques au cours du dveloppement de la squille japonaise. Oratosquilla oratoria (Stomatopode, Squillidae), des chantillonnages avec un filet  plancton de 50 cm de diamtre d'ouverture, 170 cm de long et 0,497 mm de maille ont t effectus dans la baie de Tokyo, Japon,  8-30 m de profondeur. Deux procds. un trait en pente diagonale et un trait  l'horizontale sur le fond ont t adopts. Les 11 stades larvaires ont tous t trouvs, et les larves en stade III, premier stade plagique, ont t numriquement dominantes. Les traits horizontaux du fond ont collect plus de stades avancs que les traits en pente. Pour les traits en pente, la densit estime tend  diminuer du stade III au dernier stade XI, refltant une mortalit naturelle. Pour les traits sur le fond, la densit semble augmenter durant les trois derniers stades, IX  XI. Ceci est probablement d  la transition d'une vie plagique  dmersale. La croissance de la longueur de la carapace (CL) et de la longueur totale (TL) pour chaque stade larvaire correspond  une quation logistique. Sur la base de la valeur minimum de la somme des carrs des rsidus de l'analyse de rgression, la croissance relative de TL par rapport  CL est divise en deux phases: une premire phase, des stades I  VII et une deuxime phase, stades IX  XI. La pente estime de la droite de rgression est significativement plus leve pour la premire phase, refltant la croissance relative de l'abdomen au cours de la deuxime phase.
20104153|Deux espces de parasites de la famille des Elobiopsidae, Thalassomyces racemosus (Coutire) et T. umbellatus (Boschma), ont t identifies sur trois espces de crevettes appartenant  la famille des Oplophoridae recoltes dans le Pacifique Sud par le USNS "Eltanin" au cours d'une croisire faisant partie du programme amrivain de recherches dans l'Antarctique. Les Thalassomyces ont t observs prcdemment sur deux de ces espces de crevettes, Oplophorus novaezeelandiae de Man et Hymenodora glacialis (Buchholz), alors que la troisime espce, Acanthephyra pelagica, n'a jamais t signale comme tant l'hte de ces parasites. Ces spcimens de Thalassomyces sont les premiers qui ont fait l'objet d'un rapport mentionnant qu'ils ont t trouvs sur des crevettes de la famille des Oplophoridae dans le Pacifique Sub depuis l'unique parasite non identifi signal par Bate (1888: 766) sur un spcimen de Oplophorus gracilirostris A. Milne-Edwards des Iles Fidji mais identifi ensuite comme tant un Thalassomyces umbellatus par Boschma (1959).
20102207|Aporobopyrus curtatus (Richardson, 1904) wird wiederbeschrieben. Diese Art ist ein Schmarotzer von Petrolisthes galathinus (Bosc) in Sdflorida und St. John, Westindien, P. armatus (Gibbes) in Florida, P. marginatus Stimpson auf Barbados und Porcellana sayana (Leach) in Nordcarolina und St. John. Aporobopyrus johannis Nierstrasz & Brender  Brandis, 1929, wird als Synonym von A. curtatus eingestuft. Es wird ferner eine neue, zu einer neuen Gattung gehrende Art, Astalione cruciaria, beschrieben; diese Art parasitiert Clastotoechus vanderhorsti (Schmitt) auf der Insel St. Croix.
20105470|In order to assess the effects of dietary protein level on the bioenergetics of the giant freshwater prawn, Macrobrachium rosenbergii (De Man, 1879), animals were reared under a series of different dietary protein levels, i.e., 20%, 30%, 40%, and 50%, respectively. The prawns fed a 20% protein diet showed a significantly lower food intake and specific growth rate than those fed other diets. Mean ammonia excretion of prawns in the 40% dietary protein group was significantly higher than that of those in the 20 and 30% groups. Standard metabolic rate of the prawns fed 30% dietary protein was significantly lower than that of the prawns fed 20 and 50% dietary protein. Both magnitude and coefficient of the specific dynamic action (SDA) increased significantly with an increase in dietary protein level. /// Afin d'tablir les effets du niveau de protines alimentaires sur la bionergtique de la crevette d'eau douce, Macrobrachium rosenbergii (De Man, 1879), des animaux ont t levs avec des rgimes alimentaires  teneurs diffrentes en protines, soit 20%, 30%, 40% et 50%, respectivement. Les crevettes nourries avec un rgime  20% de protines ont montr une prise de nourriture et un taux de croissance spcifique significativement infrieurs  celles nourries avec les autres rgimes. L'excrtion moyenne d'ammonium des crevettes dans le groupe ayant un rgime  40% de protines, est significativement plus lev que chez les groupes  20 et 30%. Le taux mtabolique standard des crevettes nourries avec un rgime  30% de protines est significativement infrieur  celui des crevettes nourries avec un rgime  20 et 50% de protines. La valeur et le coefficient de l'action dynamique spcifique (SDA) augmentent significativement avec l'augmentation du niveau de protines alimentaires.
20104136|La morphologie du plopode de crabes de la famille des Panopeidae Ortmann sensu Guinot (1978) est examine. La condition trilobe "typique" du genre Panopeus n'est pas vidente chez tous les membres de la famille. Les plopodes de plusieurs espces que Guinot a propos de ranger dans la sous-famille des Eucratopsinae ressemblent davantage  ceux du genre Panopeus et d'autres espces de Panopeinae, qu' ceux des genres d'Eucratopsinae. Il est suggr que la forme du plopode est un caractre plus conservateur que la morphologie de la carapace ou des chlipdes, et que des rvisions ultrieures des Panopeidae sont souhaitables.
20104104|El desarrollo larval de Petrolisthes tonsorius Haig, 1960, un pequeo cangrejo porcelnido del Atlntico, es completamente descrito e ilustrado. Hay un estado de prezoea que dura menos de 2 horas, dos estados de zoea que duran de 4 a 8 das y de 6 a 9 das, respectivamente y un estado de megalopa que dura en promedio hasta 16 das. La duracin exacta de este estado no se conoce. Se establecen comparaciones entre las diferentes etapas correspondientes al desarrollo larval de P. tonsorius, P. armatus del Atlntico y P. tridentatus de la costa del Pacfico, discutindose aquellos caracteres que pueden ser utilizados para la identificacin de las larvas de estas especies.
20102932|The metecdysial (postmolt) period in Orconectes sanborni was divided into a series of stages, and the stages named following Drach (1939). It was shown that not only are stages A and C based on criteria applicable to all crustaceans universally, but stages A and C may also be based on such criteria. Therefore, during the metecdysial period, only stages B, C, and C must be based on criteria that vary with the species. Staining of tle cuticle with iron hematoxylin and eosin was basically the same at all stages. Only the epicuticle changed in staining with Mallory's triple stain and in reaction to the periodic acid Schiff and dihydroxy-dinaphthyl-disulfide tests. In all these, the epicuticle displayed a loss in staining or reactivity between stages A and B. It was found that the following criteria can be used to determine the metecdysial stages: Stage A begins immediately after ecdysis. The body surface is slippery and very soft. Stage A. The integument is tough and parchment-like. Stage B. The carapace begins to feel brittle, but the postorbital ridge and cervical groove can still be bent readily with the finger nail. Stage C. The postorbital ridge and cervical groove are rigid. Stage C. Only the gastric region of the carapace and the areola are less rigid than they will become later. Stage C. The entire carapace has achieved its final state of rigidity. Stage C. The cuticle is complete. The inner, non-calcified membranous layer is now present. No reliable method for recognizing the presence of the membranous layer was found other than the examination of sections. By the use of Alizarin red S to detect calcium in sections of the cuticle, it was shown that the method used by Drach (1939) and Travis (1960) is not reliable in O. sanborni.
20104993|The larval development of the palaemonid prawn, Macrobrachium lanchesteri (De Man) was observed under laboratory conditions. Metamorphosis to post-larva was first observed 30 days after hatching at a temperature of 26-28C and in freshwater. Nine larval stages (Zoea I to Zoea IX) were observed and described. The pattern of development is considered in relation to other Macrobrachium species with similar number of larval stages. In relation to larval developmental mode, M. lanchesteri is most similar to M. niloticum from northern Africa. These are the only species in the genus with the fifth pereiopod appearing as a rudimentary bud in the first larval stage and fully formed by the second or the third stage. The size of the fifth pereiopod is also considerably larger than in other species of the genus at the same stage of development. /// Le dveloppement larvaire de la crevette palmonide Macrobrachium lanchesteri (De Man) a t observ sous les conditions de laboratoire. La mtamorphose en post-larve a t obtenue 30 jours aprs l'closion  la temprature de 26-28C et en eau douce. Neuf stades larvaires (zo I  zo IX) ont t observs et dcrits. Les modalits du dveloppement ont t considres en relation avec les autres espces de Macrobrachium ayant un nombre semblable de stades larvaires. En ce qui concerne le mode de dveloppement, c'est de M. niloticum, d'Afrique du nord, que M. lanchesteri est le plus proche. Ce sont les seules espces du genre dont le cinquime priopode apparat comme un bourgeon rudimentaire au premier stade, puis est compltement form au deuxime ou au troisime stade. La taille de ce cinquime priopode est aussi beaucoup plus grande que chez les autres espces du genre au mme stade de dveloppement.

N. exilis est dcrit sur Mugil cephalus, un nouvel hte; une nouvelle localisation est signale pour N. chevreuxii, son hte chilien est Paralonchurus peruanus. 20104030|Trapezia rufopunctata (Herbst) and T. flavopunctata Eydoux & Souleyet have been reported, mistakenly, as synonyms of a number of allied species and of each other. T. rufopunctata was long confused with T. tigrina Eydoux & Souleyet due to the variability of ornamentation that tended to obscure its striking morphological features. The misidentifications are discussed and descriptions are given for both species.
20107941|We studied copepod assemblages in the northern South China Sea during October 2004. A total of 78 copepod species was identified from 24 families and 42 genera that include the four orders Calanoida, Cyclopoida, Harpacticoida, and Poecilostomatoida. The high copepod diversity in the study area may mainly be caused by both the year-round Kuroshio Current intrusion and the SW monsoon, prevailing in the South China Sea during summer. Water currents in the region transport marine planktonic fauna, that comprises predominantly Copepoda from subtropical and tropical water masses. Calanus sinicus did not appear, indicating that there was no cold water mass intrusion in that area during October 2004. Clausocalanus furcatus and C. arcuicornis were most dominant, occurring in 27 of a total of 28 samples (occurrence rate (OR): 96.43%). Thirteen copepod species were found once in all samples. The three most dominant copepods considering all samples were Clausocalanus furcatus (RA: 15.32%), C. arcuicornis (RA 13.52%), and Paracalanus nanus (RA: 9.28%). Most species of copepods performed a common diel vertical migration, descending during daytime and ascending at night at different rates to different depth zones. There were smaller numbers of species and lower diversity indices in surface waters (1-2 m depth) as compared to depths below 50 m. /// Copepoden Gemeinschaften des nrdlichen Sdchinesischen Meeres waren Gegenstand einer Untersuchung im Oktober 2004. Insgesamt 78 Copepodenarten aus 24 Familien und 42 Gattungen und vier Ordnungen (Calanoida, Cyclopoida, Harpacticoida und Poecilostomatoida) konnten dort bestimmt werden. Die hohe Diversitt im Untersuchungsgebiet wird massgeblich auf den ganzjhrigen Einfluss eines westlichen Zweiges der Kuroshio Strmung und den im Sommer im Schinesischen Meer vorherrschenden Sdwestmonsoon zurckgefhrt. So erzeugte Strmungen bringen marines Plankton in die Region, das von den Copepoda aus subtropischen und tropischen Wassermassen dominiert wird. Calanus sinicus konnte nicht gefunden werden was einen Kaltwassermasseneinfluss in der Region im Oktober 2004 ausschliesst. Clausocalanus furcatus und C. arcuicornis waren dominant, und in 27 von 28 Proben vertreten (Prsenz (OR): 96,43%). Dreizehn Copepodenarten konnten in allen Proben nachgewiesen werden. Die drei in allen Proben vorherrschenden Copepodenarten waren Clausocalanus furcatus (RA: 15,32%), C. arcuicornis (RA: 13,52%), und Paracalanus nanus (RA: 9,28%). Die meisten Copepodenarten zeigten tgliche Vertikalwanderungen, mit einer Wanderung in die Tiefe tagsber und einer gegenlufigen Wanderung nachts, aber artspezifischen Trends. Im Oberflchenwasser (1-2 m Tiefe) konnten geringere Diversitten (Artenzahlen und Diversittsindizes) festgestellt werden als in Tiefen unterhalb 50 m.
20105212|Field experiments compared the chemically-mediated responses of the crayfish Orconectes virilis and O. propinquus to food stimuli, alarm substance, disturbance chemicals and a combination of food and alarm. The combination of alarm and food stimuli resulted in a very marked decrease in the number of O. virilis attending a site compared to the food stimulus alone. There were also differences between the disturbance and alarm responses of O. virilis with individuals spending less time near sources of alarm substance as compared to sources of disturbance chemicals. Individuals of O. propinquus showed no differences in responses to the experimental treatments. Variations in the level of activity were consistent with lunar cycle of activity in O. virilis, with the greatest activity near new moon, and the least near full moon. /// Des expriences sur le terrain ont compar les rponses chimiquement provoques des crevisses Orconectes virilis et O. propinquus aux stimuli alimentaires,  une substance d'alarme, aux agents chimiques perturbants et  une combinaison de nourriture et d'alarme. La combinaison d'alarme et de stimuli alimentaires a provoqu une dcroissance trs marque du nombre d'O. virilis assistant  un site en comparaison avec le stimulus alimentaire seul. Il y a eu aussi des diffrences entre les rponses  la perturbation et  l'alarme d'O. virilis avec les individus passant moins de temps prs des sources de substance d'alarme en comparaison avec les sources d'agents chimiques de perturbation. Les individus d'O. propinquus n'ont pas manifest de diffrences dans les rsponses aux traitements exprimentaux. Les variations dans le niveau d'activit taient en rapport avec le cycle lunaire d'activit chez O. virilis, avec l'activit la plus grande vers la nouvelle lune, la plus faible vers la pleine lune.
20106308|The fatty acid profiles of wild adults and cysts of a population of the fairy shrimp Chirocephalus kerkyrensis from Circeo National Park (central Italy) were analysed at regular time intervals during the water phase of the pond, with the aim of relating eventual differences in fatty acid composition and profile to differences in environmental conditions. Four samplings were performed: at the beginning of adult life, at two intermediate stages, and at the end of the life cycle. The results show that lipid content and profile vary significantly in the samples examined, thus suggesting a relation with the fluctuations in the abiotic environmental variables, which, on their turn, cause variation in food quality and quantity. /// Les profils d'acides gras des adultes et des ufs de dure d'une population de l'anostrac Chirocephalus kerkyrensis, provenant du parc National du Circeo (Italie centrale) ont t analyss  des intervalles de temps rguliers au cours de la phase en eau de la phase en eau de la mare dans le but de dceler d'ventuelles diffrences dans la composition et le profil d'acides gras suivant les conditions de l'environnement. Quatre chantillonnages ont t raliss: au dbut de la vie adulte,  deux stades intermdiaires et  la fin du cycle de vie. Les rsultats montrent que le contenu en lipides et le profil varient significativement dans les chantillons examins, suggrant ainsi une relation avec les fluctuations des variables abiotiques de l'environnement, qui  leur tour, peuvent modifier la qualit et la quantit de la nourriture.
20104855|Spider crabs (family Majidae) often decorate themselves: that is, they put pieces of marine organisms among the hooked setae of the exoskeleton. This behavior can be absent in large crabs or those that live at great depths, on sand or in narrow crevices. Although some species put edible materials on their bodies and later remove and eat them, the majority of the spider crabs decorate themselves to camouflage themselves against predators. A model of the level of decoration is presented, from none at all to complete coverage of the dorsal surface. Important factors that affect the level are the evolutionary state, habitat, size, feeding and particularly the predators of the species of spider crab. /// Cangrejos araas (familia Majidae) frecuentemente se decoran: es decir, ponen piezas de organsmos marinos entre las setas curvadas del exoesqueleto. Este comportamiento puede ser ausente en cangrejos grandes o en aquellos que viven a gran profundidad, en arena o en hendiduras estrechas. Aunque algunas especies ponen materiales comestibles en sus cuerpos y, mas tarde, los remueven y los comen, la mayora de los cangrejos araas se decoran para esconderse contra predadores. Se presenta un modelo del grado de decoracin, de ningn hasta el recubrimiento completo del superficie dorsal. Factores importantes que afectan el grado son el estado de evolucon, hbito, tamao, comida y particularmente los predadores de la especie de cangrejo araa.

La collection comprend une srie complte de quatre stades mles et de cinq stades femelles, qui sont brivement dcrits.

20105696|Caligus epinepheli were collected from De Hoop Nature Reserve along the south coast and from Lake St Lucia along the east coast of South Africa. Caligus rotundigenitalis were collected from Lake St Lucia. Two females, one male, and one chalimus of C. epinepheli were removed from the gill chambers of Diplodus sargus capensis and Rhabdosargus holubi. Only two females of C. rotundigenitalis were removed from inside the operculum of Rhabdosargus holubi. Both species represent new host and distribution records for South Africa. The morphological features of these two species were studied with the aid of scanning electron microscopy. Numerous small setae were observed on the marginal membrane as well as on the dorsal shield of C. epinepheli, probably with a sensory function. Another interesting feature is the long seta near the base of the maxillule, bearing spinules on both margins. All other known Caligus species studied so far have a smooth, long basal seta of the maxillule. In C. rotundigenitalis, the first four spines on the second segment of the exopod of leg 4 are covered with spinules. /// Caligus epinepheli a t collect dans la rserve naturelle De Hoop le long de la cte sud et dans le lac St Lucia le long de la cte est d'Afrique du Sud. Caligus rotundigenitalis a t trouv dans le lac St Lucia. Deux femelles, un mle et un chalimus de C. epinepheli ont t prlevs dans les chambres branchiales de Diplodus sargus capensis et de Rhabdosargus holubi. Seules, deux femelles de C. rotundigenitalis ont t collectes  l'intrieur de l'opercule de Rhabdosargus holubi. Les deux espces reprsentent de nouveaux signalements d'hte et de rpartition pour l'Afrique du Sud. Les caractristiques morphologiques de ces deux espces ont t tudies en microscopie lectronique  balayage. De nombreuses petites soies ont t observes sur la membrane marginale et sur le "bouclier" dorsal de C. epinepheli, ayant probablement une fonction sensorielle. Un autre trait intressant est la longue soie basale de la maxillule portant des spinules sur les deux bords. Toutes les autres espces connues de Caligus tudies jusqu' prsent ont une longue soie basale lisse  la maxillule. Chez C. rotundigenitalis, les quatre premires pines du second segment de l'exopodite de la quatrime patte sont recouvertes de spinules.
23065230|Juveniles of Polyphemus pediculus (Linnaeus, 1761) emerge into the aquatic environment from resting eggs at an earlier stage of development, compared to those that hatch from subitaneous eggs. They become sexually mature after five moults, while individuals originating from subitaneous eggs become mature after four moults. The numbers of moults under both circumstances are strictly stable. Morphometric characteristics, body length, and the ratio of the entire body and its parts change with every moult, but the intensity of these changes is different in individuals originating from different types of eggs. Newborns originating from resting eggs, are larger, but have less setae on antennae I-II and on the third endopodal segments of thoracic limbs I-III. Morphometrically they are closer to sexually mature individuals of Polyphemus exiguus Sars, 1897, than to immature individuals of P. pediculus originating from subitaneous eggs. Their morphometric correspondence to mature individuals of the freshwater form of their own species, P. pediculus is even less. As a consequence, the numbers of setae on the first segments of the endopodites of the thoracic limbs can not be used as a systematic character for the species of the genus Polyphemus. Les juvniles de Polyphemus pediculus (Linnaeus, 1761) mergent dans l'environnement aquatique  partir d'ufs de dure  un stade prcoce de dveloppement par rapport  ceux qui closent d'ufs rcents. Ils deviennent sexuellement matures aprs cinq mues, alors que les individus originaires d'ufs rcents deviennent matures aprs quatre mues. Le nombre de mues dans les deux circonstances est strictement stable. Les caractristiques morphomtriques, la longueur du corps, et la proportion entre le corps et ses diffrentes parties change  chaque mue, mais l'intensit des ces changements est diffrent chez les individus originaires des diffrents types d'ufs. Les nouveaux ns originaires d'ufs de dure sont plus grands, mais ils ont moins de soies sur les antennes I-II et sur le troisime segment endopodal des pattes thoraciques I-III. Morphologiquement, ils sont plus proches des individus sexuellement matures de Polyphemus exiguus Sars, 1897, que des individus immatures de P. pediculus originaires d'ufs rcents. Leur correspondance morphomtrique avec des individus matures de la forme d'eau douce de la mme espce P. pediculus, est encore moindre. En consquence, le nombre de soies sur les premiers segments de l'endopodite des pattes thoraciques ne peut pas tre utilis comme caractre systmatique pour le genre Polyphemus.
20105361|Caprellina longicollis (Nicolet, 1849) is redescribed and figured in detail based on specimens newly collected from Coquimbo, central-northern Chile, which represents the northernmost record of the species. The dominant posture observed for this species in clinging behaviour on its substrate was the "upright posture". The combination of weak swimming setae on antenna 2 and the long gnathopod 2 basis suggests a predatory mode of life. A key to the species of the genus Caprellina is here included. /// Se redescribe e ilustra Caprellina longicollis (Nicolet, 1849) a partir de ejemplares recolectados en Coquimbo, centro-norte de Chile, que representa la cita ms boreal de la especie. La postura dominante observada para esta especie en el comportamiento de sujeccin al sustrato fue la "postura erguida". La combinacin de escasas sedas en la antena 2 y la larga basis del gnatpodo 2 sugieren la predaccin como forma de vida. Se incluye tambin una clave de las especies del gnero Caprellina.
20107924|Cladoceran species abundance, occurrence, and distribution with respect to temperature, salinity, and chlorophyll-a concentration were investigated in an urbanized harbour located at Kepez, Dardanelles from April 2005 to April 2006. Field samplings were performed weekly and environmental parameters were measured in situ. The most common species of the five cladocerans recorded at the study site were Penilia avirostris with 49%, followed by Pleopsis polyphemoides, Pseudevadne tergestina, Evadne nordmanni, and E. spinifera, with 43%, 26%, 14%, and 2%, respectively. Although the cladocerans found at the study site are characteristic species of the Black Sea, the Sea of Marmara, and the northern Aegean Sea, their abundance, timing of occurrence, and maximum densities appear to have changed considerably in comparison with previous reports in the literature. /// L'abondance, la prsence et la rpartition en fonction de la temprature, de la salinit et de la concentration en chlorophylle-a des espces de Cladocres ont t tudies dans un port urbanis situ  Kepez, Dardanelles, d'avril 2005  avril 2006. Les chantillonnages sur le terrain ont t raliss chaque semaine et les paramtres environnementaux mesurs in situ. L'espce la plus commune parmi les Cladocres collects sur le site d'tude tait Penilia avirostris avec 49%, suivie de Pleopsis polyphemoides, Pseudevadne tergestina, Evadne nordmanni et E. spinifera, avec 43%, 26%, 14% et 2%, respectivement. Bien que les Cladocres ainsi trouvs soient des espces caractristiques de la mer Noire, de la mer de Marmara, et du nord de la mer ge, leur abondance, la priode de leur prsence et les densits maximales observes semblent avoir considrablement chang par comparaison aux donnes antrieures trouves dans la littrature.
27822645|In considering the role of the thoracic legs in escape or predation, where rapid starts and quick movement are important, species differences in leg architecture and surface area should be expected. With this in mind, eight species of calanoid copepods were examined to test the hypotheses that thoracic leg surface area was related to organism size and that the amount and/or distribution of leg surface area was related to life strategies of the species. The eight species included herbivores, omnivores, a carnivore, and a detritivore; they also provided a range of body length and volume as well as life styles. All copepods were in the region of Reynolds numbers where drag decreases as Reynolds number increases. Total leg area was significantly correlated to body length and body length squared. While the relationship between total leg area and body length was significant when all species were included, the detritrivore Eucalanus bungii was a clear outlier and the correlation was stronger when it was excluded. The linear relationship between total leg area and body length squared was especially strong for the smaller species. The areas of leg components (protopodite, exopodite, and endopodite) also showed significant correlations with body length squared, with E. bungii again being an outlier. The relative areas of individual leg pairs also showed trends across taxa with the third and fourth legs being larger than the first and second legs in all species except E. bungii. Both body drag and leg propulsion were found to increase with copepod body length. Leg propulsion compared to body drag was high in several species, particularly in Metridia lucens (s.l.), was intermediate in the two smallest species, and was low in E. bungii. En considrant le rle des pattes thoraciques dans la fuite ou la prdation, pour lesquelles des dmarrages et des mouvements rapides sont importants, des diffrences dans l'architecture de la patte et sa surface peuvent tre attendues. Dans cette ide, huit espces de coppodes calanodes ont t examines pour tester l'hypothse que la surface de la patte thoracique est relie  la taille de l'organisme et que la quantit et/ou la distribution de la surface de la patte tait relie aux stratgies de vie de l'espce. Les huit espces incluent des herbivores, omnivores, une carnivore et une dtritivore; elles prsentent des tailles et des volumes varis ainsi que divers styles de vie. Tous les coppodes tudis taient dans la rgion des nombres de Reynolds o le dplacement diminue alors que leur nombre de Reynolds augmente. La surface totale de la patte est significativement corrle  la longueur du corps et  son carr. Alors que la relation entre la surface totale de la patte et la longueur du corps est significative lorsque toutes les espces sont comprises, le dtritivore Eucalanus bungii est clairement extrieur et la correlation est plus forte lorsqu'il est exclu. La relation linaire entre la surface totale des pattes et le carr de la longueur du corps est spcialement forte pour les espces les plus petites. Les surfaces des segments des pattes (protopodite, exopodite, et endopodite) montrent aussi une corrlation significative avec le carr de la longueur du corps, avec de nouveau E. bungii  l'extrieur. La surface relative de chaque paire de pattes montre aussi une tendance dans le taxon avec les troisime et quatrime paires plus larges que les premires et seconde except pour E. bungii. Le trainement du corps et la propulsion des pattes augmente avec la longueur du corps du coppode. La propulsion par les pattes compare au trainement du corps est leve dans plusieurs espces, particulirement chez Metridia lucens (s.l.), intermdiaire chez les deux espces les plus petites et basse chez E. bungii.
20105593|The functional capacities of the subtidal balanomorph cirripede, Austromegabalanus psittacus were investigated, including aerial respiration, survival in emersion, survival in anoxic conditions, and the production of lactate as an anaerobic product. The aerial respiration rate in A. psittacus is high for a subtidal organism: aerial oxygen uptake after 3 h of air exposure at 10C reached values of over 60% of oxygen uptake in submersion. The rate of aerial respiration was independent of ambient temperatures between 10 and 20C, but temperature does affect oxygen uptake in immersion, which increases when temperature rises. 20104594|Der Jahreszyklus von Cyclops strenuus Fischer, 1851, und Eudiaptomus vulgaris Schmeil, 1898, wurde in einem meso- bis eutrophen Tmpel auf der Schwbischen Alb, Baden-Wrttemberg, Sddeutschland untersucht. C. strenuus war von Oktober bis Juni des folgenden Jahres im Freiwasser anzutreffen und bildete whrend dieser Zeit eine Generation. Die durchschnittliche Eizahl pro eitragendes Weibchen lag zwischen 61.0 und 137.0. Im Sommer diapausierte die Art als Copepodid 4. E. vulgaris scheint das ganze Jahr ber das Freiwasser zu bewohnen, obwohl die Individuendichten von Dezember bis Juni sehr gering waren. Von Juni bis November konnten 3 bis 4 Generationen nachgewiesen werden. Die mittlere Eizahl pro eitragendes Weibchen betrug 22.4 bis 59.0. Der Anteil der eitragenden Weibchen lag meist deutlich unter 50%. Die Anzahl der Mnnchen war meist hher als die der Weibchen. Die geringe Abundanz von E. vulgaris im Frhjahr ist vermutlich auf Konkurrenz- und Ruber-Beute Beziehungen zwischen C. strenuus und E. vulgaris bzw. zwischen Fischen und C. strenuus/E. vulgaris zurckzufhren.
20105875|Examination of topotypic (Brazilian) specimens of Hippolyte obliquimanus Dana, 1852, and H. exilirostratus Dana, 1852, shows that the two species are identical and also conspecific with the West Indian H. curacaoensis Schmitt, 1924. The name obliquimanus Dana, 1852 is given precedence over exilirostratus Dana, 1852. The species is redescribed and compared to its East-Pacific counterpart H. williamsi Schmitt, 1924. /// L'examination de spcimens topotypiques (brsiliens) de Hippolyte obliquimanus Dana, 1852 et H. exilirostratus Dana, 1852 montre qu'il s'agit en fait d'une seule et mme espce, laquelle est galement conspcifique avec H. curacaoensis Schmitt, 1924 des Antilles. Le nom obliquimanus Dana, 1852 est choisi comme ayant primaut sur exilirostratus Dana, 1852. L'espce est redcrite et compare  sa proche parente du Pacifique amricain H. williamsi Schmitt, 1924.
20107957|This study describes the relationships of the body length and the population density of the yellowleg shrimp, Farfantepenaeus californiensis (Holmes, 1900) with differences in depth, in two coastal lagoons and on the adjacent continental shelf of the Gulf of California. The Agiabampo and Navachiste lagoon systems are located on the east side of the Gulf of California, bordering the states of Sonora and Sinaloa, Mexico. The environmental conditions of the lagoons are stable, with salinities of 35.5 to 38 psu over an annual cycle. Before sampling, the bathymetry of the lagoons was studied. From December 2001 to January 2003, sampling of shrimp was performed monthly for five consecutive days. The preference of shrimp for a particular depth, according to their size, was examined and the density of shrimp at selected depths was compared. Large differences in body size between the samples at selected depths were found. The density of the shrimp did not correspond with depth, but small shrimp showed greater mean densities. The cues used by species for offshore movement may largely be size-related. Juveniles moved down the estuary and out to sea as they grew. Depth may be involved in the migration of shrimp from lagoons with stable salinity gradients. Migration requires that the shrimp respond to some cue associated with size or to some change in their environment. The conclusion in this study is, that the yellowleg shrimp, F. californiensis responds to differences in depth, depending on its size, which is independent of whether it is inside the lagoon or in an open marine habitat. /// Este estudio describe la relacin de la longitud y la densidad de la poblacin del camarn caf Farfantepenaeus californiensis (Holmes, 1900) con cambios en la profundidad en la laguna y en la plataforma costera adyacente del Golfo del California. Los sistemas lagunares de Agiabampo y Navachiste estn localizadas al este del Golfo de California, al sur del estado de Sonora y norte de Sinaloa, Mxico. Las condiciones ambientales en las lagunas son estables con respecto a la salinidad con valores de 35,5 a 38 ups durante el ciclo anual. De diciembre del 2001 a enero del 2003 se muestreo camarn cada mes por cinco das consecutivos. La preferencia del camarn por algn gradiente de profundidad en la laguna y plataforma costera fue analizada al comparar la longitud media y abundancia en las diferentes profundidades. Diferencias entre la longitud promedio de camarn y las profundidades fueron encontradas. La densidad de camarn no mostr algn patrn con respecto a la profundidad. Sin embargo, las tallas pequeas de camarn se relacionaron a las mayores densidades. El estimulo por el que se mueve hacia la plataforma costera debe estar fuertemente relacionado con las tallas. Los juveniles se mueven a la parte ms profunda de los estuarios y salen al mar conforme ellos crecen. La profundidad puede estar involucrada en los movimientos de camarn en las lagunas con salinidad constante. La migracin requiere que el camarn responda a algn estmulo asociada con talla o algn cambio en el ambiente. La conclusin en este estudio es que el camarn caf F. californiensis exhibe una respuesta a los cambios de profundidad, dependiente de la talla, sin importar si se encuentra al interior de la laguna o en la plataforma costera.
20105846|The female of Acanthocyclops brevispinosus (Herrick, 1884) is redescribed. The male is described for the first time. The male exhibits sexual dimorphism in the habitus, antennule, leg 4 intercoxal plate and endopod, and leg 6. Morphological characters are compared with findings from the literature. Morphologische Merkmale werden mit denen aus der Literatur verglichen. Die Taxonomie von A. brevispinosus wird diskutiert.
20103747|Pseudozeuxo belizensis sp. n., gen. n. is described from Carrie Bow Cay, Belize (Carribbean Sea). Discussion of its phylogenetic relationships shows that this taxon has to be placed in a separate family, Pseudozeuxidae fam. n., which is considered a "connecting link" between the Tanaidae and Paratanaidae. This opinion is mainly based on the structure of the mouthparts in the male.
20102316|The evolution of the Copepoda is characterized by decrease in size. Neotenic regression, contributing also to the diminution in size, has conferred a selective advantage and has consequently exercised an important influence on the constitution and on the morphology of present day Copepoda. The maximum effect of the neotenic regressive factor, reductions in the number of developmental stages and regression in general, have led to the formation of parasitic Copepods, whilst the most minute forms have given rise to the phreatobionts. The end products of the two series of extreme evolution have in common the loss of the habits of the ancestral forms.
20105746|In recent collections from deep waters around Taiwan, numerous new records of brachyuran crabs were obtained for Taiwan. Thirty-one species are added to the known Taiwanese brachyuran fauna, including 13 new records of genera and two new records of families (Homolodromiidae and Cymonomidae). The established brachyuran crab fauna for Taiwan now stands at 604 species. /// Au cours de collectes rcentes dans les eaux profondes autour de Taiwan, de nombreux signalements nouveaux de crabes Brachyoures ont t obtenus. Trente et une espces sont ainsi ajoutes  la faune connue des Brachyoures de Taiwan, incluant 13 nouvelles citations de genres et deux nouvelles citations de familles (Homolodromiidae et Cymonomidae). La faune des Brachyoures de Taiwan s'lve maintenant  604 espces.

20104964|Florida Bay is the major nursery for the Caribbean spiny lobster, Panulirus argus, population in south Florida. This region is characterized by a series of shallow hardbottom or seagrass-covered basins separated by carbonate mudbanks that serve as barriers to water circulation and presumably to transport of planktonic larvae. Temperatures fluctuate dramatically in the bay and salinities there range from 35 ppt-50 ppt. In this study, we investigated the physiological tolerance of P. argus postlarvae to various combinations of temperature and salinity representative of the conditions found in Florida Bay and also determined the extent of postlarval recruitment into the interior of the bay. We measured postlarval settlement, juvenile abundances, and postsettlement habitat availability monthly (March 1992-July 1992) along 5 transects extending north from the main Florida Keys into the interior of Florida Bay. Concurrently, P. argus postlarvae were reared in the laboratory, in a completely crossed design, at four temperatures (18C, 22C, 29C and 33C) and four salinities (25, 35, 45 and 50 ppt). Survival, time-to-metamorphosis, and growth to the first juvenile stage were measured. Few postlarvae settled at sites beyond the emergent banks ringing Florida Bay, and lobsters were only found in one basin (Twin Keys Basin) where habitat and environmental conditions were favorable. Laboratory results indicate that at high (33C) and low temperatures (18C) survival at salinities other than 35 ppt is greatly reduced. Our results indicate that postlarvae are not regularly transported into the interior of Florida Bay and that the lack of suitable nursery habitat and high salinity further limit recruitment, especially at extreme temperatures. Given the present conditions in Florida Bay, recruitment of P. argus is restricted to the southernmost reaches of Florida Bay nearest the Florida Keys. /// La baie de Floride est la principale nursery pour la population carabe de la langouste Panulirus argus en Floride du Sud. Cette rgion est caractrise par une srie de bassins peu profonds  fond dur ou couvert d'algues, spars par des bancs de vase carbonate qui servent de barrire  la circulation de l'eau et, suppose-t-on, au transport des larves planctoniques. Les tempratures fluctuent de faon spectaculaire dans la baie et les salinits vont de 35 ppt  50 ppt. Au cours de cette tude, nous avons test la tolrance physiologique des postlarves de P. argus  diffrentes combinaisons de temprature et salinit, reprsentatives des conditions observes dans la baie de Floride, et aussi dtermin l'importance du recrutement postlarvaire  l'intrieur de la baie. Nous avons mesur chaque mois (mars 1992-juillet 1992) la sdentarisation postlarvaire, les abondances de juvniles et la disponibilit des habitats de post-sdentarisation le long de 5 transects s'tendant du nord des principales Florida Keys jusqu' l'intrieur de la baie de Floride. Simultanment, des postlarves de P. argus taient leves au laboratoire, sous les combinaisons compltes de 4 tempratures (18C, 22C, 29C et 33C) et de 4 salinits (25, 35, 45 et 50 ppt). La survie, le temps jusqu' la mtamorphose et la croissance jusqu'au premier stade juvnile ont t mesurs. Peu de postlarves se sont sdentarises  des endroits situs au-del des bancs mergs entourant la Baie de Floride, et les langoustes ont t trouves dans un seul bassin (Twin Keys Basin) o l'habitat et les conditions d'environnement taient favorables. Les rsultats en laboratoire indiquent que,  haute (33C) et basse (18C) tempratures, la survie  des salinits autres que 35 ppt tait fortement rduite. Nos rsultats indiquent que les postlarves ne sont pas rgulirement transportes vers l'intrieur de la baie de Floride et que le manque d'un habitat de nursery appropri ainsi qu'une salinit leve limitent davantage le recrutement, en particulier aux tempratures extrmes. Etant donn les conditions actuelles dans la baie de Floride, le recrutement de P. argus est restreint aux approches les plus mridionales de la baie de Floride, au plus prs des Florida keys.
20107855|The anostracan, Chirocephalus diaphanus Prvost, 1803 presents variation in the timing of hatching, since embryos can fall free of the shell and remain in a quiescent state in a small cocoon formed by the hatching membrane. The co-occurrence of free-swimming and quiescent nauplii in a spring hatching was investigated by comparing the cyst behaviour of two local populations colonizing a short- and a long-lived mountain pool. In each pool, a constant number of ovigerous females was collected at the beginning and end of their life cycle. Immediately after deposition, the cysts were removed, counted, and subsequently stored in the laboratory for hatching tests. There were significant differences between the two biotopes in the frequency of pre-hatched nauplii. This confirms the ecological importance of the state of suspended development referred to as quiescence, suggesting that it plays a fundamental role in microevolutionary processes in Anostraca. /// La specie Chirocephalus diaphanus Prvost, 1803 (Anostraca) produce uova durature (cisti) caratterizzate da una spiccata variabilit di schiusa dovuta alla comparsa ed alla persistenza di embrioni che non schiudono immediatamente ma rimangono all'interno della membrana che li avvolge in uno stato di quiescenza. Tale meccanismo di schiusa ritardata  stato osservato in laboratorio confrontando la reattivit delle cisti prodotte da due popolazioni naturali di C. diaphanus d'alta quota caratterizzate da un diverso ciclo idrologico. In ciascun bacino sono state raccolte le covate di un campione costante di femmine mature all'inizio ed al termine del loro ciclo vitale. Immediatamente dopo la deposizione, le cisti sono state raccolte, contate e successivamente sottoposte ai tests di schiusa. Le differenze statisticamente significative rilevate fra le percentuali di embrioni quiescenti osservate nei due biotopi confermano l'importanza adattativa delle prime fasi di schiusa. Le uova durature prodotte dai Crostacei Anostraci giocherebbero infatti un ruolo fondamentale nei processi microevolutivi delle popolazioni locali.

29779493|Based on an analysis of the sexual characters of 538 specimens of Parastacus pugnax captured in a population located on the southern limit of its geographical range, Rudolph (1997) characterized the sexual system of this species as gonochorism with permanent intersexuality. In the present contribution, the sexual characters of Parastacus pugnax are examined for the first time in six populations of central-southern Chile, in an effort to verify whether this intersexuality also occurs in these populations. No differences in the Parastacus pugnax genitalia were observed between the populations studied, with the exception of two populations where one individual with an ootestis was detected. The occurrence of male and female gonopores was observed in all specimens examined (N = 235). Nevertheless, through a comparison of different types of male gonopore morphology, and another comparison of different types of female gonopore morphology, two intersex morphs were distinguished. Morph 1 specimens (N = 186; 79.1%; size range 14.7-55.7 mm CL) present highly calcified, sealed, semi-ellipsoidal female gonopores and, in larger specimens, prominent phallic papillae with male gonopores open to the exterior. In contrast, morph 2 specimens (N = 49; 20.9%; size range 24.3-54.1 mm CL) have non-calcified, or partially calcified ellipsoidal female gonopores, with an opening close to their internal border, and scarcely prominent phallic papillae with the male gonopores closed. Dissection enabled us to verify the simultaneous presence of oviducts and sperm ducts, which, in 233 specimens (99.1%) connected only one gonad (ovary or testis) to the respective gonopore. In the remaining two specimens (0.9%), the gonoducts were connected to an ootestis. These dissections, together with histological analyses of the gonads, enabled us to distinguish three types of intersexes: with testis (male), with ovary (female), and with ootestis. No trace of degenerating ovarian or testicular tissue was found in the ootestis. We also verified that all morph 2 specimens are intersex females, with higher abdominal pleura than those on the abdomens of the intersex males. The evidence gathered confirms the permanent intersexuality of Parastacus pugnax. Nevertheless, the discovery of two specimens with an ootestis indicates that new studies are required to examine a larger sample, taken from either the same, or other populations, over a period of one year, that should include an analysis of environmental parameters. Finally, we comment on the present state of knowledge with regard to the sexuality of the species of Parastacus. En base al anlisis de los caracteres sexuales de 538 especmenes de Parastacus pugnax, capturados en una poblacin ubicada en el lmite sur de su rango geogrfico, Rudolph (1997) caracteriz el sistema sexual de esta especie como gonocorismo con intersexualidad permanente. En esta contribucin se examinan por primera vez los caracteres sexuales de Parastacus pugnax en seis poblaciones del centro sur de Chile, en un esfuerzo por verificar si esta intersexualidad tambin ocurre en ellas. No se encontraron diferencias en la genitalia de Parastacus pugnax entre las poblaciones en estudio, excepto en dos de ellas en las que se encontr un individuo con ovotestis. En todos los especmenes (N = 235) se observ la ocurrencia de gonoporos de macho y de hembra. Sin embargo, al comparar la morfologa de los gonoporos de uno y otro sexo entre si, se distinguieron dos morfos intersexuados. Los especmenes del morfo 1 (N = 186; 79,1%; rango de tallas 14,7-55,7 mm LCT) presentan gonoporos de hembra de aspecto semi-elipsoidal, muy calcificados, sellados, y en aquellos de mayores tallas papilas flicas prominentes con gonoporos de machos abiertos al exterior. En cambio, los especmenes del morfo 2 (N = 49; 20,9%; rango de tallas 23,4-54,1 mm LCT) tienen gonoporos de hembra elipsoidales, no calcificados o parcialmente calcificados, con una abertura prxima a su borde interno, papilas flicas poco prominentes con gonoporos de macho cerrados. Las disecciones permitieron comprobar la presencia simultnea de oviductos y espermiductos, los que en 233 especmenes (99,1%) conectaban una gnada nica  ovario o testculo  a los respectivos gonoporos. En los otros dos (0,9%), los gonoductos se conectaban a un ovotestis. Estas disecciones junto con los anlisis histolgicos de las gnadas permitieron distinguir tres tipos de intersexos: con testculo (machos), con ovario (hembras) y con ovotestis. En los ovotestis no se encontraron evidencias de tejido ovrico o testicular en degeneracin. Tambin se comprob que todos los especmenes del morfo 2, son hembras intersexo cuyos abdmenes poseen pleuras ms altas que aquellas existentes en el abdomen de los machos intersexo. Las evidencias reunidas ratifican la intersexualidad permanente de Parastacus pugnax. Sin embargo, el hallazgo de dos especmenes con ovotestis hace necesario nuevos estudios que examinen muestras ms grandes, tomadas durante un ao en estas u otras poblaciones, en las que tambin se deberan analizar los parmetros medioambientales. Finalmente, comentamos el estado actual de conocimiento de la sexualidad de las especies de Parastacus.

Ces spcimens ne peuvent tre rapports au genre Pontonia Latreille et un nouveau genre Platypontonia a t tabli pour eux. L'identit de l'hte est discute. Les caractres qui sparent Platypontonia des autres genres indo-pacifiques connus comme vivant dans des Mollusques bivalves sont donns et les diffrences entre le nouveau genre, et Pontonia et Platycaris Holthuis, auxquels il ressemble morphologiquement, sont exposes sous la forme d'un tableau.
20102794|This paper deals with interesting discoveries of Copepoda from Alpine moss-biotopes in Bulgaria. The taxonomic relationships and geographical distribution of a group of closely related species within the subgenus Arcticocamptus are discussed briefly.
20105535|This paper gives the first full description of the pulli stages of Telotha henselii, and reports both novel locations and novel hosts for this species. These isopods were found on the gills of various catfish (Pimelodella laticeps, Pimelodus clarias, and Rhamdia quelen), on a killifish (Cynolebias prognathus), and on a cichlid (Gymnogeophagus sp.) from the department of Rocha, Uruguay (1977-1996), as well as on a shrimp (Palaemonetes argentinus) from the province of Entre Ros, Argentina (1996). Sampling took place in spring, summer, and autumn; adults were found in all samples, whereas the early stage pulli I and II were found only in summer. One or two specimens were found on each host, and in the latter case there was only one specimen per gill chamber. Female parasites were more abundant than males. In gill chambers infected by T. henselii no other metazoan parasites were found, and extensive haemorrhages were observed in both the branchial arches and the filaments. The highest diversity in hosts of T. henselii has been found in southern Brazil and in Uruguay, where at least 10 different genera have been recorded; this ecological pattern of association might be explained by the process of co-accomodation. /// Este artculo prove la primera descripcin completa de los estadios pulli de Telotha henselii, y reporta tanto nuevas localidades como nuevos hospedadores para esta especie. Los ispodos fueron encontrados en branquias de diversos bagres (Pimelodella laticeps, Pimelodus clarias y Rhamdia quelen), en un pez anual (Cynolebias prognathus) y en un cclido (Gymnogeophagus sp.) del Departmento de Rocha, Uruguay (1977-1996), y en un camarn (Palaemonetes argentinus) de la Provincia de Entre Ros, Argentina (1996). El muestreo se llev a cabo en primavera, verano y otoo; se encontraron adultos en todas las muestras, mientras que los estadios tempranos pullus I y II slo fueron hallados en verano. Se encontraron de uno a dos especmenes por hospedador, y en este ltimo caso slo hubo un especimen por cmara branquial. Entre los parsitos, las hembras fueron ms abundantes que los machos. En las cmaras branquiales infectadas por T. henselli no se encontraron otros metazoos parsitos, y se observaron hemorragias extensas tanto en arcos como en filamentos branquiales. La mayor diversidad de hospedadores de T. henselii se ha encontrado en el sur de Brasil y en Uruguay, donde se han reportado por lo menos diez gneros diferentes; este patrn ecolgico de asociacin podra explicarse por el proceso de coacomodacin.

27743400|Although endogenous rhythms such as diel and tidal effects can influence the distribution of sandy beach amphipods, the consequences of these for the seasonal endogenous rhythms of amphipods within the subtidal surf zone of sandy beaches are little understood. We examined the seasonal variation in diel adn tidal effects among benthic amphipods with different lifestyles in a sandy shore surf zone in southern Korea. Using a sledge net, quantitative were taken for 24 h at three stations: at the bottom and surface at a water depth of 1 m, and at the water's edge. The epifaunal, nestling amphipods, Pontogeneia rostrata Gurjanova, 1938 and Allorchestes angusta Dana, 1856 and the burrower, Haustorioides koreanus Jo, 1988 were significantly more abundant at the surface at night than during the day, suggesting nocturnal vertical migration. However, the abundance of the burrower, Synchelidium lenorostralum Hirayama, 1986 did not change between day and night, suggesting that this species did not perform vertical migrations. Most of the amphipods, particularly P. rostrata, showed a seasonally different response to tidal effects, appearing at higher densities during ebbing than flooding tides in one or more seasons, and depending on the species. Amphipods increased in abundance at night regardless of seasonal tidal variation, suggesting that the diel effect may be more important than the tidal effect. Seasonal variation to diel and tidal effects by these amphipods varied with temperature and different lifestyles. /// avec diffrents styles de vie dans la zone de ressac d'une plage sableuse au sud de la Core. A l'aide d'un filet tranant des chantillons quantitatifs d'amphipodes ont t prlevs pendant 24 h  3 stations: au fond et  la surface d'une hauteur d'eau de 1 m, et au bord de l'eau. Les amphipodes pifaunaux Pontogeneia rostrata Gurjanova, 1938 et Allorchestes angusta Dana, 1856, et le fouisseur, Haustorioides koreanus Jo, 1988 ont t significativement plus abondants  la surface, la nuit que durant le jour, suggrant une migration verticale nocturne. Cependant, l'abondance du fouisseur Synchelidium lenorostralum Hirayama, 1986, n'a pas chang entre le jour et la nuit suggrant que cette espce n'effectue pas de migrations verticales. La plupart des amphipodes, en particulier P. rostrata ont montr des rponses saisonnires diffrentes aux effets de la mare, apparaissant en plus forte densit pendant le reflux qu' mare montante, durant une ou plusierus saisons et dpendant de l'espce. Les Amphipodes augmentent en abondance la nuit, indpendamment des variations saisonnires des mares, suggrant que l'effet journalier est plus important que l'effet de la mare. Les effects des variations saisonnires journalires at tidals sur ces amphipodes varient avec la temprature et leurs diffrents styles de vie.

20105833|Pisidia longicornis is a small anomuran crab that constitutes the dominant component of the epifauna of mussel rafts in the Ra de Arousa (NW Spain). This species forms isolated postlarval populations on the ropes used in the culture, experiencing a wide range of environmental conditions, both spatially and seasonally. This paper studies the fecundity (egg size and number per brood) of P. longicornis in the inner and outer areas of the ra at 5 and 10 m depth over a yearly cycle. The fecundity of this species is highly variable (ranging from 10 to over 1443 eggs per brood), and it is primarily determined by carapace width, CW (P &lt 0.05 for most of the samples, with slopes of the allometric relation ranging between 2.38 and 4.48, and &gt 3 in most of cases). Spatial differences were due partially to changes in body size; in the outer area (mean CW 4.9 mm), the number of eggs per brood was 265  225 (mean  SD), and in the inner area with larger specimens (mean CW 6.1 mm), fecundity was higher (600  373 eggs). Egg volume in the outer station (0.025 mm  0.005) was higher than in the inner station (0.023 mm  0.005) and slightly larger at 10 m deep (0.025 mm  0.005) than at 5 m (0.023 mm  0.004). In the outer ra area, where the food availability, density and growth are higher, the reproductive output (defined as number of eggs  egg size) corrected for body size, was higher than in the inner station. Both parameters related to reproductive output exhibited significant temporal variability. During the main breeding period there was an increase in number of eggs per brood and a decrease in egg volume from January to March-April. This seasonal change in the reproductive strategy is associated with the increase in planktonic production in spring. P. longicornis shows a great plasticity in reproductive output, both seasonally (within a population) as well as spatially (between populations), that is hypothesized as an adaptative strategy to the spatial and temporal variations in the environment, and especially food abundance for planktonic larvae. /// El pequeo anomuro Pisidia longicornis es el principal componente de la epifauna asociada al cultivo de mejilln en batea en la Ra de Arousa (NW Espaa). Esta especie forma poblaciones post-larvarias aisladas sobre las cuerdas empleadas para el cultivo, soportando un amplio rango de condiciones ambientales, tanto espacial como estacionalmente. El presente trabajo estudia la fecundidad (tamao de huevo y nmero de huevos por puesta) de Pisidia longicornis en la zona externa e interna de la ra a 5 y 10 m de profundidad y durante un ciclo anual. La fecundidad de esta especie es altamente variable (oscilando entre 10 y 1443 el nmero de huevos por puesta) y se encuentra determinada principalmente por la anchura del caparazn, AC (P &lt 0.05 para la mayora de las muestras, con pendientes para la relacin alomtrica que oscilan entre 2.38 y 4.48, y &gt 3 en la mayor parte de los casos). Las diferencias espaciales fueron debidas en parte a variaciones en la talla; en la zona externa (AC media 4.9 mm), el nmero de huevos por puesta fue de 265  225 (media  DT), y en la zona interna con ejemplares de mayor tamao (AC media 6.1 mm), la fecundidad fue superior (600  373 huevos). El volumen del huevo en la estacin externa (0.025 mm  0.005) fue ms elevado que en la estacin interna (0.023 mm  0.005) y ligeramente superior a 10 m de profundidad (0.025 mm  0.005) que a 5 m (0.023 mm  0.004). En la zona externa de la ra, donde la disponibilidad de alimento, la densidad y el crecimiento son mayores que en la estacin interna, el potencial reproductivo (definido como nmero de huevos  tamao huevo) corregido por la talla, fue superior que en la estacin interna. Ambos parmetros relacionados con el potencial reproductivo mostraron una variabilidad espacial significativa. Durante el principal perodo de cra se observ un incremento en el nmero de huevos por puesta y un descenso en el volumen desde enero hasta marzo-abril. Este cambio estacional en la estrategia reproductiva est asociada con el incremento en la produccin planctnica en primavera. P. longicornis muestra una gran plasticidad en el potencial reproductivo, tanto estacional (dentro de una poblacin) como espacialmente (entre poblaciones), plantendose la hiptesis de que es una estrategia adaptativa a las variaciones espaciales y temporales en el ambiente, y en especial a la abundancia de alimento para las larvas planctnicas.
20103944|Les larves du cirripde pdoncul, Pollicipes polymerus Sowerby, tendent plutt  se fixer aux pdoncules de leurs congnres qui forment des agrgats distinctifs. Des observations sur le terrain et en laboratoire montrent que les juvniles ne sont par rpartis au hasard sur les adultes. Au contraire, il existe un gradient de tailles: les plus petits et les plus nombreux sont en position immdiatement adjacente aux capitula, et les plus gros et les moins nombreux sont situs  la base, prs des disques de fixation. Ce schma de rpartition peut en partie s'expliquer par le mode de croissance naturelle du pdoncule adulte, la nouvelle cuticule tant secrte juste en dessous du capitulum. Les jeunes seraient alors passivement achemins jusqu'au bas du pdoncule pendant que l'adulte grandit. Par la suite, les jeunes se dtachent des adultes et se fixent dans l'aggrgat en insrant leurs pdoncules parmi les adultes se trouvant  proximit. On considre comme tabli le fait qu'une haute pression hydrostatique interne est utilise pour faire descendre de force les disques autonomes, lorsque ces derniers cherchent de nouvelles zones de fixation sur le substrat rocheux.
20103361|Se hicieron colecciones de Macrobrachium ohione por medio de trampas y redes en el rio Atchafalaya en Louisiana desde Septiembre de 1973 hasta Julio de 1975.
