20105991|The barnacle Semibalanus cariosus lives between the middle region of the intertidal zone and a line just below the low water level of spring tides. Factors affecting its daily activity were investigated. In the field, few individuals engaged in active cirral beating in the daytime, but many did so at night, thus indicating that daily activity was photoperiodic. In the laboratory, they showed similar periodicity under natural light conditions. While many individuals continued to engage in this activity under dark conditions, few did so under white light during the day. Under artificial dark conditions during the daytime, the number of active individuals increased gradually, but decreased rapidly when they were exposed to white light at night. These results strongly suggest that the activity is directly affected by light. The ecological significance of engaging in this activity at night is discussed. /// La balane Semibalanus cariosus vit entre la rgion moyenne de la zone intertidale et une ligne situe juste sous le niveau infrieur des mares de vives eaux. Les facteurs affectant son activit journalire ont t tudis. Sur le terrain, peu d'individus sont engags dans d'actifs battements de cirres pendant le jour, mais beaucoup le font la nuit, ce qui indique une activit journalire photopriodique. En laboratoire, on constate la mme priodicit dans les conditions d'clairement naturelles. Tandis que beaucoup d'individus continuent cette activit dans les conditions d'obscurit, peu le font sous une lumire blanche pendant le jour. Sous des conditions artificielles d'obscurit pendant le jour, le nombre des individus actifs augmente graduellement, mais dcrot rapidement quand ils sont expos  la lumire blanche  la nuit. Ces rsultats suggrent fortement que l'activit est directement affecte par la lumire. La signification cologique de l'entre en activit  la nuit est discute.
20107551|Based on specimens collected from the Japan Sea, all copepodid stages of the mesopelagic copepod, Gaetanus variabilis are described and illustrated. Among the family Aetideidae, the development of the body segmentation and the segmentation of the swimming legs in G. variabilis is more similar to that in Gaetanus kruppii than to that in Aetideopsis armata, Chiridius gracilis, or Euchirella messinensis. A sharp, spine-like crest on the frontal dorsal surface of the cephalothorax is a characteristic feature of copepodid stages II-IV of G. variabilis. This frontal crest of G. variabilis, lost in copepodid stages V-VI, is considered as "convergent morphology", relative to G. kruppii. Nucleotide sequences of the mitochondrial 16S rRNA gene confirmed that copepodid stages II and III with frontal crest and copepodid stage VI without frontal crest are the same species: Gaetanus variabilis. In the adult male, the mandible, maxillule, and maxilla degenerate, whence no feeding takes place: a phenomenon commonly seen in aetideid copepods. /// A partir de specimens recolts dans la mer du Japon, tous les stades coppodites du coppode mso-plagique Gaetanus variabilis sont dcrits et illustrs. Parmi la famille des Aetideidae, le dveloppement de la segmentation corporelle et de la segmentation des pattes natatoires chez G. variabilis est plus semblable  ceux de Gaetanus kruppi qu' ceux de Aetideopsis armata, Chiridius gracilis ou Euchirella messinensis. Une pine acre en forme de crte sur la surface dorsofrontale du cphalothorax est caractristique des stades coppodites II-IV chez G. variabilis. Cette crte frontale, perdue chez les stades coppodites V-VI, est considre comme une "convergence morphologique" avec G. kruppi. La squence des nuclotides du gne mitochondrial 16S rRNA confirme que les stades coppodites II et III avec crte frontale et le stade coppodite VI sans crte frontale sont de la mme espce: Gaetanus variabilis. Chez les mles adultes, les mandibules, maxillules et maxilles dgnrent, d'o une absence d'alimentation, un phnomne communment observ chez les coppodes Aetidids.
20106180|The talitrid amphipod Talitrus saltator has a wide distribution along European Atlantic and Mediterranean sandy shores. Previous research had estimated genetic differences among populations with iso-enzyme electrophoresis, as well as differences in behavioural adaptation related to ecological features. In this study morphometric differences among four Mediterranean (Italian coasts) and three Atlantic (Portuguese and Welsh coasts) populations were estimated, which may give information on population dynamics and adaptability to environmental constraints. The localities chosen differed with regard to the following characteristics: sheltered/exposed shorelines, tidal/non-tidal shores, presence/absence of detritus, Atlantic/Mediterranean climate, high/low human frequentation. Samples of each population were collected in a standardized way and fresh individuals were weighed, their body lengths and eye diameters were measured, and the number of eggs in the female brood-pouches and the articles of each antenna were counted. The results were as follows: (i) an unbalanced sex ratio in each population studied, females being more abundant than males; (ii) significant differences between Mediterranean and Atlantic population groups as to weight and body length distributions, the Atlantic talitrids being larger than the Mediterranean ones; (iii) differences in eye colour, normally black in this species, but one Mediterranean and two Atlantic populations presented a certain proportion of blue-eyed individuals; (iv) right-left asymmetry of eye surface areas (right eye bigger than left one) in all populations, with one exception. The differences found among populations do not seem to follow a geographic cline, but could depend on ecological features of the localities. /// L'amphipode talitride Talitrus saltator a une large distribution le long des ctes sableuses de l'Atlantique europen et de la Mditerrane. Des recherches antrieures ont valu les diffrences gntiques parmi les populations par lectrophorse iso-enzymatique, ainsi que les diffrences de comportement adaptatif en relation avec les facteurs de l'environnement. Dans cette tude, les diffrences morphomtriques parmi quatre populations mditerranennes (ctes italiennes) et trois populations atlantiques (ctes portugaises et galoises) ont t values, ce qui peut donner des informations sur les dynamiques de population et sur l'adaptabilit aux contraintes de l'environnement. Les localits choisies diffrent en ce qui concerne les caractristiques suivantes: lignes ctires abrites/exposes, ctes  mare ou non, prsence/absence de dtritus, climat atlantique/mditerranen, haute/basse frquentation humaine. Les chantillons de chaque population ont t prlevs suivant un mme standard et les individus frais ont t pess, la longueur du corps et le diamtre de l'oeil mesurs, le nombre d'oeufs dans la poche incubatrice et les articles de chaque antenne compts. Les rsultats ont t les suivants: (i) une sex ratio non quilibre dans toutes les populations tudies, les femelles tant plus nombreuses que les mles; (ii) des diffrences significatives entre les groupes de populations atlantiques et mditerranens, quant  la distribution des poids et des longueurs du corps, les individus atlantiques tant plus grands que les mditerranens; (iii) des diffrences dans la couleur de l'oeil, normalement noir chez cette espce, mais une population de l'Atlantique et deux de Mditerrane prsentaient une certaine proportion d'individus  yeux bleus; (iv) une asymtrie droite-gauche de la surface de l'oeil (oeil droit plus gros que le gauche) dans toutes les populations, avec une exception. Les diffrences observes entre les populations ne semblent pas suivre un gradient gographique, mais pourraient dpendre des caractristiques cologiques des localits.
20105422|(1) A recently found copy of the Crustacea text of the "Voyage au Ple Sud et dans l'Ocanie", which probably was never published as such, shows that H. Lucas actually wrote the original text. Before publication, however, some changes were made in the title and on pp. 3 and 4, by which several of the new species were assigned to other authors; these authors now, of course, have to be accepted for those species. (2) The correct year of publication of the Crustacea text is 1853. (3) The new species figured on the plates that were issued before 1853 have as authors Hombron & Jacquinot, as those two authors are the only ones cited with the original publication of the species. /// (1) La dcouverte rcente d'une copie du texte sur les Crustacs du "Voyage au Ple Sud et dans l'Ocanie" qui n'a probablement jamais t publie en l'tat, montre que H. Lucas a bien crit le texte original. Cependant, avant publication, certains changements ont t faits dans le titre et aux pages 3 et 4, changements par lesquels plusieurs espces nouvelles taient le fait d'autres auteurs; bien-entendu, ces auteurs doivent maintenant tre accepts pour ces espces. (2) L'anne correcte de publication du texte sur les Crustacs est 1853. (3) Les espces nouvelles figures sur les planches qui ont t publies avant 1853 ont comme auteurs Hombron & Jacquinot, puisque ces deux auteurs sont les seuls cits dans la publication originale de ces espces.
20104388|Two kinds of paired organs, the Y-organ and the mandibular organ, are described in the crab Pachygrapsus marmoratus. The former is located laterally in the cephalothorax while the latter is located near the median line of the body on both side of the ventral nerve cord. The Y-organ consists of one type of cells in which no structure characteristic of steroid secretion is visible. However, increased mitotic activity occurs in this gland during the premolt. The cells of the mandibular organ show a large nucleus, a Golgi apparatus, a copious, smooth endoplasmic reticulum and particularly numerous cup-shaped mitochondria. The ultrastructure of the mandibular organ closely resembles that of cells known to synthesize steroids and also that of oenocytes and particularly the corpus allatum of insects.
20102319|Cinq Cirripdes Pdonculs du Pacifique occidental sont dcrits dans cet article. Pour trois d'entre eux, il s'agit de localits nouvelles, et les deux autres sont des formes nouvelles. Les trois espces provenant de localits nouvelles sont redcrites parce que chacune possde plusieurs synonymies sur lesquelles certains auteurs ne sont pas d'accord ou parce que les premires descriptions ne correspondent pas exactement aux formes considres ici. Ces espces sont: Ibla cumingi sibogae (Hoek, 1907) et Octolasmis cor (Aurivillius, 1892), toutes deux de Truk, Iles Carolines, et Octolasmis lowei (Darwin, 1851) de l'atoll Kapingamarangi, Iles Carolines. Les formes nouvelles sont: Paralepas palinuri urae subsp. nov. de Kapingamarangi, et Heteralepas utinomii sp. nov. des eaux profondes au large de la cte est de Tasmanie. La population intercotidale d'Ibla cumingi sibogae  Truk est une extension de la distribution connue de l'espce de quelque deux mille kilomtres vers l'est. Elle constitue aussi la premire capture de la sous-espce  l'est des eaux indonsiennes. Octolasmis cor a t signale par de nombreux auteurs sur les branchies du crabe de Mangrove Scylla serrata,  travers l'Indo-Pacifique. Les sries de croissance dcrites ici font apparatre des changements considrables dans la configuration des plaques capitulaires et dans l'ornementation capitulo-pdonculaire, encore que les pices buccales et la chaetotaxie prsentent une constance de forme marque. Beaucoup d'espces de ce genre, aujourd'hui considres comme synonymes d'O. cor par certains auteurs, ont t caractrises dans les descriptions originales par la forme de plaques et par l'ornementation, non par les appendices. Ainsi, presque toutes les formes dans la srie "cor" (celles o les terga manquent) doivent tre rexamines. Octolasmis lowei n'avait pas t, jusqu' prsent, signal sur Parribacus antarcticus. Paralepas palinuri n'tait connu que des eaux sud-africaines et Heteralepas utinomii est considre comme la plus mridionale connue des espces de la famille.
20102335|The taxonomy and biology of the Lamippidae, Copepod endoparasites of Octocorals, are still imperfectly known. Thanks to the material obtained during a visit to the Laboratoire Arago, Banyuls-sur-Mer, it is now possible to give a revision of the Mediterranean forms, to redefine the genera Lamippe Bruzelius, Enalcyonium Olsson and Linaresia de Zulueta, and to establish two new genera: Lamippina and Lamippella. Most of the species previously referred to the genus Lamippe are now placed in Enalcyonium. The first note contains general considerations on the group, an account of the methods adopted in this study, a table of the recognized morphological characters and a dichotomous key to the determination of the genera and species. A detailed description of the type species of Enalcyonium, E. rubicundum Olsson, is given in the second note.

20787181|A comparison was made of amphipod assemblages on different species of the green alga, Codium both from a protected marine area and from a disturbed area. In addition, a laboratory experiment was conducted to determine habitat selection by amphipods. A total of five species of amphipods was found on Codium species. Amphipods were more abundant in the protected marine area; however, high numbers of amphipod species occurred on Codium fragile where that was a fouling organism in the disturbed area. The results from the experiment showed that amphipods preferred C. fragile as their habitat over any of the other species of Codium. The formation of canopies, the morphology of the plant species, and amphipod morphology, are all likely to influence the distribution and habitat selection by amphipods. Se compararon los ensambles de anfpodos en diferentes especies de Codium, en un rea marina protegida y en otra alterada. Adicionalmente, se llev a cabo un experimento de laboratorio para determinar la seleccin del hbitat efectuada por los anfpodos. Un total de cinco especies de anfpodos se encontraron en las especie Codium. Los anfpodos fueron ms abundantes en el rea protegida; sin embargo, un nmero alto de especies de anfpodos ocurrieron en un Codium fragile contaminado en el rea alterada. Los resultados del experimento mostraron que los anfpodos prefirieron el C. fragile como su hbitat ms que cualquier otra especie de Codium. La formacin de colonias de especies, la morfologa de la planta y la morfologa de los anfpodos son, probablemente, los factores que influyen en los anfpodos para la seleccin de su hbitat.
20105873|Calathura brachiata (Stimpson, 1853) has been found in the North Atlantic, north of Iceland and northeast of Greenland; 750 specimens have been investigated. Although this species is quite large and widely distributed, the identification was complicated by the fact that the synonymy with Calathura norvegica (Sars, 1872) and Anthura arctica (Heller, 1875) had not yet been satisfactorily resolved. Moreover, the descriptions of these species were either incomplete, or it was difficult to recognize the species from the illustrations. We therefore present a complete redescription of manca stages 2 and 3, as well as of an adult female, on the basis of our material from the North Atlantic, together with a redescription of an adult male based on museum material. /// Die Art Calathura brachiata (Stimpson, 1853) wurde nrdlich von Island und vor nordost Grnland gesammelt, 750 Individuen wurden vergleichend untersucht. Obwohl diese Art gro und weit verbreitet ist, war die Bestimmung nicht einfach, da die Synonymie dieser Art mit Calathura norvegica (Sars, 1872) und Anthura arctica (Heller, 1875) nicht hinreichend geklrt war. Auerdem waren die Beschreibungen von C. brachiata entweder unvollstndig oder die Bestimmung der Art war anhand der existierenden Abbildungen schwierig. Deshalb wird in der vorliegenden Arbeit anhand unseres Materials aus dem Nordatlantik eine vollstndige Nachbeschreibung prsentiert. Manca Stadien 2 und 3 und ein Weibchen werden auf der Grundlage unseres, ein erwachsenes Mnnchen auf der Grundlage von Museumsmaterial beschrieben.
20111432|A new species of stygobitic cirolanid, Speocirolana xilitla n. sp., is described from Cueva de las Catarinas, in the environs of the town of Xilitla, San Luis Potosi, Mexico. The new species represents the thirteenth species in the genus, extending its range 80 km to the south. The new species is characterized by an antenna composed of 51 articles, a rounded pleotelson, a uropodal protopod not reaching beyond the posterior margin of the pleotelson, and an exopod that is two-thirds the length of the endopod. Speocirolana xilitla is morphologically and geographically close to those species of the genus which also have a rounded pleotelson: S. pubens, S. prima, and S. pelaezi. /// Se describe una nueva especie de cirolnido estigobtico, Speocirolana xilitla n. sp., de la Cueva de las Catarinas, en las cercanas del poblado de Xilitla, San Luis Potos, Mxico. La nueva especie representa la treceava especie del gnero, extendiendo su intervalo de distribucin 80 km hacia el sur. La nueva especie se caracteriza por una antena compuesta de 51 artculos, un pleotelson redondeado, un protopodito del urpodo que no alcanza ms all del margen posterior del pleotelson y un expodo que es dos tercios la longitud del endpodo. Speocirolana xilitla es morfolgica y geogrficamente ms cercana a las especies del gnero con pleotelson redondeado: S. pubens, S. prima y S. pelaezi.
20104415|Description du xylophage Limnoria emarginata sp. n., recueilli dans la zone bathyale de la dpression centrale, en mer d'Okhotsk. 20105384|The mode of attachment to the substrate of the eight caprellid species that are the more abundant in the Strait of Gibraltar was observed under laboratory conditions. Types of clinging behaviour were categorized as "moving", "upright", "bending", and "parallel", respectively. Caprella danilevskii and C. penantis spent most of their time in the "parallel" posture, feeding mainly by scraping. This behaviour could be an advantage in exposed environments. The dominant behaviour for the remaining species is the "upright" posture, which could be differentiated into two subgroups. Caprella equilibra and Pariambus typicus fed principally by filtering, using frequent grooming behaviour. However, in Caprella santosrosai, Phtisica marina, and Pseudoprotella phasma, which all attatch to the substrate in the "upright" position, grooming was not frequent. Thus, for these species a predatory mode of life is suggested. The remaining species, Caprella acanthifera presented a scraping strategy associated with the "bending" posture. /// La forma de sujecin al substrato fue observada en condiciones de laboratorio en las 8 especies de caprlidos ms abundantes del Estrecho de Gibraltar. El comportamiento de sujecin fue categorizado como "movindose", "erguido", "encorvado" y "paralelo". Caprella danilevskii y C. penantis pasaron la mayor parte del tiempo en la postura paralela alimentndose mediante raspado. Este comportamiento podra resultar ventajoso en ambientes expuestos. El comportamiento dominante para las restantes especies fue la postura erguida, pudindose diferenciar dos subgrupos. Por una parte, Caprella equilibra y Pariambus typicus se alimentaron principalmente por filtracin usando frecuentemente el "grooming". Por otra parte, en Caprella santosrosai, Phtisica marina y Pseudoprotella phasma aunque sujetas al substrato en posicin erguida, el "grooming" no fue tan frecuente. As, se sugiere un modo de vida predador para estas especies. La especie restante, Caprella acanthifere present una estrategia de alimentacin por raspado asociada a la postura encorvada.

20104639|Cinq stades zo et une mgalope d'Ilyoplax pingi Shen levs en laboratoire sont dcrites et figures. La morphologie de ces larves est compare  celle des autres espces du genre Ilyoplax. Les caractres sparant les larves d'Ocypodidae aux niveau subfamilial et gnrique sont discuts.
20111408|The proprioceptive organs for the limbs of Cancer magister contain sensory endings embedded in an elastic strand to detect stretch and relaxation. The dynamic movement-sensitive neurons are of two types: those sensitive to relaxation and those sensitive to stretch of the chordotonal strand, which corresponds to flexion or extension of the joints. The cell bodies of sensory neurons associated with the planar chordotonal organs in the limbs are arranged within the elastic strand, whereas the organs that are more like a cord have the cell bodies of the dynamic movement-sensitive neurons outside the connective tissue strand. This study observed that the dynamic movement-sensitive neurons that are sensitive to relaxation have larger cell bodies than cells sensitive to stretch. No stretch-sensitive neurons were observed for the cord-shaped chordotonal organs. The static, position-sensitive neurons are distal in all the organs and have the smallest cell bodies. Mapping the functional distribution of the neurons has revealed that the various types of chordotonal organs have a similar pattern in soma location as in function. The purpose of this study is to describe this anatomical arrangement of the sensory neurons on a subset of chordotonal organs within the limb of the crab, Cancer magister so that species comparisons can be made, in the future. /// Les organes propriorcepteurs des pattes de Cancer magister contiennent des terminaisons sensorielles incluses dans une bande lastique qui dtectent l'tirement et le relchement. Les neurones sensibles au mouvement sont de deux sortes: ceux sensibles au relchement et ceux sensibles  l'tirement de la bande chordotonale, mouvements qui correspondent  la flexion ou l'extension des articulations. Les corps cellulaires des neurones sensoriels associs aux organes chordotonaux aplatis sont arrangs  l'intrieur de la bande lastique, alors qu'au niveau des organes en forme de corde, les corps cellulaires des neurones sensibles au mouvement sont  l'extrieur de la bande lastique. Cette tude a montr que les neurones sensibles aux mouvements de relchement prsentent des corps cellulaires plus grands que les cellules sensibles  l'tirement. Aucun neurone sensible  l'tirement n'a t observ au niveau des organes chordotonaux en forme de corde. Les neurones sensibles  une position statique sont distaux dans tous les organes et prsentent les corps cellulaires les plus petits. La cartographie de la distribution fonctionnelle des neurones a montr que les diffrents types d'organes chordotonaux prsentent un mme arrangement cellulaire et une mme fonction. Le but de cette tude est de dcrire l'arrangement anatomique des neurones sensoriels des organes chordotonaux  l'intrieur des pattes du crabe Cancer magister afin de permettre des comparaisons futures.
20107782|Parabrachiella lata (Song & Chen, 1976) (Siphonostomatoida, Lernaeopodidae), was redescribed based on specimens collected from the black porgy, Acanthopagrus schlegelii (Bleeker, 1854), of Taiwan. The developmental stages of P. lata were studied based on larvae hatched and reared in the laboratory, or collected from the wild. In total, seven stages are identified, namely, nauplius (free-swimming), copepodid (free-swimming), chalimus I through IV (attached by frontal filament), and adult (attached by bulla in the female and by maxillae and maxillipeds in the male). This is the first time to report a complete development for a species of Parabrachiella. The ontogeny of Parabrachiella indicates that it belongs to the Clavella-branch of the family, not the Lernaeopoda-branch as had been assumed so far. /// L'espce Parabrachiella lata (Song & Chen, 1976) (Siphonostomatoida, Lernaeopodidae), a t redcrite  partir de spcimens rcolts sur Acanthopagrus schlegelii (Bleeker, 1854), de Taiwan. Les stades de dveloppement de P. lata ont t tudis  partir de larves closes et leves au laboratoire, ou prleves dans la nature. Au total, sept stades ont t identifis, soit, nauplie (libre), coppodite (libre), chalimus I  IV (fixs par le filament frontal), adulte (fix par le bouton fixateur pour la femelle et par les maxilles et maxillipdes pour le mle). C'est la premire fois que l'on dcrit le dveloppement complet chez Parabrachiella. L'ontognie de Parabrachiella indique son appartenance  la branche Clavella de la famille et non  la branche Lernaeopoda comme il tait suppos jusqu' prsent.
20140985|A new phenotype, marmoratum, of the Isopod Sphaeroma serratum (F), occurring on the coasts of W Africa, is described This phenotype, near to the previously described phenotype ornatum, is determined by an autosomal gene, dominant to the gene albicans, epistatic with the gene dis cretum, and perhaps an allelomorph of the gene ornatum.
20111419|The hyperiid amphipod community of Banderas Bay, a tropical embayment on the central coast of the Mexican Pacific in the Eastern Tropical Pacific region, is studied based on surface zooplankton samples obtained during September and November, 1990. A taxonomic analysis of this group of pelagic amphipods yielded 20 species belonging to 11 families and 17 genera. Lestrigonus bengalensis and Hyperioides sibaginis were the dominant species; together, they represented ca. 94% of total hyperiid numbers in the area, the former species being dominant in November and the latter in September. The average density of the hyperiids was higher in September (1160 ind./1000 $\text{m}^{3}$ ) than in November (731 ind./1000 $\text{m}^{3}$ ). During the surveyed period, the warm waters of the North Equatorial Current were dominant in the area, thus favouring a tropical profile of the local hyperiid community. Local variations in density, diversity, and composition during the two months surveyed suggest that the bay is a highly dynamic system. The species composition showed a closer affinity with the Gulf of California than with the California Current system, or with the inferred general pattern of the Eastern Pacific. The shelf-coastal hyperiid fauna is distinctly different from that of the oceanic realm and should be studied further in this region. During the surveyed period, the hyperiid community of Banderas was featured by a relatively low diversity, but with an important influence of oceanic elements as a result of (1) the physiography of this large, open, and deep embayment, and (2) the narrowness of the continental shelf. This is the first information about this group of amphipods from coastal areas in the Eastern Tropical Pacific. /// La comunidad de anfpodos hipridos de Baha Banderas, una baha tropical de la costa central del Pacfico Mexicano, que es parte del Pacfico Tropical Oriental, se estudia con base en muestras de zooplancton obtenidas en septiembre y noviembre, 1990. El anlisis taxonmico del grupo produjo 20 especies de 11 familias y 17 gneros. Lestrigonus bengalensis e Hyperioides sibaginis fueron las especies dominantes; juntas representaron cerca del 94% del total de hipridos en el rea. La primera fue dominante en noviembre y la segunda en septiembre. La densidad promedio de hipridos fue mayor durante septiembre (1160 ind./1000 $\text{m}^{3}$ ) que en noviembre (731 ind./1000 $\text{m}^{3}$ ). Durante el periodo estudiado las aguas clidas de la Corriente Norecuatorial fueron dominantes en el rea y por tanto favorecieron un perfil tropical en la comunidad local de anfpodos hipridos. Las variaciones locales de densidad, diversidad y composicin en ambos meses estudiados sugieren que esta baha es un sistema altamente dinmico. La composicin de especies mostr una afinidad ms cercana con el Golfo de California que con el sistema de la Corriente de California o con el patrn general que se ha deducido respecto al Pacfico Oriental. La fauna de hipridos del intervalo costa-plataforma es claramente distinta de la encontrada en aguas ocenicas y debe ser estudiada con detalle en esta regin. Durante el periodo estudiado la comunidad de hipridos de Banderas se caracteriz por tener una diversidad relativamente baja, pero con un importante aporte de formas ocenicas como resultado de (1) la fisiografa de esta baha, abierta, profunda y de gran tamao, y (2) la estrechez de la plataforma continental. Esta representa la primera informacin acerca de este grupo de anfpodos en aguas costeras del Pacfico Tropical Oriental.
20102984|Des observations de laboratoire ont montr que le crabe Menippe mercenaria (Say) peut avoir plus de dix missions d'oeufs viables pendant une seule poque, entre les phases priodiques durant lesquelles le crabe rejette sa carapace. Ceci indique donc que les spermatozodes demeurent vivants  l'intrieur de la spermathque pendant un temps trs long. L'examen histologique a rvl que des spermatozodes vivants se trouvaient dans la spermathque d'une femelle isole qui avait rejett sa carapace sans copulation ultrieure.
20105777|The diel vertical migration pattern of the copepods, Acartia tonsa and Paracalanus parvus was studied in Guanabara Bay, Brazil. Samples were taken at a fixed station at three depths, at three-hour intervals, and for three days. During the study period, the water column was stratified with warm, low-salinity water from the inner bay at the surface and cold, high-salinity deep-ocean water below. The individuals of both species were identified and counted, with no sex or stage distinction. The results confirmed that A. tonsa and P. parvus have a different migratory behaviour. A. tonsa maintains itself in the surface water layer during the night. This species does not seem to be affected by the presence of a sharp thermocline. P. parvus shows a vertical migration pattern based on a 12-hour cycle and it is limited to deeper waters, below the thermocline. This peculiar behaviour may help P. parvus to avoid being carried into the inner, polluted part of the bay. /// Le modle de migration journalire verticale des coppodes Acartia tonsa et Paracalanus parvus a t tudi dans la baie de Guanabara au Brsil. Des chantillons ont t prlevs  une station fixe,  trois profondeurs, toutes les trois heures et pendant trois jours. Au cours de cette priode, la colonne d'eau tait stratifie, avec des eaux de surface chaudes et de faible salinit provenant de l'intrieur de la baie et au-dessous, des eaux froides de forte salinit provenant des eaux profondes de l'ocan Atlantique. Les individus des deux espces tudies ont t identifis et compts, sans distinction de stade ou de sexe. Les rsultats confirment que A. tonsa et P. parvus ont un comportement migratoire diffrent. A. tonsa se maintient pendant la nuit dans les eaux de surface. Cette espce ne semble pas tre affecte par la prsence d'une forte thermocline. P. parvus prsente une migration verticale fonde sur un cycle de 12 heures, et limite aux eaux plus profondes, au-dessous de la thermocline. Ce comportement particulier peut aider P. parvus  viter les eaux pollues de l'intrieur de la baie.

20105780|The increase in the penetration of ultraviolet radiation that has been reported lately for freshwater ecosystems in southern South America, would allegedly generate alterations in ecological processes. In the present study, the mortality of Neobosmina chilensis (Daday 1902), a small cladoceran distributed in South American lakes and ponds, was studied in this respect. Specimens were reared in five different concentrations of dissolved organic carbon, and subjected to 24 hrs of exposure to artificial ultraviolet radiation. An inverse correlation between the dissolved organic carbon concentration and individual mortality was found. This result supports the description of a screen effect of dissolved organic carbon against ultraviolet radiation. The data obtained describe a linear relation, in which
20104823|A new axiid, collected in the Levantine Basin of the Mediterranean, from a depth of 1400 m, is described and illustrated. This is the third axiid known from the Mediterranean and represents a new genus. /// Description et illustration d'un nouvel axiide recueilli dans le bassin levantin de la Mditerrane,  1400 mtres de profondeur. C'est le troisime axiide connu de Mditerrane et il reprsente un genre nouveau.
20105510|Biology, population structure, and field growth rates of Porcellionides pruinosus were studied at Garat Nam (Kasserine, Tunisia). Recruitment occurred from April/May to November. The proportion of ovigerous females in the population was positively correlated with day length, and the proportion of juveniles was positively correlated with day length and temperature. Female size was positively correlated with fecundity (number of eggs per brood) and fertility (number of embryos hatched per brood). We estimated losses during embryonic development at  2.5%. Sex ratio was always in favour of females. We analysed size frequency distributions for recognizable cohorts. Field growth data were used to calibrate a growth model. Minimum average length of newly born cohorts ranged from 3.3  0.148 mm to 4.14  0.159 mm total length (TL). Life span was estimated at 11 to 14 months. Cohorts born in summer and autumn survived longer (13 to 14 months) than cohorts born in spring (11 to 12 months). Females took approximately 1 month to reach sexual differentiation (3.96  0.09 mm TL), while males took slightly less (3.24  0.14 mm TL). Females from cohorts born in spring took less time ( 2.5 months corresponding to 3.58  0.21 mm TL) than females from cohorts born in late summer and autumn, to reach sexual maturity ( 3.5 months corresponding to 4.99  0.23 mm TL). P. pruinosus behaved as a semi-annual species (two or three broods per year), with iteroparous females, and a bivoltine life cycle. A comparison with other studies exhibits the occurrence of large intra-specific variation in the species' reproductive pattern. /// On a tudi la biologie, la structure de la population et le taux de croissance sur le terrain de Porcellionides pruinosus  Garat Nam (Kasserine, Tunisie). Recrutement a eu lieu d'avril-mai  novembre. La proportion de femelles ovigres dans la population est corrle positivement avec la longueur du jour, et la proportion de juvniles est corrle positivement avec la longueur du jour et la temprature. La taille femelle est corrle positivement avec la fcondit (nombre d'oeufs par ponte) et la fertilit (nombre d'embryons clos par ponte). Nous avons estim les pertes au cours du dveloppement embryonnaire   2,5%. La sex-ratio est toujours en faveur des femelles. Nous avons analys les distributions de frquence de taille pour les cohortes reconnaissables. Les donnes de croissance du terrain ont t utilises pour calibrer un modle de croissance. La longueur moyenne minimale des cohortes nouvellement nes va de 3,3  0,148 mm  4,14  0,159 mm de longueur totale (TL). La longvit a t estime  11  14 mois. Les cohortes nes en t et automne ont survcu plus longtemps (13  14 mois) que les cohortes nes au printemps (11  12 mois). Les femelles ont mis environ 1 mois  atteindre la diffrentiation sexuelle (3,96  0,09 mm TL), tandis que les mles ont mis un peu moins de temps (3,24  0,14 mm TL). Les femelles des cohortes nes au printemps ont mis moins de temps ( 2,5 mois correspondant  3,58  0,21 mm TL) que les femelles des cohortes nes  la fin de l't et l'automne pour atteindre la maturit sexuelle (3,5 mois correspondant  4,99  0,23 mm TL). P. pruinosus se comporte comme une espce semiannuelle (deux ou trois pontes par an), avec des femelles itropares et un cycle de vie bivoltin. Une comparaison avec d'autres tudes dmontre l'existence d'une grande variation intra-spcifique dans le modle de reproduction de l'espce.
20104603|Description de trois nouvelles espces de Mysidacs appartenant  la tribu des Leptomysini, en provenance d'Australie (Northern Territory). Doxomysis brucei n. sp. est caractrise par son telson arm d'pines si denses qu'elles se recouvrent en partie. D. spinata n. sp. est unique par la prsence de fines pines accessoires le long des bords latraux et de fortes pines sur le bord distal de l'endopodite. Prionomysis australiensis n. sp. se distingue par les deux soies terminales ingales de l'exopodite du plopode 4 du mle, et par les lobes triangulaires du telson. Le genre Prionomysis est ici signal pour la premire fois de l'Australie.
20103651|Se describen dos nuevas especies de camarones de la familia Palaemonidae, Pseudocoutierea edentata y Pseudocoutierea conchae encontradas en las bahas de Concha y Santa Marta, Caribe Colombiano. Estos camarones son ectocomensales de la octocoralia Leptogorgia virgulata (Lamarck), la cual presenta varios colores y los camarones tienen la capacidad de adaptar su color al del huesped. En estas dos especies se encuentran caractersticas diferenciables de las otras dos especies de Pseudocoutierea, siendo la principal, la presencia de exopoditos sobre el segundo par de maxilpedos, la cual no era conocida para el gnero.
20101663|La rare crevette caride bathyplagique, Physetocaris microphthalma Chace, est signale de l'Atlantique Nord oriental. Des dtails morphologiques sur le premier mle signal sont donns, ainsi que des notes sur une femelle ovigre. Des observations en laboratoire sur un animal vivant montrent que Physetocaris peut rester inactif pendant de longues priodes, bien que, occasionellement, il soit extrmement actif. La premire et la seconde zo ont t obtenues par la suite  partir des trois oeufs restant sur la femelle ovigre; leur dveloppement et leur morphologie sont dcrits. Les larves ont une carapace et des yeux normaux: il apparat ainsi que les caractres adultes portant sur le renflement de la carapace et la rduction des yeux se dveloppent  une poque plus tardive de la vie. Un certain nombre de caractres larvaires sont compatibles avec les affinits possibles entre Physetocaris et les Processidae, suggres par Chace (1940), mais il existe des diffrences importantes et les larves ne paraissent troitement apparentes  celles d'aucune autre famille connue.
20102497|Lysiosquilla biminiensis var. pacificus Borradaile de Nouvelle Bretagne est redcrite, illustre et mise en synonymie avec L. multifasciata Wood-Mason.
20101823|Ein erwachsenes Mnnchen von Bathyconchoecia deeveyae Kornicker, 1969, wird beschrieben und abgebildet. Diese Art war bisher nur von Jungtieren aus dem Pazifik bekannt. Das vorliegende Stck wurde im Indischen Ozean erbeutet.
20103581|The effects of bleeding stress and autotomy on haemolymph TCA-precipitable and TCA-soluble fractions of nitrogen of the shore-crab Ocypode platytarsis were studied. The haemolymph protein concentration decreased in half-an-hour after both bleeding stress and autotomy and recovered 75 minutes after autotomy. The fall in haemolymph protein level could not be due to (a) dilution of haemolymph, as there was no change in the water content of the haemolymph after autotomy and bleeding stress, or (b) degradation of protein, as TSF-N level also decreased during the corresponding period after autotomy and bleeding stress. The haemolymph TCA-soluble nitrogen decreased 35 minutes after autotomy and bleeding stress. The TSF-N level recovered, 75 minutes autotomy, whereas in the corresponding period after bleeding stress, it further decreased. The fall in TSF-N level 75 minutes after bleeding was suggested to reflect the increase in the demand for energy yielding metabolites after bleeding stress. The haemolymph protein levels recovered 75 minutes after autotomy and bleeding stress. What is recovered after autotomy is considerably lower than the normal value. The incomplete recovery in haemolymph protein could be due to partial degradation of a fraction of the protein in tissues, which sequestered them, because an increase in TSF-nitrogen level was observed in the haemolymph at this period. Effects of autotomy of more than one leg on haemolymph protein and TSF-N levels were studied in order to find out whether there is any quantitative difference in the fluctuations according to the amount of stress. The results showed a difference in the recovery of protein level, 75 minutes after autotomy of one leg vs. more than one leg.
20107505|Following its introduction into the St. Francis River drainage, Missouri, U.S.A., the woodland crayfish, Orconectes hylas has expanded its range there; simultaneously populations of two imperiled endemic species, the Big Creek crayfish, O. peruncus, and the St. Francis River crayfish, O. quadruncus have declined therein. In seeking a basis for this decline, our study objective was to test whether the outcome of aggressive inter-specific interactions would favor O. hylas. We studied agonistic encounters between size-matched pairs of same-sex individuals of the introduced and the endemic species in a laboratory setting, first with juveniles and then with adults. Within each life stage, we conducted four sets of laboratory experiments, with approximately 20 trials in each set: (1) O. hylas males versus O. peruncus males, (2) O. hylas males versus O. quadruncus males, (3) O. hylas females versus O. peruncus females, and (4) O. hylas females versus O. quadruncus females. In addition, these same four experiment sets were repeated using larger adult O. hylas crayfish matched with smaller-sized adult endemics, mimicking the mismatch in adult sizes that occurs in the wild. Within each experiment, every trial was analysed to quantify the frequency of occurrence of three initiation behaviors and to determine the overall outcome of the trial. Results did not show O. hylas (juveniles or adults) to be behaviorally dominant over either endemic species. Orconectes hylas displayed the majority of one of the initiation behaviors significantly more often than did the endemic species in only two of the twelve experiments. Because direct aggressive interaction was not demonstrated to be the mechanism whereby O. peruncus and O. quadruncus are being replaced by O. hylas, other life history and ecological factors will require investigation. /// A la suite de son introduction dans le canal de drainage de la rivire St Franis, Missouri, U.S.A., l'crevisse Orconectes hylas y a tendu son territoire; simultanment les populations de deux espces endmiques d'crevisses en voie de disparition, O. peruncus et O. quadruncus y ont dclin. Afin de rechercher une explication  ce dclin, l'objectif de notre tude a t de tester si le rsultat des interactions agressives entre espces favoriserait O. hylas. Nous avons tudi au laboratoire les rencontres agonistiques entre individus de mme taille et de mme sexe de l'espce introduite et des espces endmiques, d'abord entre juvniles, puis entre adultes. Pour chaque stade, nous avons men quatre sries d'expriences, comprenant environ 20 essais dans chaque srie: (1) O. hylas mles versus O. peruncus mles, (2) O. hylas mles versus O. quadruncus mles, (3) O. hylas femelles versus O. peruncus femelles, (4) O. hylas femelles versus O. quadruncus femelles. De plus, les mmes expriences ont t rptes en utilisant de grands adultes de O. hylas face  des adultes plus petits des espces endmiques, de faon  imiter la disparit des tailles d'adultes existant dans la nature. Pour chaque exprience, chaque essai a t analys de faon  quantifier la frquence de trois comportements initiaux de rencontre et  dterminer le rsultat final de l'essai. Les rsultats ne montrent pas que O. hylas (juvniles ou adultes) ait un comportement dominant par rapport aux espces endmiques. Dans seulement deux sur les douze expriences, Orconectes hylas prsentait la majorit d'un des comportements initiaux de rencontre plus souvent que les espces endmiques. Dans la mesure o le comportement d'agressivit n'est pas le mcanisme permettant d'expliquer le remplacement de O. peruncus et O. quadruncus par O. hylas, d'autres traits de vie et facteurs cologiques devront tre recherchs.

Elle est apparente  A. hanseni Nouvel, A. vasseuri Ledoyer et A. levi Bacescu, par la forme gnrale, mais se distingue par la forme et l'armature du telson, et par le longueur relative des trois segments exopodiaux du quatrime plopode mle.
20105340|Digital images of Calanus pacificus, Rhincalanus nasutus, Pleuromamma gracilis, Temora discaudata, and Acartia tonsa were processed to obtain their diffraction pattern. For this analysis an algorithm using the square module of the fast Fourier transform was used. The diffraction patterns of these copepod species were correlated with phase-only filters in an invariant way to discriminate between each species and sex. Results indicate that this method is promising and that in a relatively short time an automated system for plankton identification could be developed. /// Des images digitalises de Calanus pacificus, Rhincalanus nasutus, Pleuromamma gracilis, Temora discaudata et Acartia tonsa ont t traites pour obtenir leur modle de diffraction. Pour cette analyse, un algorithme utilisant le module carr de la transformation rapide de Fourier a t utilis. Les modles de diffraction de ces espces de coppodes ont t corrls avec des filtres uniphases de faon invariante pour discriminer entre chaque espce et sexe. Les rsultats indiquent que cette mthode est prometteuse et que dans un temps relativement court, un systme automatique pour l'identification du plancton pourrait tre dvelopp.
20107792|Las Palmas lagoon is a part of the hydrographic system of Pom-Atasta-Puerto Rico, NE of Laguna de Trminos, southern Gulf of Mexico. Swimming crabs of the genus Callinectes abound in this area and play an important role in the complex trophic dynamics of the macrobenthos. We analysed the feeding habits of Callinectes rathbunae and its variations on three temporal scales. Sampling was carried out from August 1999 through July 2000, both on a monthly basis (9:00-13:00 h) at new moon, and for each season (every 6 h during 24 h) with a small shrimp trawl net. Samples of epiand infauna were simultaneously taken. The stomachs of all C. rathbunae collected were dissected and the dietary components identified to the lowest taxonomic level possible. Percentage frequency of occurrence (%F) of each taxon was calculated, together with the normalized Levins index (Ba) for each (a) season, (b) size class (20 mm intervals), and (c) day- and night-time period in each season. While the trophic niche breadth of this species does not vary significantly with season, crab size, or time of day, diet components differed among seasons and crab size classes. Results indicate that ontogenic differences in the feeding strategies of this species contribute most importantly to overall variations in diet. /// La laguna de Las Palmas forma parte del sistema hidrogrfico Pom-Atasta-Puerto Rico, ubicado al NE de Laguna de Trminos, en el sur del Golfo de Mxico. Las jaibas del gnero Callinectes son abundantes en esta zona, y juegan un papel preponderante en la compleja dinmica trfica del macrobenthos. Se analizaron los hbitos alimenticios de Callinectes rathbunae, y sus variaciones en tres escalas temporales. Se realizaron muestreos mensuales de agosto 1999 a julio 2000 (9:00-13:00 h en luna nueva), y estacionales (cada 6 h durante 24 h), utilizando una red de prueba camaronera. Simultneamente, se tomaron muestras de la epi y meiofauna. Los estmagos de todos los C. rathbunae capturados fueron disecados, y se identificaron los componentes del contenido estomacal hasta grupos taxonmicos mayores. Se calcularon los valores de porcentaje de frecuencia de ocurrencia (%F) de cada componente, as como los valores de del ndice normalizado de Levins (Ba) por (a) pocas del ao, (b) por intervalo de talla (20 mm), y (c) para el da y la noche en cada poca del ao. En tanto que la amplitud del nicho trfico no vari significativamente entre pocas del ao, talla u hora del da, se registraron diferencias en los componentes de la dieta a lo largo del ao y entre jaibas de diferente tamao. Los resultados indican que las diferencias ontognicas en las estrategias alimenticias de esta especie contribuyen de manera importante en la variacin general de la dieta.

20696268|This study estiamtes reproductive parameters (length at first maturity, reproduction period, and fecundity), mortality, and maximum sustainable yield for Macrobrachium amazonicum on Combu Island (Amazon estuary). Samples were taken monthly between March 2003 and February 2004. Ovigerous females were recorded throughout the year, with reproductive peaks in the middle of the flood period (March), in the low water period (September), and the peak dry period (December) of the Guam River. The size at which 50% of the females were mature was 60.8 mm TL. Absolute fecundity varied between 40 and 3375 eggs per female. The exploitation rate for maximum sustainable yield ( $\text{E}_{\text{MSY}}$ ) for males was lower than that for females. For both sexes, $\text{E}_{\text{MSY}}$ was below the exploitation rates (E). The present study demonstrates the need for management of the prawn fishery on the islands in the Amazon estuary, such as establishing a minimum commercial size. Este estudo tem o objetivo de estimar os parmetros reprodutivos (tamanho de primeira maturidade, perodo reprodutivo e fecundidade), mortalidade e rendimento mximo sustentvel do Macrobrachium amazonicum da Ilha do Combu (Esturio Amaznico). As amostras foram coletadas mensalmente, entre maro de 2003 e fevereiro de 2004. Fmeas ovgeras foram registradas ao longo de todo ano, com picos reprodutivos no meio da enchente (maro), vazante (setembro) e pico de mnima vazo (dezembro) no Rio Guam. O tamanho na qual 50% das fmeas esto maduras  de 60,8 mm de comprimento total. Fecundidade absoluta variou entre 40 e 3375 ovos por fmea. A taxa de explorao para a obteno do rendimento mximo sustentvel ( $\text{E}_{\text{RMY}}$ ) para machos foi inferior ao obtido para as fmeas. Para ambos sexos $\text{E}_{\text{RMY}}$ foi abaixo das taxas de explotao atuais (E). O presente estudo demonstra a necessidade do manejo da pesca de camaro nas ilhas do esturio Amaznico, como por exemplo o estabelecimento de tamanho mnimo de comercializao.
20102361|The four larval stages (zoea I to zoea IV) of the Hermit Crab Catapaguroides timidus (Roux) are described. Detailed illustrations are given showing the changes which occur during development of each appendage. The mandibles and the following appendages back to, and including, the second maxillipeds undergo only slight modifications of form and size from the first to the last stage. Peraeopods 1 to 5 appear at stage II, the uropods at stage III (at the same time as the telson becomes differentiated from the sixth abdominal segment), and the pleopods at stage IV. Important changes in the form of the body and of the appendages occur at the moult from zoea IV to the post-larva or glaucothoe, which is morphologically much nearer to the final or adult form than to the zoeas. So far no complete descriptions, or detailed figures, of Pagurid larvae have been published; it is thus only possible to compare the development of a limited number of characters with those of other species.
20102620|The authors give an historical account of our knowledge to date of the following species: Orchestoidea fischeri (H. Milne-Edwards, 1830), Talorchestia quadrispinosa Barnard, 1962, and Talorchestia spinifera (E. Mateus, 1962), as well as data on their geographical distribution. Recent collections of Orchestia spinifera from Arcachon, for which locality this constitutes a new record, have enabled the authors to examine the species in detail and to refer it to the genus Talorchestia rather than to Orchestia.
20107547|Specimens of the estuarine isopods, Uromunna sp. and Paradella dianae living among Rhizophora mangle prop roots in a SE Gulf of California coastal lagoon system were collected from 11 stations, from October 1997 to September 1998. Among the ovigerous females, there was a positive, significant relationship between clutch size and TL for both species. The average size at first sexual maturity was estimated to be 1.54 mm with an average fecundity of 11 eggs for Uromunna sp. In the case of P. dianae, the average size at first sexual maturity was estimated to be 4.81 mm with an average fecundity of 19 eggs. On the basis of proportion and frequency of appearance of ovigerous females, prop roots in Uras seem more suitable as a reproductive habitat for Uromunna sp. than for P. dianae. /// Des exemplaires de deux espces d'isopodes d'estuaires, Uromunna sp. et Paradella dianae, associes aux racines ariennes de Rhizophora mangle dans une lagune ctire localise au SE du golfe de Californie, on t rcolts dans 11 stations, entre octobre 1997 et septembre 1998. Une corrlation significative et possitive a t obtenue entre la taille de la couve et la longueur totale (TL) de la femelle dans le cas des deux espces. La taille moyenne estime  la premire maturit sexuelle est de 1,54 mm, correspondant  une fcondit moyenne de 11 oeufs chez Uromunna sp. Dans le cas de P. dianae, la taille moyenne estime  la premire maturit sexuelle est de 4,81 mm et la fcondit moyenne de 19 oeufs. Prenant en considration la proportion et la frquence d'apparition des femelles ovigres, les racines ariennes du systme Urias semblent plus favorables comme habitat reproductif pour Uromunna sp. que pour P. dianae.

P. phrixa es una especie prxima a P. spinosissima Birstein & Vinogradov, 1972, del Atlntico Sudoccidental, pero se diferencia fcilmente por la longitud de las espinas del caparazn. 20103742|A description of Paulillgia polycarpae n. g., n. sp., Ascidicolidae, Haplostominae is given here. The mean characteristics are the strongly reduced head appendages and the disappearance of all legs posterior to the second thoracic one.
20107912|The terrestrial isopod fauna of Israel has been surveyed throughout the past 80 years, and during the last 40 years especially by the present author, during which period additional collecting methods were applied. Altogether, 637 localities (547 since 1960) have been visited on 894 occasions (705 since 1960). Each of these localities was visited 1.54 times per year on an average. The largest numbers of localities investigated were in the Judean mountains and desert (103), whereas in the Arava and Eilat regions only five localities were visited. The largest number of collecting visits was to Mt. Carmel (125). In comparison, only eight visits took place to the Arava and Eilat regions. Of the 3349 vials of isopod collected, about two-thirds have so far been studied (2154 vials). In these, 41 species have been identified, including a new species yet to be described. The highest number of species per locality was found on Mt. Gilboa (1.0), versus the lowest in Samaria (0.09). The largest numbers of species were found in Galilee (25), and in Judea (20), whereas the lowest numbers were in the Arava and Eilat (4). These last provided the largest number of species recorded per visit (0.5), while the lowest number was recorded on the Coastal Plain (0.125). Much of the terrestrial isopod fauna (53.4%) is Mediterranean in origin. The remainder comes from other zoogeographic regions: Irano-Turanian, Saharo-Arabian, and Sudano-Dekanian. In their local distribution, isopods seem to spread into adjacent regions. The current distribution is probably to some extent dependent on the presence or abundance of appropriate shelters (e.g., stones) that provide a suitable microclimate, thus making survival possible under xeric conditions. /// La faune des isopodes terrestres d'Israel a t suivie tout au long des 80 dernires annes, et particulirement par le prsent auteur pendant les 40 dernires annes, au cours desquelles des mthodes de rcolte supplmentaires ont t utilises. Au total, 637 localits (547 depuis 1960) ont t visites  894 reprises (705 depuis 1960). Chacune de ces localits a t chantillonne 1,54 times par an en moyenne. Les plus grands nombres de localits tudies concernent les montagnes et le dsert de Jude (103), tandis que dans les rgions d'Arava et Eilat, seulement cinq sites ont t visits. Les rcoltes les plus nombreuses ont t ralises au Mt. Carmel (125). En comparaison, seulement huit visites ont t faites dans les rgions d'Arava et d'Eilat. Sur les 3349 tubes d'isopodes collects, les 2/3 environ ont t tudis jusqu' prsent (2154 tubes). Dans ces derniers, 41 espces ont t identifies, incluant une espce nouvelle encore  dcrire. Le nombre d'espces par localit le plus lev a t trouv au Mt. Gilboa (1,0), et le plus bas en Samarie (0,09). Les plus grands nombres d'espces ont t trouvs en Galile (25) et en Jude (20), tandis que les plus bas taient observs dans l'Arava et Eilat (4). Ces derniers ont fourni le plus grand nombre d'espces identifies par visite (0,5), tandis que le nombre le plus bas a t observ dans la plaine ctire (0,125). Une grande partie de la faune d'isopodes terrestres est d'origine mditerranenne (53,4%). Le reste a pour origine d'autres domaines zoogographiques: irano-turanien, saharo-arabe, et soudano-deccanien. Dans leur rpartition locale, les isopodes semblent se rpartir dans des rgions adjacentes. La rpartition actuelle dpend probablement en partie de la prsence ou de l'abondance des abris appropris (pierres) qui fournissent un microclimat favorable, rendant ainsi possible la survie en conditions xriques.
27743311|The seasonal succession patterns of species of Cladocera with respect to changes in some environmental and biological parameters were examined in a harbour located at Kepez, Dardanelles from 11 April 2006 to 12 April 2007. For this study, environmental parameters and zooplankton data were analysed for one station and sampling trips were conducted every two weeks. Cladoceran abundance varied widely throughout the sampling period, exceeding 87% of total zooplankton, especially during the warmer seasons. The cladoceran community was mainly composed of Penilia avirostris, Pleopsis polyphemoides, and Evadne nordmanni, the first one occurring from late spring through early fall, and the latter two from early spring to early summer. Salinity and temperature seemed to have little or no effect on the distribution, abundance, and variability of the cladocerans in the system, indicating factors other than non-biological environmental parameters, such as competition with other groups of zooplankton, food availability and/or quality, have the greatest effects on cladoceran species composition. /// Les changements saisonniers successifs d'espces de Cladocres, par rapport  quelques paramtres environnementaux et biologiques ont t examins dans un port localis  Kepez, Dardanelles, du 11 avril 2006 au 12 avril 2007. Pour cette tude, les paramtres environnementaux et les donnes du zooplancton ont t analyss pour une station et des chantillonnages ont t effectus 2 fois par mois. L'abondance des Cladocres varie largement au cours de la priode d'chantillonnage, dpassant 87% du zooplancton total, spcialement pendant les saisons chaudes. La communaut de cladocres tait compose surtout de Penilia avirostris, Pleopsis polyphemoides, et Evadne nordmanni, le premier prsent de la fin du printemps jusqu' dbut automne, les derniers du dbut printemps jusqu'au dbut de l't. Salinit et temprature semblent avoir peu ou pas d'effet sur la distribution, l'abondance et la variabilit des cladocres dans le systme, ce qui indique que des facteurs autres que les paramtres environnementaux non-biologiques, comme la comptition avec d'autres groupes zooplanctoniques, l'abondance de l'alimentation et/ou sa qualit, doivent avoir une plus grande influence sur la composition des espces de cladocres.
20102726|The androgenic gland discovered in 1954 in the amphipod Orchestia gammarellus has been described in all the superorders of the higher Crustacea, except the Syncarida which have not yet been investigated. The androgenic gland is localized in the last thoracic segment, against the subterminal, ejaculatory part of the vas deferens. In the Isopoda and the Tanaidacea the gland may occur, according to the species, in front of or along the testicular utricles, against the seminal vesicle or against the vas deferens. In addition, it is often closely joined with the genital apparatus. The androgenic gland seems of genital origin. It acquires progressively in the course of the first intermolts (after the acquisition of the specific form) the morphological, cytological and cytochemical characters of the adult gland. The histological structure of the androgenic gland is relatively varied: types in simple strands, compound strands, spherules or lobules. The cytological aspect assumes, by contrast, a great uniformity. The size of the nuclei may vary between 3 and 10 , but the cytoplasm is always strongly pyroninophilous in summer. Holocrine secretion seems to be the general mode of functioning of the androgenic gland. Although interesting results have been recorded, many particulars remain still to be supplied on the histogenesis, histochemistry, the embryonic and postembryonic development of the androgenic gland.
20102830|Eine neue Arbeit von Davidie (1963) ber die harten Teile der Balanomorpha enthlt eine Aussage ber die "lames pithliales" oder "interlaminate figures", die unrichtig ist. Da diese Struktur von Wichtigkeit ist, haben wir die Beobachtungen von Davadie berprft und geben hier eine andere Erklrung fr den Ursprung der "interlaminate figures" bei Balanus und verwandten Gattungen. Davadie (1963) sieht in den fraglichen Strukturen Einstlpungen hnlich denen der Gliedertierapodemen, die zu Rippen auf den Wnden fhren und von denen die "interlaminate figures" berbleibsel darstellen. Wir glauben dagegen da der Ursprung dieser "interlaminate figures" mit den zusammengeschlossenen Zhnen der Wachstumsrnder der Wnde in Zusammenhang zu bringen ist; die "figures" selbst nehmen ihren Ursprung und erhalten ihr Aussehen von der organischen Grundsubstanz und der nachfolgenden Kristallisierung. Unsere Beobachtungen sind mit denen von Costlow (1956) ber das frhe Wachstum bei Balanus improvisus. Darwin vereinbar. Daher kommen die "interlaminate figures" offenbar durch eine Sekretionsschicht des Carapax zustande und nicht durch eine Einstlpung oder Faltung der Epikuticula.
20140999|Die Struktur von Mundrohr, Mandibeln und Maxillulae der Lernaeocera branchialis (L.) wird eingehend untersucht. Frhere Autoren bezeichneten die Maxillulae dieses Tieres irrtmlich als Mandibeln. L. branchialis besitzt eine vollstndige Reihe von Mundgliedern: Mandibeln, Maxillulae, Maxillae, sowie ein paar Kieferfsse im weiblichen Geschlecht und zwei im mnnlichen. Die vermutliche Wirkungsweise des Mundrohres wird errtert.

29779477|A review of the relevant literature and additional data from intensive sampling off the coasts of Cyprus, S.W. Turkey, and the Aegean coasts of Greece and Turkey, permitted to estimate the evolution of the entrance rate of Lessepsian Crustacea Decapoda into the Mediterranean Sea since the opening of the Suez Canal in 1869, until today. The development of the spatio-temporal dispersal of these species towards other geographical areas in the Mediterranean was also investigated. Analysis of all relevant data showed for the first time, that the entrance rate of Lessepsian decapods is accelerating and this acceleration is statistically significant. Furthermore, there is a progressive dispersal of these species from Port Said both towards the west, along the African coast, and towards the east along the coasts of Israel, Lebanon, and Syria, from there towards the southern Turkish coasts and the coasts of Cyprus, and finally towards the Greek and Turkish Aegean coasts. The increasing trend in the entrance rate of thermophilous Lessepsian decapods as well as their progressive dispersal towards higher latitudes could be attributed to the observed, gradual increase in temperature of the waters of the Mediterranean. Une revue de la littrature spcialise ainsi que des donnes supplmentaires obtenues lors d'chantillonnages intensifs au large des ctes de Chypre, au sud-ouest de la Turquie, et des ctes de la mer Ege de Grce et de Turquie, ont permis d'estimer l'volution du taux d'entre des Crustacs Dcapodes lessepssiens en mer Mditerrane depuis l'ouverture du canal de Suez en 1869 jusqu' aujourd'hui. Le dveloppement de la dispersion spatio-temporelle vers d'autres zones gographiques de Mditerrane a aussi t tudi. L'analyse de toutes ces donnes a montr pour la premire fois, que le taux d'entre des Dcapodes lessepssiens s'acclre et que cette acclration est statistiquement significative. De plus, on a observ une dispersion progressive de ces espces  partir de Port Sad  la fois vers l'ouest, le long de la cte africaine, et vers l'est le long des ctes d'Isral, du Liban et de Syrie, de l vers les ctes du sud de la Turquie et les ctes de Chypre, et enfin vers les ctes turques et grecques de la mer ge. La tendance croissante du taux d'entre des Dcapodes lessepssiens thermophiles ainsi que leur dispersion progressive vers de plus hautes latitudes pourraient tre attribues  l'augmentation graduelle de la temprature observe dans les eaux de la Mditerrane.

27743257|A new species of gammaridean amphipod, Gammarus preciosus sp. nov., is described and illustrated based on specimens collected from the Baotianman Natural Reserve, Henan Province, China. This new species is characterized by the inner ramus of the third uropod reaching 0.4 times the length of the outer ramus, and the outer ramus with spines on its outer margin and plumose setae on its inner margin. The morphology of the species is discussed in relation to other, closely similar species. /// Une espce nouvelle d'amphipode gammarid, Gammarus preciosus sp. nov., est dcrite et illustre  partir de spcimens collects dans la rserve naturelle de Baotianman, province du Henan, Chine. Cette nouvelle espce est caractrise par la rame interne du troisime uropode atteignant 0,4 fois la longueur de la rame externe, et la rame externe portant des pines sur le bord externe et des soies plumeuses sur le bord interne. La morphologie de l'espce est discute par comparaison avec d'autres espces trs proches.
20111470|The taxonomic status of Caridina similis Bouvier, 1904 has been clarified using specimens recently caught from the type locality. One lectotype and five paralectoptypes of C. similis are designated to stabilize the species' systematics. This species is endemic for the Seychelles Islands (Indian Ocean). /// Le statut taxonomique de l'espce Caridina similis Bouvier 1904 est clarifi sur la base de spcimens capturs rcemment dans la localit type. 20104494|A sexual pheromone is released with the urine of female C. maenas, from moulting stage D to A, which stimulates the male antennules. Because hemolymph samples and ecdyson solutions are inactive, the site of pheromone synthesis seems to be located in the excretory organs. A careful histological comparison between males and females, as well as between intermoult and moulting females does not show any significant differences in the three main parts of the excretory organs (coelomosac, labyrinth and bladder). On the contrary a small exocrine ectodermal gland opens into the distal section of the ureter, in close proximity to the urinary pore. It is found in both sexes but appears much more developed and active in the female. The topographical location and morphological characteristics of the gland suggest its pheromonal nature.
27822647|Adult females and males of Pleuromamma abdominalis were examined from 26 plankton samples taken at stations in the eastern North Pacific Ocean along two latitudinal gradients, 150W between 21.55N and 14.00S, and 119W between 17.09N and 20.00S. The species was found at all stations except three between 17.9N and 12.6N along 119W. Variation within a sample was observed in the ventral attenuations [= spiniform outgrowths] of the first segment of antenna 1 of females, and specimens referable to P. abdominalis forma edentata could not be distinguished unequivocally from other females. Males with a strongly asymmetrical urosome and re-curved lateral seta on the left caudal ramus, referable to P. abdominalis forma abdominalis, were found, as were males with a quasi-symmetrical urosome and simple lateral seta on the left caudal ramus, referable to P. abdominalis forma abyssalis. Specimens of the latter form were not restricted to deep water but were present in samples taken as shallow as 200 m. Males with a slightly asymmetrical urosome, not as pronounced as that of P. abdominalis forma abdominalis, and with a simple lateral seta on the left caudal ramus, also were found. The degree of asymmetry among this third group of males was variable. There was no discernable pattern in depth or geographical distribution of either female or male morphs. Based on gradations of morphological states traditionally used to diagnose the different forms of P. abdominalis, the species appears to be variable, but the nominal forms should not be considered subspecies. Morphological variation among females and males of P. abdominalis should continue to be registered; in situations where groups of P. abdominalis can be clearly categorized, they should be denoted simply as morphs. Des femelles et des mles adultes de Pleuromamma abdominalis ont t examins dans 26 chantillons de plancton prlevs dans la partie orientale de l'Ocan Pacifique Nord,  diffrentes stations situes le long de deux gradients latitudinaux, 150W entre 21.55N et 14.00S, et 119W entre 17.09N et 20.00S. L'espce a t trouve dans toutes les stations sauf trois d'entre elles entre 17.9N et 12.6N le long du 119W. La variation  l'intrieur d'un chantillon a t observe au niveau des prominences ventrales [= vaginations pointues] du premier segment de l'antennule des femelles, et les spcimens attribus  P. abdominalis forma edentata n'ont pu tre distingus clairement des autres femelles. Les mles ayant un urosome fortement asymtrique et la soie latrale recourbe sur la rame caudale gauche, caractristiques de P. abdominalis forma abdominalis, ont t trouvs, de mme que des mles ayant un urosome quasi-symtrique et une soie latrale simple sur la rame caudale gauche, correspondant  P. abdominalis forma abyssalis. Les spcimens de cette dernire forme n'ont pas t trouvs uniquement en eau profonde, mais taient aussi prsents dans des chantillons prlevs  une profondeur faible de 200 m. Des mles prsentant un urosome lgrement asymtrique, cependant moins que chez P. abdominalis forma abdominalis, et ayant une soie latrale simple sur la rame caudale gauche, ont aussi t trouvs. Le degr d'asymtrie dans ce troisime groupe de mles tait variable. Il n'y avait pas de schma vident de distribution en fonction de la profondeur ou de la gographie, des morphotypes chez les mles comme chez les femelles.  partir des gradations d'tats morphologiques traditionnellement utiliss pour la diagnose des diffrentes formes de P. abdominalis, l'espce apparat trs variable, mais les formes nominales ne devraient pas tre considres comme des sous-espces. Les variations morphologiques des femelles et des mles devraient continuer  tre enregistres; dans les situations o des groupes de P. abdominalis peuvent tre clairement identifis, ces derniers devraient tre simplement nots comme des morphotypes.

20107929|Settlement of the Caribbean spiny lobster, Panulirus argus on artificial substrates was studied from September 2003 to April 2004 at Bimini, Bahamas. The small scale, shallowness, and distinctive current regime of Bimini make it a more readily interpretable recruitment system regarding species with complex life cycles. Spatiotemporal patterns of pueruli settlement on "Witham-type" collectors were examined monthly by sampling over three specific days scheduled around each new moon. Peak abundances of pueruli were found in September, November, and February, but with considerable spatial heterogeneity. The western portion of Bimini Lagoon, open to the ocean, revealed higher abundances of lobster larvae, while absence of pueruli at the broad eastern entrance, open to the shallow Great Bahama Bank, suggested little contribution to settlement in the Bimini nursery. This region apparently is primarily dependent on postlarvae supplied by the Gulf Stream. Pueruli settlement varied significantly over the three sampling days, occurring mostly 3 d before new moon, which differed from peak settlement times in other regional studies. Significantly smaller total lengths of postpueruli in the innermost section of the lagoon (i.e., the North Sound) suggest poorer environmental conditions at this site, probably reflecting poor food and shelter availability. Nevertheless, higher abundances of older juveniles in the North Sound demonstrated that this area has an ecologically important habitat for recruitment of spiny lobster to subsequent ontogenetic stages. The importance of recruitment processes for the successful management of this commercially exploited species is discussed. /// Entre Setembro de 2003 e Julho de 2004, foi estudado o assentamento dos estdios ps-larvares da lagosta Panulirus argus em substratos artificiais em Bimini, Bahamas. A dimenso, profundidade e regime de correntes de Bimini favorecem a interpretao da dinmica do recrutamento das espcies com ciclos de vida complexos. A amostragem em trs dias especficos no perodo da lua nova permitiu identificar os padres espao-temporais do assentamento das ps-larvas em colectores do tipo "Witham". Foram identificados picos de abundncia em Setembro, Novembro e Fevereiro, apesar de se verificar uma grande heterogeneidade espacial. A zona ocidental da Lagoa de Bimini apresentou maiores abundncias de recrutas, enquanto a quase inexistncia de ps-larvas na zona oriental sugere uma fraca contribuio da mesma para o recrutamento bentnico desta espcie. Aparentemente, o recrutamento de P. argus nesta regio depende do influxo de pslarvas trazidas pela Corrente do Golfo. A abundncia de ps-larvas variou bastante ao longo das trs amostragens mensais, ocorrendo principalmente trs dias antes da lua nova, ao contrrio do indicado por outros estudos. Juvenis significativamente menores encontrados na zona mais interior da lagoa (i.e. o North Sound) sugerem fracas condies ambientais neste local, provavelmente reflectindo a indisponibilidade de alimento e de habitat adequado. No entanto, a maior abundncia de juvenis tardios prova que o North Sound tem um papel importante no recrutamento desta espcie para estdios ontogenticos mais avanados. A importncia dos processos de recrutamento para a optimizao da gesto desta espcie comercialmente valiosa  tambm discutida.

Normalement les vulves de la femelle sont fermes par des opercules rigides, mais,  l'poque de la reproduction, ces opercules se dcalcifient et deviennent flexibles pour douze  vingt jours. Au cours de cette priode et pendant plusieurs jours, le mle transporte la femelle entre ses pinces, la carapace de celle-ci oriente vers son sternum  lui. Puis ils s'apparient, sternum contre sternum, partiellement ou compltement enfouis. Le mle lache la femelle, qui pond; aprs quoi, les opercules se rcalcifient. La femelle se reproduit pour la premire fois peu de temps aprs sa maturit, au moment d'une mue de pubert distincte. Par la suite, elle se reproduit chaque anne, mais sans muer de nouveau.

20104693|Le polymorphisme des couleurs dans l'arrangement des chromatophores tgumentaires a t tudi chez cinq populations intertidales d'Idotea granulosa sur l'le de Man. Les populations comprenaient quatre classes principales de phnotypes, uniformis (53% de tous les spcimens examins), granulosa (41%), lineata (3,9%), maculata (1,2%) et leurs combinaisons. Une variabilit extraordinaire est typique du phnotype granulosa avec 74 combinaisons diffrentes de taches dorsales. Les phnotypes lineata et maculata sont tablis en permanence dans tous les groupes d'ge, mais la frquence du phnotype granulosa est plus leve, et de faon significative, chez les juvniles (51%) que chez les adultes (25%). Ceci est d  un changements intrinsque de phnotype dpendant de l'ge, le type granulosa disparaissant avec l'ge. Dans des levages en laboratoire le changement phnotypique tait modifi par la taille initiale des juvniles (aucun changement phnotypique n'a t observ aprs la maturit sexuelle chez les individus de plus de 6 mm) et par la qualit de la nourriture algale. Les animaux nourris de Fucus pendant quatre semaines perdaient davantage leur variabilit phnotypique que ceux nourris de Gigartina ou de Cladophora pendant la mme priode. Une variabilit prononce, spatiale et temporelle, a t enregistre dans la composition phnotypique des populations, d'I. granulosa. Ces fluctuations sont en relation avec les changements saisonniers dans la microdistribution des idotides dans les algues intertidales. Gnralement les sous-populations vivant sous des amas d'algues et dans Corallina officinalis en hiver taient les plus variables en coloration. Les frquences d'uniformis taient les plus leves parmi les lits de Fucus en t. La fonction adaptative du polymorphisme de coloration, impliquant  la fois des lments hrditaires permanents et des lments induits par l'environment, semble tre de cacher les animaux et d'viter les prdateurs.
