20107810|The complete larval development of Pagurus simulans is described, based on laboratory rearing. The species has four zoeal stages and a megalopa. The larvae are described and illustrated, and detailed comparisons are made with other closely related species. Adults of P. simulans have been confused with those of P. brachiomastus and P. proximus. However, the larvae of P. simulans show morphological differences with those of similar species in the shape of the telson process and in the setal formulae of the appendages. /// Le dveloppement larvaire complet de Pagurus simulans obtenu en laboratoire est dcrit, L'espce a quatre stades zos et un stade mgalope. Cependant, les larves de P. simulans montrent des diffrences morphologiques par rapport aux espces similaires dans la forme du telson et dans le nombre et l'arrangement des soies des appendices.
20105498|A new species of porcellanid crab, Petrolisthes bolivarensis, is described as an additional member of the Petrolisthes galathinus species complex (Werding, 1983). The new species is distinguished morphologically from all other Caribbean members of the complex except from P. columbiensis by its conspicuously broad chelae. From P. columbiensis it is distinguished by the presence of only one epibranchial spine instead of two and three instead of four movable spines on the dactyli of the walking legs. Living specimens can be identified by their colouration, especially by a yellow to orange spot on the articulation of the dactylus of the chelae. /// Eine neue Porcellanidenart, Petrolisthes bolivarensis wird als weiteres Mitglied des Petrolisthes galathinus Artenkomplexes (Werding, 1983) beschrieben. Die neue Art ist morphologisch von allen anderen karibischen Arten des Komplexes auer P. columbiensis durch die auffllig breiten Scheren zu unterscheiden. Von P. columbiensis unterscheidet sie sich durch das Vorhandensein nur eines Epibranchialstachels und dreier anstatt vierer beweglicher Dornen an den Laufbeindactyli. Lebende Exemplare lassen sich an ihrer Frbung erkennen. besonders an einem gelb- bis orangefarbenen Punkt auf dem Gelenk des Scherendactylus.
20104473|Les Artemia obligatoirement parthnogntiques et obligatoirement sexues ont t mises en comptition dans des cultures en laboratoire. Les variabilits intra- en interspcifique dans les comptitions entre sexues et parthnogntiques ont t incorpores dans le modle le exprimental de mme que la variation du niveau alimentaire. Des populations sexues du nouveau Monde (A. franciscana) ont eu le dessus sur des populations parthnogntiques (A. parthenogenetica) dans 91% (30/33) des essais dont on pouvait tablir le score. Cependant, quand des populations parthnogntiques taient opposes aux populations sexues les plus troitement apparentes parmi celles de l'Ancien Monde (A. tunisiana) les sexues sexues taient limines dans 98% (43/44) des essais  score mesurable. Ces rsultats diffrent de ceux fournis par des travaux plus anciens (Wilbur, 1971; Browne, 1980b; Michaels & Bazzaz, 1986) et montrent que l'issue de la comptition sexues-parthnogntiques peut tre influence par certains facteurs, incluant aussi bien les conditions d'environnement que les origines gographiques et les caractres biologiques des populations opposes.
20104280|Des crabes Uca ont t recueillis en 25 localits ctires du golfe du Mexique et de la baie de Campche. Des radiales ont t tablies pour enregistrer les distributions intertidales, les salinits, les types de sol et la vgtation,  La Pesca, Tamaulipas,  Puerto Ceiba, Tabasco, et prs de Yukupeten, Yucatan. Les modles de distribution des Uca montrent des assemblages d'espces qui correspondent aux principales zones biogographiques ctires. Dans la zone semi-aride entre le Rio Grande et le Rio Panaco, six espces habitent la zone intertidale; quatre sont endmiques  la partie occidentale du golfe, alors que les deux autres sont des espces carabes. La zone humide entre le Rio Panaco et la lagune de Terminos, dans le Tabasco, compte six espces communes; trois sont endmiques du golfe et trois carabes. Sur la pninsule de Yucatan, six espces carabes occupent les rgions intertidales. Dans chaque zone, les espces montrent une distribution distincte le long des radiales intertidales. Dans la zone semi-aride, U. subcylindrica est davantage terrestre, et U. spinicarpa et U. panacea davantage aquatiques. Les autres espces sont associes avec des sols et vgtations d'une humidit moyenne. Dans la zone humide, quoique rare, U. burgersi est davantage terrestre, tandis que U. spinicarpa se trouve dans la partie infrieure de l'intertidal. Sur la pninsule de Yucatan, l'intertidal infrieur est habit par U. thayeri ou par U. speciosa. Ces tudes montrent clairement que les caractristiques daphiques de la zone intertidale sont des facteurs importants, en corrlation avec les distributions biogographiques et cologiques des crabes Uca tropicaux.
20111431|The capacity to discard and regenerate limbs under conditions of vital risk does increase the probability of survival. Eventually, however, this can negatively influence the performance of other aspects of fitness in the organism affected. The influence of autotomy and regeneration of one or both chelipeds on body growth and intermoult period in Petrolisthes laevigatus was studied; individuals in a broad range of sizes were captured and subjected to autotomy treatments in one or both chelipeds, contrasted against a control group without autotomy. Body growth was measured as the increment of the carapace width after a moulting event. At the same time, the duration of the intermoult was considered as the period of time between two succesive moults. Significantly higher values of response in body growth, intermoult duration, and growth rate were observed in the control group with respect to the group with autotomy treatments. In the growth responses, the phenomenon of suboptimal foraging can be discarded and therefore the more probable explanation for growth decrease is related to reduction of the intermoult period or for changes in the allocation of energy from overall growth processes into the limb regeneration process. /// La capacidad de perder y regenerar apndices corporales bajo condiciones de riesgo vital incrementa la probabilidad de sobrevivencia. Sin embargo, esto puede influenciar negativamente el desempeo de otros aspectos de la adecuacin biolgica en los organismos afectados. Nosotros estudiamos la influencia de la autotoma de uno o ambos quelpodos sobre el crecimiento corporal y el periodo de intermuda in Petrolisthes laevigatus. Individuos de un amplio rango de tamao fueron capturados y sometidos a tratamientos de autotoma de uno o ambos quelpodos, versus un grupo de control sin autotoma. El crecimiento corporal fue medido como el incremento del ancho cefalotorxico despus de un evento de muda. A su vez, la duracin de la intermuda se consider como el periodo de tiempo entre dos mudas sucesivas. Se observaron valores de respuesta significativamente mayores en el crecimiento corporal, duracin de la intermuda y tasa de crecimiento en el tratamiento control respecto de los tratamientos de autotoma. En la respuesta del crecimiento corporal, se descarta el forrajeo subptimo, por lo tanto, la explicacin causal ms probable para la disminucin del crecimiento se relaciona con la reduccin de la intermuda o modificaciones en la asignacin de energa desde procesos de crecimiento corporal hacia procesos de regeneracin de los apndices.
20101958|Eine biometrische Studie ist durchgefhrt worden ber morphometrische Daten von verschiedenen Segmenten der ersten und zweiten Chelipeden einer Population von Macrobrachium dayanum (Henderson, 1893). Die Population entstammt dem Dhakuria See, Kalkutta. Ziel der Studie war, zu prfen, ob ein signifikanter Sexualdimorphism in dieser Art besteht. Die multiple Regressionsanalyse und ein anschlieender Test der Gleichheit der Regressionskoeffizienten zwischen Mnnchen und Weibchen ergab den Nachweis eines Sexualmorphismus in den Segmenten des ersten und zweiten Chelipeds. Die Koeffizienten der multiplen Determination, welche durch die multiple Regressionsanalyse erhalten wurden, ergaben eine gute, lineare Beziehung zwischen Cephalothorax und verschiedenen Segmenten des ersten oder des zweiten Chelipeds fr beide Geschlechter, obgleich der Wert ganz allgemein bei den Weibchen hher lag als bei den Mnnchen. Der niedrigere Wert bei den Mnnchen ist zurckzufhren auf eine signifikante Variabilitt zwischen den juvenilen und adulten Mnnchen der Probe.
20107720|This study analysed growth and recruitment of Pacific yellowleg shrimp, Farfantepenaeus californiensis (Holmes, 1900) populations inhabiting semi-arid coastal lagoons and the continental shelf in a semi-arid, subtropical region in the Gulf of California, Mexico. Sampling of the yellowleg shrimp population was conducted in the coastal lagoon and offshore on a monthly basis from December 2001 to November 2003. The length of females ranged from 90 to 150 mm, greater lengths were more common offshore during April and July. In the lagoon, smaller specimens prevailed all year. There were no significant differences between lagoon and offshore in mean length to within 1% of probability. The dynamics of penaeid shrimp in semi-arid climate lagoons differ from the pattern found in more semi-tropical parts of the Mexican Pacific, where lagoons do not have permanent communication with the Gulf of California. Evidence suggests that this species can complete its life cycle in the lagoon system or on the continental shelf. /// Este estudio analiz el crecimiento y reclutamiento de la poblacin de camarn caf del Pacfico Farfantepenaeus californiensis (Holmes, 1900) en lagunas costeras y en la plataforma continental de una regin subtropical semirida en el Golfo de California, Mxico. Se realizaron muestreos biolgicos mensuales de las poblaciones de camarones en laguna y plataforma, de diciembre del 2001 a noviembre del 2003. La longitud total de las hembras se encontr en el intervalo de 90 a 150 mm, las tallas ms grandes se capturaron en la plataforma en los meses de abril y julio. En la laguna, camarones ms pequeos prevalecieron a lo largo del ao. La comparacin estadstica de la longitud media entre laguna y plataforma mostr que no existen diferencias significativas al 1% de probabilidad. La dinmica de las poblaciones de camarones Peneidos en lagunas de clima semirido difiere del patrn encontrado en zonas con clima ms semitropical del Pacfico mexicano, donde las lagunas no tienen comunicacin permanente con el Golfo de California. La evidencia sugiere que esta especie puede realizar el ciclo de vida en lagunas o en la plataforma costera.
23065220|In the present study, neurons isolated from the eyestalks of the Kuruma shrimp, Marsupenaeus japonicus were successfully cultured in vitro. The cultured neurons could be assigned to five different categories according to initial cell viability and the subsequent growth potential. They were "multipolar cells", "bipolar cells", "unipolar cells", "veilers", and "large cells". Most neurons were kept alive for more than 7 days. The most common cells in the culture were the bipolar cells, which survived up to two weeks. The neurons isolated by collagenase (type I) or papain had a similar number of alive cells and a similar survival time. The neurons were adapted to modified Medium 199 and Liebowitz's-15 medium, which were widely used in aquatic cell culture. A muscle extract from the Kuruma shrimp inhibited the outgrowth of neurons, while the survival period of neurons was extended for 4 days in media enriched with 20% foetal bovine serum. Our study provides valuable methods for further research on the electrophysiology of these neurons in vitro. Dans cette tude, des neurones isols  partir de pdoncules oculaires de la crevette Kuruma Marsupenaeus japonicus ont t cultivs in vitro avec succs. Les neurones cultivs peuvent tre spars en cinq diffrentes catgories en fonction de leur viabilit initiale et de leur potentiel de croissance qui suit. Ce sont:  cellules multipolaires ,  cellules bipolaires ,  cellules unipolaires ,  cellules en voile  et  grandes cellules . La plus part des neurones restent vivants pendant plus de 7 jours. Les cellules les plus communes ont t les cellules bipolaires, qui survivent jusqu' plus de deux semaines. Les neurones isols par la collagnase ou la papane prsentent le mme nombre de cellules vivantes et le mme temps de survie. Les neurones on t adapts au milieux utiliss pour les cultures de cellules aquatiques: le Milieu 199 modifi et le milieu de Liebowitz's-15. Un extrait de muscle de la crevette Kuruma a inhib la croissance des neurones, tandis que la priode de survie des neurones a t tendue de 4 jours dans un milieu enrichi avec 20% de srum de ftus de buf. Notre tude apporte des mthodes prcieuses pour les futures recherches en lectrophysiologie de ces neurones in vitro.

20104656|Une nouvelle espce de coppode de la famille des Sabelliphilidae, Herrmannella duggani sp. nov., est dcrite de la cte occidentale d'Irlande. Elle diffre des autres espces du genre par son rostre court et troitement arrondi. Elle est associe avec l'huitre Ostrea edulis et peut tre cause de dommages pour les branchies du bivalve.
20104361|We analysed and compared the effects of grouping vs. isolation on female reproduction in Helleria brevicornis, particularly with regard to the formation of marsupia and the production of offspring. 1. The percentage of females which developed a marsupium during the reproductive period was found to be significantly lower among isolated females than among females which were reared in groups. This decreased percentage was found to be partly due to the fact that isolated females developed incomplete marsupia, and partly to the belated occurrence of moult in these females (by lengthening of the duration of intermoult). Belated moults do not involve development of a marsupium when they occur after the end of the reproductive period. 2. Offspring production was also found to be lower in isolated females than in those studied under group conditions. However, this drop in productivity only took place at the second period of reproduction. 3. No group effect was found during the juvenile period; and even the first reproductive period was not affected, whether females had been isolated or reared in groups as juveniles. Group conditions had repercussions only in females which had reached the adult stage. The heterogeneity observed among Helleria as regards the sensitivity of juveniles and adults to group conditions is discussed, from the functional point of view, as possibly playing a role in population dynamics.
20104912|A summary of the results of the study of Albanian Decapoda is presented. Hundred-and-four species from the Albanian coast are reported here, 10 of which are new records for the country. Data on the geographical and bathymetric distribution as well as on the biotopes and abundance are presented. Species groupings are based on these data. Information about the reproductive period is given for some species. /// Un rsum des rsultats de l'tude des Dcapodes de la cte albanaise est prsent. Cent-quatre espces ont t identifies, dont dix sont des espces nouvelles pour l'Albanie. Des donnes relatives  la rpartition gographique et bathymtrique ainsi qu' la nature des biotopes et  l'abondance des espces sont prsentes. Des groupes d'espces ont t en fonction de ces informations. Des renseignements concernant la priode de reproduction sont donns pour certaines espces.
27743269|A new species of freshwater atyid shrimp, Caridina gueryi sp. nov. from Santo Island, Vanuatu, is described and illustrated herein. C. gueryi is similar to Caridina longirostris H. Milne Edwards, 1837, by its long rostrum, small eggs are of similar size, the termination of the telson in a posteromedian projection, the preanal carina with a distinct spine, and, in males, the appendix interna being clearly visible on the endopod of the first pleopod. However, both species can easily be distinguished as C. gueryi sp. nov. has a long stylocerite, always overreaching the basal segment of the antennular peduncle and lacks subapical teeth on the rostrum. /// Une nouvelle espce de crevette d'eau douce atyid, Caridina gueryi sp. nov. de l'le de Santo, Vanuatu, est dcrite et illustre ici. C. gueryi ressemble  C. longirostris H. Milne Edwards, 1837 par son long rostre, la taille petite de ses ufs, son telson se terminant par une dent subapicale, sa carne pranale avec une pine bien nette et son appendice interne bien visible sur l'endopode du premier plopode chez le mle. Elle diffre toutefois de cette espce par un long stylocrite dpassant toujours l'article basal du pdoncule antennulaire et par l'absence de dents apicales sur le rostre.
20103342|Based upon a large collection from the western Mediterranean, a description of a new genus of notodelphyid parasitic copepod from didemnid ascidians is given. The new genus Anoplodelphys is erected for three new species found in different host species. Anoplodelphys clearly belongs to the ophioseidimorph group of notodelphyids; within this group, the genus is mainly distinguished by the complete lack of true buccal appendages, feature in common with only four previously described species. The discovery of this new genus increases the polyphyletic trend within the ophioseidimorph notodelphyids. The host specificity is extremely narrow: all three new species of Anoplodelphys live in several species of the large genus Didemnum. Some remarks on the host parasite relationships conclude the paper.
23065231|Lipofuscin levels were investigated in snow crabs (Chionoecetes opilio) to assess the applicability of lipofuscin quantification as an age determining tool for this species. Localization and quantification of lipofuscin granules in the olfactory lobe cell mass (OLCM) of the brain were conducted by confocal microscopy and image analysis. The majority of immature crabs had no detectable lipofuscin. Crabs with a dirty carapace condition (an indication of greater age) had more lipofuscin (in terms of granule density, area fraction, and mean granule size) than crabs with a clean carapace condition; however, the amount of lipofuscin was much lower than that in more temperate species. Lipofuscin content was positively correlated with carapace size among crabs with a clean carapace but not among crabs with a dirty carapace. No correlation was observed between average lipofuscin granule fluorescent intensity and carapace width. OLCM neuron characteristics were also investigated. An inverse relationship was observed between neuron density and carapace width although it is unknown if this density reduction is due to a loss of neurons, an increase in size of the structures, or both. Furthermore, a positive relationship was observed between neuron size and carapace width. The range of neuron size also increased in larger crabs, suggesting the presence of mitotically active cells in the OLCM. Although lipofuscin levels were higher in dirty carapace condition (presumably older) crabs than in clean carapace crabs and increased with size (in mature, clean carapace snow crabs), the lack of detectable lipofuscin in most immature crabs, generally low levels of lipofuscin in mature crabs, and lack of increase with size in older (dirty carapace) crabs limits the applicability of this age estimation tool for this species. La possibilit d'utiliser la concentration de lipofuscine pour estimer l'ge du crabe des neiges (Chionoecetes opilio) a t examine. L'identification et la quantification des granules de lipofuscine dans les masses cellulaires du lobe olfactif (MCLO) ont t excutes par microscopie confocale et d'analyse d'image. La plupart des crabes immatures n'a pas eu de lipofuscine discernable. Les granules de lipofuscine ont t identifis chez tous les crabes matures mais la quantit de lipofuscine (en terme de densit, fraction de surface et taille moyenne des granules de lipofuscine) n'tait pas associe avec la largeur de carapace de l'animal. En outre, les crabes avec une carapace sale avaient significativement plus de lipofuscine que les crabes avec une carapace propre. Nanmoins, les quantits de lipofuscine taient moindre que chez les espces de rgions plus tempres. Aucune corrlation n'a t observe entre l'intensit de fluorescence moyenne des granules de lipofuscine et la largeur de carapace des crabes. Cette tude a galement examin les caractristiques histologiques des neurones des MCLO. Une relation inverse a t observe entre la densit des neurones et la taille des crabes et pourrait possiblement tre associe  une perte de cellules et/ou une augmentation de la taille des structures cellulaires existantes. De plus, une relation positive a t observe entre la taille des neurones et la largeur de carapace des crabes. L'tendue des tailles des neurones a galement largi chez les crabes de plus grande taille ce qui dcle la prsence de phase active de mitose dans les MCLO. En somme, malgrs que les quantits de lipofuscine taient plus leves chez les crabes avec une carapace sale (prsum plus gs) et augmentaient en fonction de la taille (chez les crabes matures avec une carapace propre), l'absence de lipofuscine discernable chez les crabes immatures, l'accumulation relativement faible chez les crabes matures et l'absence d'accumulation de lipofuscine en fonction de la taille chez les crabes avec une carapace sale suggrent des limites quant  l'application de la quantification de lipofuscine comme outil d'estimation d'ge chez cette espce.
20105010|The recent collection of two females and one male of Pseudorhombila xanthiformis Garth, 1940, in the Gulf of California, permits to complete the definition of this species previously known from female specimens only. P. xanthiformis was transferred to the genus Nanoplax Guinot, 1969, as N. garthi Guinot, 1969, nom. nov. A close examination of the sternum-abdomen organization and of the sexual pleopods of the male, and the comparison of this fresh material of P. xanthiformis, with P. quadridentata (Latreille, 1828), P. octodentata Rathbun, 1906, and P. guinotae Hernandez-Aguilera, 1982 on the one hand, and on the other hand with Nanoplax xanthiformis (A. Milne Edwards, 1880), the type-species of Nanoplax, lead us to the conclusion that Garth's species should be maintained in the genus Pseudorhombila A. Milne Edwards. /// La rcente rcolte de deux exemplaires femelles et d'un exemplaire mle de Pseudorhombila xanthiformis Garth, 1940, dans le Golfe de Californie, permet de complter la dfinition de cette espce, dont seule la femelle tait connue  ce jour, et qui avait t transfre dans le genre Nanoplax Guinot, 1969, sous le nom de N. garthi Guinot, 1969, nom. nov. L'examen des relations sternum-abdomen et des plopodes sexuels du mle, ainsi que la comparaison de ce matriel avec, d'une part, P. quadridentata (Latreille, 1828), P. octodentata Rathbun, 1906, et P. guinotae Hernandez-Aguilera, 1982, les trois autres espces connues, et d'autre part, avec Nanoplax xanthiformis A. Milne Edwards, 1880, l'espce-type du genre Nanoplax, nous permet de conclure que l'espce de Garth doit tre maintenue dans le genre Pseudorhombila A. Milne Edwards.

20102786|Nous avons tudi, chez le crabe Podophthalmus vigil, la dure des priodes de mue chez les animaux vivant au laboratoire, et avons cherch la relation entre la temprature et les constituants chimiques de l'eau de mer d'une part, et la population de crabes traversant la priode en dehors de l'intermue pris dans la mme eau d'autre part; nous avons constat que la temprature de l'eau exerce une grande influence sur l'abondance de crabes traversant cette priode. Nous avons suivi les changements de poids des crabes qui traversent le cycle de mue; le poids moyen pris entre deux stades C successifs tait de 34% environ. Nous avons examin l'influence de la grandeur de l'individu sur le grandissement subi  chaque priode de mue. A chaque priode, le pourcentage moyen de l'augmentation en largeur et en longueur a t respectivement de 18.05% et de 16.78%. La grandeur du crabe au dbut de la priode ne paraissait pas avoir affect le pourcentage d'augmentation en largeur.
20105121|The structure of the ovaries, oviducts, fertilization chamber and spermathecae of a mature female of Saduria entomon (L., 1758) is presented at the ultrastructural level. In the ovaries a proximal and a distal part is distinguished. The proximal part is only built of a flattened epithelium lying on a thick basal lamina. In the lumen of this part are previtellogenic and primary vitellogenic oocytes enveloped in follicle cells in which synthetic organelles are absent. Previtellogenic oocytes have large nuclei containing synaptonemal complexes and very large nucleoli with vacuoles of various sizes. Primary vitellogenic oocytes are characterized by intra-oocytic yolk formation inside the elements of the endoplasmic reticulum. The walls of the distal parts of the ovaries and oviducts are built of an epithelium and its surrounding muscle cells. On the lumen side, the oviduct epithelium is covered with a cuticle in which an epicuticle and an endocuticle can be distinguished. The fertilization chamber is built of large cells containing bundles of myofilaments in some areas. Their cytoplasm is rich in mitochondria and glycogen granules. The bundles of myofilaments occurring in the muscle cells of the ovaries, oviducts and the cells of the fertilization chamber are striated. They are characterized by a short sarcomer length (2.6 m and 3.5 m) and a high ratio of "thin-to-thick" filaments. The single epithelium building the spermathecae is separated from the haemocoel only by a basal lamina. The apical surface of the epithelium is covered with a thick intima which does not look like a cuticle. /// tude, sur le plan de l'ultrastructure, des ovaires, des oviductes, de la chambre de fertilisation et des spermathques d'une femelle de Saduria entomon (L. 1758). Dans les ovaires on distingue une partie proximale et une partie distale. La partie proximale est seulement faite d'un pithlium plat reposant sur une paisse lame basale. Dans la lumire de cette partie se trouvent des oocytes primaires prvitellogniques envelopps dans des cellules folliculaires, o manquent les organelles synthtiques. Les oocytes prvitellogniques ont des noyaux contenant des complexes synaptonmaux et de trs grands nucloles avec des vacuoles de diverses tailles. Les oocytes prvitellogniques sont caractriss par une formation de vitellus intra-oocytique  l'intrieur des lments du rticulum endoplasmique. Les parois des parties distales des ovaires et des oviductes sont construites d'un pithlium et de ses cellules musculaires environnantes. Du cte de la lumire, l'pithlium des oviductes est revtu d'une cuticule o on peut distinguer une pi- et une endocuticule. La chambre de fertilisation est faite de grandes cellules contenant des faisceaux de myofilaments dans certaines rgions. Leur cytoplasme est riche en mitochondries et en granules de glycogne. Les faisceaux de myofilaments dans les cellules musculaires des ovaires et des oviductes, et dans les cellules de la chambre de fertilisation sont stris. Ils sont caractriss par un court sarcomre (2,6 et 3,5 m) et une forte proportion de filaments "fins  pais". L'pithlium simple formant les spermathques n'est spar de l'haemocle que par une lame basale. La surface apicale de l'pithlium est revtue d'une paise intima qui ne ressemble pas  une cuticule.
27822624|Porcellanids are filter-feeders and most often inhabitants of the rocky intertidal and upper subtidal of all oceans. The limiting resource for these crabs is not food but space, which must meet the conditions of being hard, optimally exposed regarding water movement, and offering the crabs protection from predators. An optimal filtering spot is therefore actively controlled by one individual, usually the largest and strongest crab, through agonistic interactions. One southeast Pacific species, Allopetrolisthes punctatus (Gurin, 1835), displays a contrasting, atypical behaviour and settlement strategy, as it occupies open-spaced, unprotected, and therefore amply available space in the rocky intertidal. In order to investigate the biology of this species we carried out observations in the field and in aquariums in the vicinity of Coquimbo, Chile. A. punctatus seems to reduce predation pressure by building large swarms of individuals. The crabs tend to climb on top of each other, forming several layers. Adults were observed to carry juveniles on the carapace, chelipeds, and walking legs. We interpret this settlement strategy as an evolutionary novelty within the Porcellanidae, that allowed occupying non-colonized areas while maximizing survival of juveniles through a sort of "foster" parental care. Porcellaniden sind Filtrierer, die vorwiegend im Felslitoral der Meere leben. Hartsubstrate, die geschtzte Filtrierpltze in exponierten Situationen bieten, sind eine wichtige Voraussetzung fr das berleben der meisten Arten. Hier werden die besten Filtrierpltze von den strksten Individuen besetzt und gegen Konkurrenten der gleichen Art verteidigt. Die im sdlichen Ostpazifik beheimatete Art, Allopetrolisthes punctatus (Gurin, 1835) zeigt ein von diesem Muster abweichendes Verhalten. Sie besetzt exponierte, ungeschtzte Felsflchen, die konkurrierenden Arten nicht genutzt werden knnen. Wir beobachteten A. punctatus im Felslitoral bei Coquimbo, Chile und in Aquarien. Die Art scheint sich gegen den Ruberdruck zu behaupten, indem sie in der beschriebenen Situation in dichten Zusammenballungen bildet, in denen die Tiere oft in mehreren Schichten bereinander sitzen. Dabei tragen adulte Tiere in der Regel mehrere Juvenile auf ihrem Krper und den Extremitten. Wir deuten die beobachtete Form der Ansiedlung als evolutionre Neuheit innerhalb der Porcellaniden die es A. punctatus ermglicht, nicht besiedelte Felsflchen zu besetzen und gleichzeitig das berleben der Jungtiere durch eine Art von "Pflegeelternschaft" zu optimieren.

20103844|Une comparaison des antennes de tous les sous-ordres d'isopodes montre que la variabilit du nombre des articles, qui est apparente dans la littrature taxonomique, est de  une mauvaise interprtation de la morphologie des antennes. Par consquent des caractristiques sont dcrites ici, qui rendent possible l'homologisation des articles antennaires. La premire antenne (antennule) comprend fondamentalement 3 articles pdonculaires et un flagelle multiarticul. Sur ce qui est primitivement le premier article du flagelle on peut observer des soies sensorielles plumeuses, les articles suivants portant des soies simples et souvent des aesthetascs, et le dernier article n'ayant que des soies simples et une soie plumeuse. La deuxime antenne se compose fondamentalement de 6 articles pdonculaires dont le premier surtout (praecoxa) est rduit, et un flagelle multiarticul avec plusieurs soies simples. Le dernier article du pdoncule diffre des articles du flagelle par ses soies sensorielles plumeuses. On peut rencontrer des difficults pour dterminer les homologies  l'aide des caractristiques dcrites ici dans le cas des antennes extrmement courtes (Epicarides, Oniscodes).
20107811|Activity patterns of sub-tidal free-roaming green crabs, Carcinus maenas (L., 1758), were monitored in real time using radio-acoustic positional telemetry in New Harbour, Nova Scotia, Canada. Activity patterns were monitored relative to time of day and tidal height. Periodogram analysis showed activity was circatidally rhythmic, as activity increased with rising tides and decreased with falling tides. Potential proximate and ultimate causes of observed circatidal rhythmicity in C. maenas are discussed. In contrast to other studies, no circadian rhythm was observed in crab activity. This is likely because other studies have been conducted in the intertidal zone, where desiccation and predation stress favour reduced activity during daylight hours. This study provides the first demonstration of circatidal rhythmicity in sub-tidal free-roaming C. maenas. /// Les modles d'activit des crabes verts subtidaux errants, Carcinus maenas (L., 1758), ont t dtermins en temps rel, en utilisant la tlmtrie radio-acoustique positionnelle  New Harbour, Nouvelle-Ecosse, Canada. Les modles d'activit taient suivis par rapport au moment de la journe et  la hauteur de la mare. L'analyse du priodogramme a montr que l'activit tait calque sur le rythme des mares, car l'activit augmentait avec les mares montantes et diminuait avec les mares descendantes. Les causes potentielles directes et indirectes de cette rythmicit circatidale observe chez C. maenas sont discutes. Contrairement  d'autres tudes, aucun rythme circadien n'a t observ dans l'activit du crabe. Ceci s'explique probablement parce que les autres tudes ont t menes dans la zone intertidale, o le stress d  la dessiccation et  la prdation favorise une activit rduite pendant la journe. Cette tude fournit la premire dmonstration de la rythmicit circatidale chez les C. maenas subtidaux errants.

20105567|The effects of hydrodynamism on the quantitative and qualitative composition of the midlittoral hard substratum fauna of Peracarida were studied in the Euripos Straits (Aegean Sea) where a tidal current of graded intensity occurs. Overall, 22 species of peracaridans were identified. As hydrodynamic intensity increased, significant changes in the structure of the peracaridan assemblage, in terms of species mean abundance and species number, were observed. An analysis of feeding types among the species found demonstrated a dominance of detritus deposit feeders in all sampling areas, while the abundance of detritus suspension feeders seems to increase with the intensity of hydrodynamism. Modifications in the composition of the peracaridan assemblage are related to the different levels of physical disturbance, caused by the increasing hydrodynamism, on the corresponding midlittoral communities in the three sampling areas and also with the availability of food resources. /// Les effets de l'hydrodynamisme sur la composition quantitative et qualitative de la faune de Pracarides des substrats durs et mi-littoraux ont t tudis dans le dtroit d'Euripos (mer Ege) o est prsent un courant de mare d'intensit graduelle. En tout, 22 espces de Pracarides ont t identifies. Quand l'intensit hydrodynamique s'accrot, des changements significatifs en termes d'abondance moyenne d'espces et de nombre d'espces sont observs dans la structure de l'assemblage de Pracarides. Une analyse des types de nutrition des diffrentes espces trouves, a montr une dominance des consommateurs de dtritus dposs dans toutes les aires de rcoltes tandis que cette abondance des consommateurs de dtritus en suspension semble s'accrotre avec l'intensit de l'hydrodynamisme. Les modifications de composition de l'assemblage de Pracarides sont lies aux diffrents niveaux de perturbations physiques causes par l'accroissement de l'hydrodynamisme, sur les communauts correspondantes dans les trois aires de rcoltes et aussi  la disponibilit des ressources en nourriture.
20107529|The distribution of decapod crustaceans on soft substrata was studied at two sites, Montalto di Castro and Gulf of Gaeta, in the central Mediterranean Sea (Tyrrhenian Sea). In the whole area, a total of 16 species of decapods (6 Natantia, Caridea; 4 Reptantia Macrura, Thalassinidea; 2 Anomura; and 4 Brachyura) were collected by a Van Veen grab. The decapod distribution seems to be influenced by granulometric composition rather than by depth. Some species demonstrated an affinity for a substratum that differs with respect to published literature records. /// Nel presente lavoro  stata studiata la distribuzione dei crostacei decapodi di substrato mobile in due aree, Montalto di Castro e Golfo di Gaeta, del Mar Mediterraneo Centrale (Mar Tirreno). La distribuzione dei decapodi sembra essere influenzata dalla composizione granulometrica piuttosto che dalla profondit. 20105318|Adult freshwater crayfish, Austropotamobius pallipes, were maintained in the laboratory in such a way that mating, spawning, and maternal egg incubation took place under controlled conditions. This allowed to obtain data on reproductive biology from spawning to stage 2 juveniles. Three different thermal treatments were tested during embryonic development: a constant temperature of 11C, ambient room temperature, and the incorporation of a cold period (3 weeks at 4C). Females used in the three treatments tested were of a similar size (Mean Carapace Length  Mean Standard Error = 34.06  0.11 mm). Stage 2 juvenile production was not significantly different among the three regimes applied. The highest mean number of stage 2 juveniles per female (23) was obtained in animals maintained at constant temperature. Statistical differences were not detected, neither with regard to reproductive efficiency, in which the best value (33%) again was obtained at constant temperature. Although thermic manipulation thus did not provide better results as regards efficiency, this practice allowed to obtain stage 2 juveniles in different batches, spaced in time. /// Cangrejos de ro de la especie Austropotamobius pallipes se mantuvieron en laboratorio durante la fase reproductiva. De esta forma, apareamiento, puesta y todo el proceso de incubacin maternal de los huevos tuvieron lugar bajo condiciones controladas. Esto permiti la obtencin de datos biolgicos reproductivos desde la puesta hasta el segundo estado juvenil. Durante el desarrollo embrionario, se ensayaron tres tratamientos trmicos: temperatura constante de 11C, temperatura ambiente y la inclusin de un periodo fro (3 semanas a 4C). Las hembras presentaron una talla similar en los tres tratamientos (Longitud Media de Cefalotrax  E.S.M. = 34,06  0,11 mm). La produccin de juveniles estado 2 no mostr diferencias significativas entre regmenes trmicos, aunque el nmero medio ms alto obtenido por hembra (23) correspondi a animales mantenidos a temperatura constante. Igualmente, tampoco fueron detectadas diferencias significativas en los resultados de eficiencia reproductiva. El valor ms elevado (33%) fue obtenido con temperatura constante. Aunque la manipulacin trmica no mejor significativamente los resultados de eficiencia, esta prctica permite la obtencin de juveniles estado 2 en diferentes lotes dentro de amplios mrgenes de tiempo.

20102138|21 species of Cumacea have been collected during 10 dredgings in the Ionian Sea and the northern Aegean Sea. Two new species are described: Makrokylindrus aegaeus and Diastylis charcoti. The vertical distribution of the species in the Eastern Mediterranean is the same as that in the Western Mediterranean. Cumacea seem to be rare or absent at depths exceeding 4000 m.
41038620|Agricultural channels can be important habitats for aquatic species inhabiting agricultural areas. However, water supply in agricultural channels can vary substantially with types of agriculture and irrigation/drainage system, and thereby affect the viability of local populations of aquatic species. In this study, we focused on the amphidromous freshwater atyid shrimp Caridina leucosticta. To clarify whether C. leucosticta utilizes agricultural channels as a habitat in relation to fluctuations in the water supply, we conducted a series of field surveys on the distribution of this shrimp in a rice paddy drainage channel (spring-fed channel) around the Furu River, central Japan, during July and December 2008. Large numbers of C. leucosticta had migrated into that drainage channel. Water from the adjacent rice paddies had disappeared by October, because irrigation was stopped, but the water level in the drainage channel was maintained by a supply of spring water. By mid-November the supply of spring water had almost disappeared, then the channel nearly dried up, and many shrimps were concentrated in an isolated water pool in the channel. Thus, habitat fragmentation of C. leucosticta occurred in terms of water (dis-) continuity. This water pool dried up completely by mid-December. We found many dead individuals of C. leucosticta in the dried-up area of the channel. These results indicate that agricultural channels can be an important temporal habitat for amphidromous freshwater shrimps, but that the drying-up of the channels can lethally affect migrating atyid shrimps. Les canaux agricoles peuvent tre des habitats importants pour les espces aquatiques rurales. Cependant l'alimentation en eau des canaux agricoles peut varier substantiellement avec le type d'agriculture, les systmes d'irrigation/drainage et en consquence affectent la viabilit des populations locales des espces aquatiques. Cette tude est centre sur la crevette atyide amphidrome d'eau douce Caridina leucosticta. Pour claicir si C. leucosticta utilise les canaux agricoles comme habitat en relation avec la fluctuation de l'apport en eau, nous avons conduit une srie de relevs de terrain sur la distribution de cette crevette dans un canal de drainage de rizire (eau de source) prs de la rivire Furu, Japon central, durant Juillet et Dcembre 2008. Un grand nombre de C. leucosticta ont migr dans ce canal de drainage. L'eau des rizires adjacentes a disparu en Octobre, car l'irrigation a stopp, mais le niveau de l'eau a t maintenu par un apport d'eau de source. Mi-Novembre l'apport d'eau de source a presque disparu, ce qui a pratiquement assch le canal, et de nombreuses crevettes taient concentres dans des flaques isoles du canal. Ainsi la fragmentation de l'habitat de C. leucosticta est de  la discontinuit en eau. Ces flaques d'eau ont sch compltement mi-Dcembre. De nombreux individus morts ont t trouvs dans parties assches du canal. Ces rsultats indiquent que les canaux agricoles peuvent tre un important habitat temporaire pour les crevettes d'eau douce amphidromes, mais que l'asschement de ces canaux peut affecter de facon ltale les crevettes atyids migratrices.

20105079|The reproductive seasonality and the growth rate of Balanus amphitrite were studied in Lake Timsah in the mid-region of the Suez Canal. Some nauplius larvae were recorded in each month, but they were abundant only from April to October. Cyprid larvae were most abundant from July to August, and settlement from June to October. At different stations in the lake, frequency of settlement was related to biotic rather than abiotic factors. Growth rate was faster in summer than winter, and was related to water quality. The seasonal pattern of reproduction in Lake Timsah reflected the marked seasonality in environmental conditions. /// La saison de reproduction et le taux de croissance de Balanus amphitrite ont t tudis dans le lac Timsah, dans la rgion moyenne du canal de Suez. Quelques nauplii ont t recueillis chaque mois, mais ils n'taient abondants que d'avril  octobre. C'est en juillet et aot que les larves cypris taient les plus abondantes, et, pour les fixations, c'tait de juin  octobre. En diffrentes stations, la frquence des fixations tait plutt lie  des facteurs biotiques qu'a des facteurs abiotiques. Le taux de croissance tait plus lev en t qu'en hiver, et tait en relation avec la qualit de l'eau. En ce qui concerne les poques de reproduction dans le lac Timsah, elles refltaient le caractre saisonnier trs marqu des conditions d'environment.
20107839|A single copepod specimen belonging to Pseudocyclops but with characteristics never observed within the known species of the genus, was collected in wash water from specimens of Pinna nobilis Linnaeus, 1758 (Mollusca, Bivalvia). The most important characteristic useful to distinguish P. costanzoi n. sp. from all other species of the genus, is the tooth on the 5th pedigerous somite, but also unique within the genus is the setation of the endopod of leg 5, with one seta on the first and two setae on the second endopodal segment. The discovery of P. costanzoi n. sp. increases the number of Mediterranean species of Pseudocyclops to four. Of these, P. xiphophorus Wells, 1967 and P. costanzoi n. sp., are known to occur, until now, as far as the Mediterranean Sea is concerned, only in Faro Lake, Sicily. /// Un singolo esemplare di un copepode appartenente al genere Pseudocyclops, ma con caratteristiche mai osservate tra le specie note nel genere,  stato raccolto dall'acqua di lavaggio di un esemplare di Pinna nobilis Linnaeus, 1758 (Mollusca, Bivalvia). La pi importante caratteristica, utile a distinguere P. costanzoi n. sp. dalle altre specie del genere,  la presenza di un dente sul 5 somite pedigero, ma  anche unica nel genere la formula setale dell'endopodite del quinto piede, con una setola sul primo e due sul secondo segmento dell'endopodite. La scoperta di P. costanzoi n. sp. porta a quattro il numero delle specie mediterranee del genere Pseudocyclops. Di queste, P. xiphophorus Wells, 1967 e P. costanzoi n. sp., sono state trovate finora, nel Mar Mediterraneo, solo nel Lago di Faro (Sicilia).

20105638|A total of 4990 specimens belonging to nine species of decapod crustaceans were examined to study the incidence of trawling lesions; 23% of these specimens showed lesions on the body. Low correlations (R = 0.58) were found between trawling parameters and crustacean lesions, with a major influence of time of fishing, the quantity of fish and crustaceans caught, and the depth of the haul. Based on these results, the method used for catching fish could be considered important for fish quality management. /// 4990 esemplari appartenenti a 9 specie di crostacei decapodi sono stati esaminati al fine di studiare l'incidenza delle lesioni da pesca; il 23% degli individui mostrava lesioni sul corpo. Una bassa correlazione (R = 0.58)  stata evidenziata tra i parametri di pesca e le lesioni riscontrate, con una maggiore influenza della durata della cala, della quantit di pesci e crostacei e della profondit della cala. Sulla base di tali risultati, il metodo di pesca potrebbe essere considerato importante per il management della qualit del pescato.
20107469|Five diets, i.e., fish flesh (FF), shrimp flesh (SF), clam foot (CF), polychaete worm (PW), a formulated diet (FD), and a mixture of the preceding five diets (MD), were fed to Chinese shrimp, Fenneropenaeus chinensis (initial weight 1.53  0.05 g) for 30 days to investigate the effects of different diets on the energy allocation and body composition of Chinese shrimp. It was found that the model of allocation of ingested energy changed according to diet, and significant differences existed among treatments. Moisture, protein, lipid, ash content, and gross energy content of shrimp fed different diets also showed significant differences. The relationships between food conversion efficiency (FCE) and gross energy to protein content ratio (GE: P), between net conversion efficiency (NCE) and GE: P, between FCE and lipid content (L), and between NCE and L were well expressed with their respective models. The optimal crude lipid (L) content and GE: P were calculated from these models on the assumption that when optimal FCE and NCE were reached, then the L and GE: P were optimum. The optimal crude lipid contents were 23.1%, 29.08%, 19.82%, and 24.93% while the FCE and NCE were described in terms of protein and energy. When FCE and NCE were described in terms of dry matter, protein, and energy, the optimal GE: P were 36.11 KJ/g, 38.75 KJ/g, 37.22 KJ/g, 37.43 KJ/g, 38.49 KJ/g, and 37.32 KJ/g, respectively. The results indicate that natural diets are feasible to be used for studying the nutritional requirements and to analyse the primary ingredients that affect the utilization of these by the shrimp. /// Cinq types de nourriture, soit la chair de poisson (FF), la chair de crevette (SF), le pied de coquillage (CF), les vers polychtes (PW), une formule compose (FD), et un mlange des cinq prcdents types (MD), ont t proposs  la crevette chinoise Fenneropenaeus chinensis (poids initial 1,53  0,05 g) pendant 30 jours, afin d'tudier les effets des diffrentes nourritures sur le gain d'nergie et la composition du corps de la crevette chinoise. On a mis en vidence que le modle de rpartition de l'nergie ingre variait suivant l'aliment, et des diffrences significatives existaient en fonction des traitements. L'humidit, les protines, les lipides, le contenu en cendres et le contenu en nergie globale de la crevette nourrie selon diffrents rgimes ont montr aussi des diffrences significatives. Les relations entre l'efficacit de conversion de la nourriture (FCE) et le rapport entre l'nergie globale et le contenu en protines (GE: P), entre l'efficacit de conversion nette (NCE) et GE: P, entre FCE et le contenu lipidique (L), et entre NCE et L ont t bien exprims avec leurs modles respectifs. Le contenu optimal en lipides bruts (L) et le rapport GE: P ont t calculs  partir de ces modles en supposant que, lorsque les valeurs optimales de FCE et NCE taient atteintes, les valeurs de L et NCE taient optimales. Les teneurs optimales en lipides bruts taient 23,1%, 29,08%, 19,82%, et 24,93% quand FCE et NCE taient exprimes en termes de protines et d'nergie. Quand les valeurs de FCE et NCE taient dcrites en termes de matires sches, de protines, et d'nergie, les valeurs optimales de GE: P taient 36,11 kJ/g, 38,75 kJ/g, 37,22 kJ/g, 37,43 kJ/g, 38,49 kJ/g et 37,32 kJ/g, respectivement. Les rsultats indiquent qu'il est possible d'utiliser les aliments naturels pour tudier les besoins nutritionnels et pour analyser les composants primaires qui affectent l'utilisation de ceux-ci par la crevette.

20105039|Temporal and spatial variation in relative abundance and production of spiny lobster Panulirus marginatus in the northwestern Hawaiian Islands has been documented from commercial catch-and-effort and research trapping data. Data on benthic habitat collected from scuba transects and data on oceanography, and the pelagic distribution of larval lobsters are used to explain adult lobster temporal and spatial variation. We find the amount of 5-30 cm vertical relief and the height of bank summits explain considerable spatial variation in lobster abundance. Considerable interannual variation in lobster production at the northwestern portion of the fishing grounds is explained by the sea level gradient along the archipelago which appears to measure the strength of the Subtropical Counter Current. Evidence of a 50% drop in recruitment to the fishery has been observed since 1989. Recruitment overfishing and a decadal climate event may be responsible for this recruitment decline. /// La variation temporelle et spatiale de l'abondance relative et de la production de la langouste Panulirus marginatus dans les les Hawaii nord-occidentales a t dtermine  partir des donnes commerciales des prises et effort de pche d'une part et des donnes des captures exprimentales d'autre part. Des donnes sur l'habitat benthique obtenues grce  des transects au scuba et des donnes sur l'ocanographie et la distribution plagique des formes larvaires sont utilises pour expliquer la variation temporelle et spatiale des adultes. Nous avons trouv qu'un relief vertical de 5-30 cm et la hauteur des sommets de ce banc expliquent une variation spatiale considrable de l'abondance des langoustes. La variation considrable de la production de langoustes suivant les annes, dans la partie nord-occidentale des zones de pche s'explique par le gradient du niveau de la mer le long de l'archipel, qui semble mesurer la force du contre courant subtropical. Une chute de 50% du recrutement de la pcherie a t observe depuis 1989. La surpche et un vnement climatique dcennal peuvent tre responsables du dclin de ce recrutement.

This species is very widespread over North Africa, where it is probably endemic. Its geographical distribution in Tunisia is defined. Celle-ci se rencontre dans diffrents tages bioclimatiques et son abondance semble diminuer suivant un gradient Nord-Sud.

20111421|The galatheoid, Eumunida picta, primarily has been reported from deep sea corals and methane seeps; we examined its association with the deep-sea coral, Lophelia pertusa in a non-seep habitat. We used a remotely operated vehicle (ROV) to quantify invertebrate epifauna on six shipwrecks in the Gulf of Mexico in depths of 150 to 1950 m during summer, 2004. Video transects were conducted from over the shipwrecks to 333 m away from the wrecks. Eumunida picta specimens were observed on one of the six wrecks, from 530 to 560 m depth. When present, E, picta were primarily in association with Lophelia pertusa. Eumunida picta were associated with L. pertusa in &gt80% of the observations and were usually within 1 m of the coral when not in direct contact. The coral may be providing an optimal feeding location for the galatheoid, refuge from predation, or some combination of those. /// Le Galatheoidea Eumunida picta a t tout d'abord dcouvert dans les coraux profonds et les suintements de mthane; nous avons examin son association avec le corail profond, Lophelia pertusa dans un habitat non suintant. Nous avons utilis un systme tlopr  grande profondeur (ROV, Remotely Operated Vehicle) pour quantifier l'pifaune invertbre sur six paves de bateaux dans le golfe du Mexique  des profondeurs de 150  1950 m au cours de l't 2004. Des transects vidos ont t raliss depuis les paves jusqu' 333 m autour de celles-ci. Des spcimens d'Eumunida picta ont t observs sur l'une des six paves,  une profondeur de 530  560 m. Quand ils taient prsents, les spcimens de E. picta taient associs au Lophelia pertusa. Les Eumunida picta taient associs  L. pertusa dans plus de 80% des observations et taient habituellement prsents dans une zone de 1 m autour des coraux quand ils n'taient pas en contact direct. Les coraux pourraient procurer  ce Galatheoidea un excellent site pour se nourrir, un refuge face  la prdation ou une combinaison des deux.
20107946|Changes in enzymatic activities and protein content of leg muscle and hepatopancreas tissue of two deep-sea crabs were studied after 34 days of food deprivation. Geryon longipes and Bythograea thermydron are the most abundant deep-sea crab species in their respective environment. Geryon longipes dwells on the middle and lower slope of the northwestern Mediterranean Sea and has a bathymetric range between 450 and 1950 m depth. Bythograea thermydron dwells in Pacific hydrothermal vent sites and has a bathymetric range between 2000 and 3000 m depth. After 34 days under laboratory conditions, citrate synthase activities in the hepatopancreas of G. longipes and B. thermydron were found to be much lower in food-deprived crabs compared to fed crabs. In both species, no lactate dehydrogenase activity was detected in hepatopancreas tissue, and no food deprivation effects were observed for either lactate dehydrogenase or citrate synthase activities in leg muscle tissue. No changes in protein were found after 34 days of food deprivation, either. Enzyme activities of fed and food-deprived specimens maintained in the laboratory encompassed the natural range of variation measured in freshly caught crabs of both species. Lactate dehydrogenase, citrate synthase, and protein content of freshly caught specimens of G. longipes were significantly lower than in freshly caught specimens of B. thermydron. The results are discussed taking into account the surrounding environmental features both species encounter and from the point of view of the potential use of citrate synthase activity as an indicator of nutritional condition in deep-sea crustaceans. /// Los cambios en las actividades enzimticas y en el contenido de protenas en los tejidos de msculo y de hepatopncreas de dos cangrejos de gran profundidad fueron estudiados despus de 34 das de ayuno. Geryon longipes y Bythograea thermydron son las dos especies de cangrejo de gran profundidad ms abundantes en sus respectivos hbitats. Geryon longipes se distribuye en el talud medio e inferior del Mediterrneo noroeste y presenta un rango batimtrico entre los 450 y 1950 m de profundidad. Bythograea thermydron se distribuye en las fumarolas hidrotermales del Pacfico y presenta un rango batimtrico entre los 2000 y 3000 m de profundidad. Despus de estar 34 das en condiciones de laboratorio, las actividades de la citrato sintetasa en el hepatopncreas de G. longipes y B. thermydron fueron inferiores en los cangrejos mantenidos en ayunas comparadas con las actividades de los cangrejos alimentados. En ninguna de las dos especies se detecto actividad de la enzima lactato deshidrogenasa del hepatopncreas, y no se observaron efectos del ayuno en la actividad de la lactato deshidrogenasa ni de la citrato sintetasa del tejido muscular. Tampoco se encontraron cambios en el contenido de protenas despus de 34 das de ayuno en ninguna de las dos especies estudiadas. Las actividades enzimticas de los individuos alimentados y la de los no alimentados, ambos mantenidos en laboratorio, abarcaron el rango de variacin natural encontrado en los cangrejos de ambas especies analizados inmediatamente despus de ser capturados. La actividad de la lactato deshidrogenasa, de la cintrato sintetasa, y el contenido en protenas de los individuos recin capturados de G. longipes fueron significativamente inferiores con respecto a los individuos recin capturados de B. thermydron. Los resultados se discuten en base a las condiciones ambientales de cada uno de los hbitats donde las especies se distribuyen y en base al potencial uso de la actividad de la citrato sintetasa como indicador de la condicin nutricional de los crustceos de gran profundidad.
20105295|A new species of the genus Mesocyclops (Cyclopoida, Cyclopidae) is described from New Caledonia. This is the first report of the genus for the copepod fauna of New Caledonia. Mesocyclops medialis n. sp. belongs to the thermocyclopoides-group. It shows a great similarity to M. isabellae Dussart & Fernando, 1988 (India) and with the two species M. woutersi and M. affinis described by Van de Velde (1987) from Papua-New-Guinea. Some common characters with the Australian M. brooksi Pesce, De Laurentiis & Humphreys, 1996 are also discussed. /// Une espce nouvelle du genre Mesocyclops (Cyclopoida, Cyclopidae) est dcrite de Nouvelle-Caldonie. C'est la premire trouvaille du genre pour la faune coppodologique de Nouvelle-Caldonie. Mesocyclops medialis n. sp. appartient au groupe thermocyclopoides. Il prsente de grandes ressemblances avec M. isabellae & Dussart & Fernando, 1988 (Inde) et avec les deux espces M. woutersi et M. affinis dcrites par Van de Velde (1987) de Papouasie-Nouvelle Guine. Elle prsente par ailleurs des caractres communs avec l'espce australienne M. brooksi Pesce, De Laurentiis & Humphreys, 1996.
20102641|Les auteurs dcrivent l'electrocardiogramme de la Daphnie enregistr  l'aide de microlectrodes. La forme des ondes varie. La frquence du cur varie entre 3 et 9 battements par seconde, et l'amplitude entre 100 et 500 V. Les effects de l'acide gamma-aminobutyrique (GABA) et de la picrotoxine ont t enregistrs. L'administration de GABA a diminu la frquence des battements, tandis que la picrotoxine a sembl l'augmenter.
20105598|Law courts occasionally have had to deal with evidence on the measurement of rock lobsters that have been cooked, or sometimes both cooked and frozen. A point of contention in legal argument involving breaches of legal minimum size regulation, has been whether processing the lobsters could have affected measurement of the original carapace length. We show that Panulirus cygnus shrink slightly with cooking (p &lt 0.01) and with freezing (p &lt 0.01), but that this shrinkage is minimal. The overall shrinkage in carapace length from the combination of cooking and freezing is 0.11 mm (s.e. = 0.0076). These results are compared with a similar study on the effects of cooking on the carapace length of Jasus edwardsii. In light of results from this investigation, a tolerance of 0.3 mm is considered appropriate before prosecuting fishers with cooked, or cooked and frozen sub-legal sized western rock lobsters. /// Les cours de tribunaux ont eu de temps en temps  traiter des mesures des langoustes ayant t cuits ou quelquefois  la fois cuits et congels. Un point de litige parmi les arguments juridiques concernant les infractions au rglement sur la taille lgale minimale a t que les procds de prparation des langoustes pourraient affecter la longueur originale de la carapace. Nous avons montr que Panulirus cygnus rtrcit lgrement  la cuisson (p &lt 0,01) et  la conglation (p &lt 0,01) mais que ce rtrcissement est minime. Le rtrcissement de longueur de la carapace par combinaison de la cuisson et de la conglation est de 0,11 mm (s.e. 0,0076). Ces rsultats ont t compars  ceux d'une tude comparable sur les effets de la cuisson sur la longueur de la carapace de Jasus edwardsii. A la lumire des rsultats de cette investigation, une tolrance de 0,3 mm doit tre considre comme approprie avant de poursuivre les pcheurs qui ont des langoustes cuits, ou cuits et congels de taille minimale.
20106301|The genus Oxinasphaera Bruce, 1997, distributed throughout the Indo-West Pacific region, is composed of twenty-four named and a few unnamed species. Oxinasphaera penteumbonata n. sp. is here described from specimens from the Yemeni coast of the Arabian peninsula and from the Indian Ocean coast of Somalia. The species is characterized by five distinct, acute spikes on the epistome. A comparison is made with other species of the genus present in the Indian Ocean. The key to the world's species of the genus is modified to host the new species. /// Il genere Oxinasphaera Bruce. 1997, con distribuzione Indopacifica, annovera attualmente ventiquattro specie pi alcune non ancora descritte. La specie Oxinasphaera penteumbonata n. sp. viene descritta esaminando campioni provenienti dalle coste della Somalia e dello Yemen. Questa nuova specie risulta caratterizzata dalla morfologia dell'epistoma che presenta cinque acuti "spikes".  stata effettuata una comparazione morfologica con le altre specie del genere e modificata la chiave dicotomica proposta da Bruce (1997) per accogliere anche questa nuova specie.
20104852|The identity of Harrovia albolineata Adams & White, 1849, the type species of the genus Harrovia Adams & White, 1849, is discussed. The confusion in the identities between H. albolineata and H. longipes Lanchester, 1900, is clarified. The two species are distinguished by numerous adult and larval characters. The range variation of the adult morphology within each species is discussed. The first zoea of H. albolineata s. str. is described for the first time. /// L'identit de Harrovia albolineata Adams & White, 1849, espce-type du genre Harrovia Adams & White, 1849, est discute. La confusion entre H. albolineata et H. longipes Lanchester, 1900 est claircie. Les deux espces se distinguent par de nombreux caractres larvaires et adultes. La variabilit de la morphologie de l'adulte est discute pour chaque espce. Le premier stade zo de H. albolineata s. str. est dcrit pour la premire fois.
23034311|The spatio-temporal distribution and the biology of supra-littoral amphipods were studied in spring and autumn on two Tunisian beaches: Bizerte (northern Tunisia) and the central Gulf of Gabs (southern Tunisia); the latter is characterized by the most substantial tidal amplitude in the entire Mediterranean basin. Quadrats of 0.25 m 2 were used along a transect in order to determine both quantitative and qualitative ecological parameters. The results showed that, whatever the sampling season and apart from some beetles found in spring, the only species found on Gabs beach was the supra-littoral amphipod Talitrus saltator, while on Bizerte beach three species were identified: Talitrus saltator, Deshayesorchestia deshayesii, and Orchestia gammarellus. Furthermore, the density obtained in spring was significantly high, both in Bizerte (267 individuals/m 2 ) and Gabs (99 individuals/m 2 ). The distribution zone of Talitrus saltator on the second sampling site was wider in spring (12.5 m) than in autumn (2.5 m), whereas the difference in the distribution of the three species of amphipods on Bizerte beach was more limited in spring (5 m) than in autumn (7 m). La distribution spatio-temporelle et la biologie des Amphipodes supra-littoraux ont t tudies au printemps et en automne sur les deux plages tunisiennes : Bizerte (nord de la Tunisie) et le golfe de Gabs (sud de la Tunisie) ; cette dernire est caractrise par l'amplitude de ses mares, la plus importante dans tout le bassin mditerranen. Des quadrats de 0.25 m 2 de surface ont t placs le long des transects afin de dterminer quelques paramtres cologiques aussi bien quantitatifs que qualitatifs. Les rsultats ont montr que, quelle que soit la saison d'chantillonnage et mise  part quelques coloptres trouvs au printemps, une seule espce a t retrouve  savoir l'Amphipode supra-littoral Talitrus saltator au niveau de la plage du golfe de Gabs, alors qu'au niveau de la plage de Bizerte trois espces ont t identifies : Talitrus saltator, Deshayesorchestia deshayesii et Orchestia gammarellus. Par ailleurs, la densit la plus importante est observe au printemps aussi bien  Bizerte (267 individus/m 2 ) qu' Gabs (99 individus/m 2 ). L'aire de distribution de Talitrus saltator sur le second site d'chantillonnage a t plus large au printemps (12,5 m) qu'en automne (2,5 m), alors que la diffrence dans la rpartition spatiale des trois espces d'Amphipodes au niveau de la plage de Bizerte a t plus limite au printemps (5 m) qu'en automne (7 m).

L'espce diffre  cet gard d'autres Amphipodes hypogs comme Niphargus o. virei. Le genre de nourriture des jeunes C. antennatus influe sur la longueur du corps, la coloration de l'intgument et le nombre d'articles antennulaires. Le dtritus de feuilles et les micro-organismes qui y sont associs forment une source alimentaire majeure pour C. antennatus dans le milieu souterrain, et peuvent tre importants pour la distribution de l'espce.

20106181|The spear lobster, Linuparus somniosus Berry & George, 1972 (Palinuridae), is here reported for the first time from relatively shallow waters off southern Java, Indonesia. This is only the second time that the species is recorded from Southeast Asia. Sexual dimorphism in the pereiopods is reported: those of males being more robust than those of females. Several other taxonomic characters are also discussed. Notes on the local fisheries for this species are provided. /// Linuparus somniosus Berry & George, 1972 (Palinuridae) est signal pour la premire fois d'eaux relativement peu profondes au sud de Java (Indonsie); c'est la seconde fois seulement que l'espce est signal du Sud-est de l'Asie. Des notes sur les pcheries locales de cette espce sont fournies.

20104992|The crustacean ectoparasite Lernaea (Copepoda, Lernaeidae) is one of the most important freshwater fish parasites which imposes a serious threat to Malaysian aquaculture. Lernaea cyprinacea and L. polymorpha have been identified from Peninsular Malaysia and their larval morphometrics have been considered inappropriate for species identification. A recent outbreak of lernaeosis occurred in a manmade lake in the Shah Alam recreational park, Selangor Darul Ehsan, West Malaysia and the species responsible was identified as Lernaea minuta. The present study was conducted to elucidate whether the larval morphometrics of L. minuta can be used as a taxonomic character to differentiate it from the other known Malaysian Lernaea species during their early life. The study revealed that L. minuta can be distinctly identified from L. cyprinacea and L. polymorpha using certain larval morphometrics, especially the body length, at and above the second copepodid stage. /// Le crustac ectoparasite Lernaea (Copepoda, Lernaeidae) est l'un des plus important parasites de poissons d'eau douce et constitue une srieuse menace pour l'aquaculture malaise. Lernaea cyprinacea et L. polymorpha ont t identifis de la Malaisie pninsulaire et leur morphomtrie larvaire a t considre comme inapproprie pour une identification spcifique. Un rcent foyer de lernaeosis a t dtect dans un lac artificiel dans le parc de loisirs Shah Alam, Selangor Darul Ehsan, Malaisie occidentale et l'espce responsable a t identifie comme L. minuta. La prsente tude a t mene afin de savoir si la morphomtrie larvaire de L. minuta peut tre utilise comme caractre taxonomique pour la distinguer des autres espces malaises connues de Lernaea, au cours de leurs premiers stades. Cette tude a montr que L. minuta peut tre nettement spar de L. cyprinacea et de L. polymorpha d'aprs la morphologie larvaire, particulirement par la longueur du corps, au second stade coppodite et aprs.
20103397|In the study area of Port Renfrew, British Columbia, Ligia pallasii newly emerged from the brood pouch (2-3 mm in length) inhabit moist beds of the green alga, Enteromorpha sp. After growing to a length of about 5 mm the young animals move into the sea wall, rock crevice habitat of the adult animals. In laboratory preference experiments the young animals preferred seaweeds over other choices of microhabitat. The preferred laboratory seaweeds were the red alga, Rhodomela larix and, to a lesser extent, Enteromorpha. The latter appears to be the preferred field choice because of its accessibility to the newly emerged Ligia. The preference of young Ligia for a seaweed microhabitat is thought to be related to protection and food supply.
20104873|Size at first maturity and period of egg-laying in Penaeus kerathurus of the Gulf of Gabs, Tunisia, were determined by means of two functional criteria: the presence of spermatophores and the maturation of the ovary. The carapace length corresponding to 50% of the mature females would be in the range of 29 to 30 mm. It is determined by fitting the curve representing the proportion of the females according to the logistic function P = 1/(1+exp(-a(Lc-Lc50))). The egg-laying period is studied by means of a maturation index (MI = weight of ovary/size). This occurs from June-July to October but the oldest females lay earlier than the youngest. /// La taille de premire maturit sexuelle des femelles de Penaeus kerathurus du Golfe de Gabs a t dtermine  l'aide de deux critres fonctionnels: la prsencce de spermatophore et/ou la condition ovigre. La taille de cphalothorax, correspondant  50% des femelles matures, serait comprise entre 29 et 30 mm. Cette taille a t calcule en ajustant la courbe reprsentant la proportion de ces femelles en fonction de la taille selon une fonction logistique du type: P = 1/(1+exp(-a(Lc-Lc50))). Quant  la priode de ponte, elle est prcise par l'tude d'un indice de maturation (IM = poids ovaires/taille). Celle-ci s'tend de juin-juillet  octobre. En outre, la ponte des femelles les plus ges prcde celle des plus jeunes.

20103095|Platichthys stellatus wird als neuer Wirt von Lepeophtheirus kareii beschrieben. Lepeophtheirus kareii wird neubeschrieben und seine Ontogenie bis zum Copepodid-Stadium dargestellt.
23034318|From the deepest layers of the large Lake Eikeren in southern Norway, 48 specimens of an amphipod were collected. Species identification by morphological keys gave as a result Gammarus zaddachi Sexton, 1912. In Europe, this species is only known from shallow brackish water, or from habitats near the sea where brackish sites are reachable. The surface of Lake Eikeren today is 19 m above sea level. Separation from the sea occurred some 5000 years ago. In this 150 m deep lake a long period has then elapsed during which a change from saline to brackish and later to fresh water took place. Today only fresh water prevails in all water layers. The maximum length of G. zaddachi in Lake Eikeren is larger than it is in other European populations. More studies are required to understand how this shallow-living brackish water species has adapted to a life in the deep areas of a freshwater lake. In den tiefsten Schichten des groen Sees Eikeren in Sdnorwegen sind 48 Exemplare eines Amphipoden gefangen worden, der morphologisch als Gammarus zaddachi Sexton, 1912 bestimmt wurde. Diese Art ist in Europa nur aus flachem Brackwasser oder von Brackwasserhabitaten in der Nhe des Meeres bekannt, die von dort erreichbar sind. Die Oberflche des Sees befindet sich heute 19 m ber dem Meeresspiegel. Die Trennung vom Meer hat vor etwa 5000 Jahren stattgefunden. Es hat dann lange gedauert, bis aus dem 150 m tiefen Salzwassersee erst ein Brackwasser- und schlielich ein reiner Swassersee geworden ist. Die maximale Lnge von G. zaddachi des Eikeren bertrifft die in anderen europischen Populationen. Weitere Untersuchungen sind ntig um herauszufinden, wie sich diese Art des flachen Brackwassers an ein Leben in den Tiefen eines reinen Swassersees hat anpassen knnen.

Pseudocandona regisnikolai n. sp. is an epigean species characterized by the absence of male bristles. The second new species, Candonopsis mareza n. sp., is a hypogean species, collected in a spring near Podgorica. This species has a triangular form of carapace. /// Deux nouvelles espces de la sous-famille des Candoninae provenant du Montenegro sont dcrites dans le prsent article. 20107710|Some morphological differences among the megalopae of the family Panopeidae have been determined. The megalopa stage was obtained from the artificial inlet of the Camaronera Lagoon, Veracruz, Mexico. Morphological analysis consisted of: dissection of the antennule, carapace, and telson, classification and counting of setae and aesthetascs, and measurements of carapace width and carapace length. A total of 96 172 megalopae of several species of Brachyura were obtained, of which 577 belonged to the family Panopeidae. Six species of this family were identified: Panopeus herbstii, P. lacustris, Dyspanopeus texanus, Neopanope packardii, Eurypanopeus depressus, and Hexapanopeus angustifrons. Morphological differences include: E. depressus lacks anterolateral projections and was smallest in size; D. texanus has two subterminal setae and four terminal setae on the endopod of the antennula; N. packardii has six strong plumose setae on the second segment of the uropod; H. angustifrons has one subterminal seta and two terminal setae on the endopod of the antennula. With respect to carapace size, the two species of the genus Panopeus, P. herbstii and P. lacustris, present the largest carapace size, while the smallest size was registered for E. depressus. A key for the identification of these megalopae of the family Panopeidae is presented. /// Se determinaron algunas diferencias morfolgicas en megalopas de la familia Panopeidae. Las megalopas se obtuvieron en la boca artificial de la Laguna de Camaronera, Veracruz, Mxico. El anlisis morfolgico consisti en: la diseccin de la antnula, del caparazn, y del telson, la clasificacin y conteo de las setas y estetes, y la medicin del ancho y largo del caparazn. Se obtuvieron un total de 96 172 megalopas de varias especies de Brachyura, de las cuales 577 pertenecieron a la familia Panopeidae. Se identificaron seis especies de esta familia: Panopeus herbstii, P. lacustris, Dyspanopeus texanus, Neopanope packardii, Eurypanopeus depressus y Hexapanopeus angustifrons. Las diferencias morfolgicas mostraron que E. depressus carece las proyecciones anterolaterales en el caparazn y es ms pequeo; D. texanus tiene dos setas subterminales y cuatro setas terminales en el endpodo del antnula; N. packardii tiene seis fuertes setas plumosas en el segundo segmento del uropodo; H. angustifrons tiene un seta subterminal y dos setas terminales en el endpodo de la antnula. Con respecto al tamao de caparazn, la dos especies del gnero Panopeus: P. herbstii y P. lacustris, presentaron el tamao ms grande del caparazn, mientras que el tamao ms pequeo se registr para E. depressus. Se presenta una clave de identificacin para las megalopas de estas especies de la familia Panopeidae.

20101701|Der Copepode Ergasilus confusus Bere lebt auf dem Barsch Perca fluviatilis L. Jahreszeitliche Vernderungen des Vorkommens von E. confusus und der Befallsrate wurden ein Jahr lang registriert. Das Vorkommen ist grer im Sommer, die Befallsrate hher im Winter. Das geringere Vorkommen im Winter scheint auf Fehler der Sammeltechnik whrend dieser Jahreszeit zurckzufhren zu sein. Vorkommen und Befallsrate sind sehr gering im Herbst, da berwinternde Copepoden-Weibchen noch nicht befallsfhig sind. Der Befall durch berwinternde Copepoden dauert bis Dezember. Die ersten eiertragenden Copepoden-Weibchen wurden am 10. Mai angetroffen, Individuen mit schlpfenden Nauplien am 23. Mai. E. confusus besitzt offenbar zwei Sommergenerationen. Der Befall durch die erste Sommergeneration geschieht whrend der zweiten Junihlfte; der Befall durch die zweite Sommergeneration im Verlauf des August. Die Eierproduktion wird im Oktober eingestellt. Vorkommen und Befallsrate sind offenbar positiv korreliert mit der Krpergre der geprften Barsche. Die Copepoden waren nicht gleichmig ber die verschiedenen Kiemenbgen verteilt; die meisten bevorzugten die zweiten und dritten Kiemenbgen. Die berwinternden Weibchen sind wesentlich grer und produzieren mehr Eier pro Brut als die der Sommergenerationen. Die erste Sommergeneration produziert mehr Eier pro Brut als die zweite. Die Carapax-Lnge eiertragender Weibchen und deren Eizahlen scheinen positiv miteinander korreliert zu sein.
23034316|This study presents a checklist of the Crustacea Decapoda that occur in the Sardinian Channel, based both on previously published records and on original data. These latter data were obtained from samples collected during different trawl surveys in the Gulf of Cagliari carried out between 1997 and 2002. The area studied comprised six sectors in all, situated between 391300N and 364200N, and 62800E to 110200E; each sector is characterized by different morphological and hydrological conditions. The species examined number 207, belonging to 55 families and 115 genera. The most abundant families in terms of numbers of genera and species were Portunidae, Inachidae, Palaemonidae, and Paguridae. Most of the species are Atlantic-Mediterranean, with only some of them assumed to be exclusively occurring in the Mediterranean, thus confirming that no Lessepsian species have been recorded in the study area until now. Viene proposta una checklist dei Crostacei Decapodi del Canale di Sardegna, basata sia su dati bibliografici che su dati originali ottenuti da campioni raccolti in diverse campagne di ricerca svolte tra il 1997 e il 2002 nel Golfo di Cagliari. L'area di studio, compresa tra 391300N-364200N di latitudine e 62800E-110200E di longitudine,  stata suddivisa in sei settori in base alle differenti condizioni morfologiche e idrologiche. Sono riportate 207 specie distribuite in 55 famiglie e in 115 generi. Le famiglie pi abbondanti per numero di generi e specie sono nell'ordine: Portunidae, Inachidae, Palaemonidae e Paguridae. La maggior parte delle segnalazioni riguarda specie atlantico-mediterranee mentre solo una piccola parte  rappresentata da specie riportate per il Mediterraneo, confermando che, attualmente nel tratto di mare studiato, nessuna specie Lessepsiana  stata segnalata fino ad ora.
