20104957|The habitats used by pueruli and early benthic juvenile Panulirus japonicus were examined at 5 locations along the coast of southern Japan. At Kawazu in the Izu area, from reefs covered by agar algae (Rhodophyta: Gelidiaceae) and Ecklonia cava (Phaeophyta), of a total of 67 juveniles sampled, 64 were sampled from small holes in the rock face and 3 specimens were taken from within the agar algae. At the remaining 4 locations, no agar algal beds occurred and the macroalgae cover was dominated by Laminariaceae and/or Sargassum spp. At these sites, the 81 pueruli and 268 juveniles sampled were observed only within holes on the reef surface and not in association with the macroalgae. Diurnal use of both small holes and the dense foliage of agar algae, allows almost complete concealment of the main part of the body of the juvenile which may not be provided by other macroalgae. Agar algae, however, occur intermittently along the coast of Japan, with extensive beds being found only in the Izu area. It is concluded that holes within the reef face, rather than seaweed, are the main diurnal microhabitat of post-settled pueruli and early benthic juvenile P. japonicus. /// Les habitats utiliss par les pueruli et les premiers stades juvniles benthiques de Panulirus japonicus ont t examins sur 5 sites, le long de la cte du Japon mridional.  Kawazu, dans la rgion de Izu, sur des rcifs couverts d'algues agar-agar (Rhodophyta: Gelidiaceae) et de Ecklonia cava (Phaeophyta), sur un total de 67 juvniles chantillonns, 64 provenaient de petites cavits de la face rocheuse et 3 spcimens ont t collects  l'intrieur des algues agar-agar. Aux 4 autres sites, il n'y avait pas de lits d'algues agar-agar et la couverture algale tait domine par les Laminariaceae et/ou par des Sargassum spp. Les 81 pueruli et 268 juvniles chantillonns ont t observs seulement  l'intrieur des creux de la surface rocheuse et non en association avec les macroalgues. L'utilisation diurne  la fois des petites cavits et du dense "feuillage" des algues agar-agar permet de dissimuler presque compltement la majeure partie du corps du juvnile, ce qui ne peut pas tre assure par d'autres macroalgues. Cependant, les algues agar-agar se trouvent par intermittence le long de la cte du Japon, avec des lits tendus dans la rgion de Izu seulement. On conclut que les cavits de la surface rocheuse, plutt que les algues, constituent le principal microhabitat diurne des pueruli nouvellement installs et des premiers stades juvniles benthiques de P. japonicus.
20101621|Redescription de la femelle et premire description du mle de Porcellidium brevicaudatum Thompson & A. Scott, 1903, et description de Paraidya occulta n. sp., coppodes harpacticodes associs aux pagures du genre Dardanus (D. megistos, D. guttatus et D. lagopodes)  Madagascar et  l'Ile Maurice.
20103471|Under certain predictable conditions Macrobrachium rosenbergii kill one another. Under other "field" conditions these prawns appear to segregate by molt state into different microhabitats. Experiments were conducted to determine if this segregation was the result of competition or a change in habitat selection associated with a change in molt state. Apparently segregation was the result of competition, and not the result of a change in habitat preference associated with a change in molt state. The process of segregation by molt state seemed to increase the chance that a prawn in a susceptible molt state would survive that period of vulnerability.
20106100|In an aquatic environment, the hydrodynamic properties of animals strongly determine their transport and distribution. In macro-crustaceans, lacking well developed capabilities for regulating their specific gravity, hydrodynamic properties are to a large extent determined by their body size and body shape. For 96 macroscopic crustacean species, commonly occurring in the North Sea and eastern Atlantic, data regarding their (adult) body dimensions were fitted into a simple geometric model (an ellipsoid of revolution), which permitted the assessment of their hydrodynamic friction for horizontal and vertical movements. Friction coefficients for horizontal and vertical movement appear to be closely related to each other, vertical friction always being higher. Friction coefficients increase in species with size, but the volume-specific friction coefficients decrease, confirming a higher locomotory freedom in larger species. In the aquatic environment physical freedom is strongly limited by hydrodynamic factors. Certain changes in size and shape can increase physiological and physical independence. In this way crustaceans found many ways to escape the hydrodynamical limitations of their environment. A large variation in size and shape within the subphylum is still preserved. /// Dans un environnement aquatique, les proprits hydrodynamiques des aminaux dtrminent fortement leur transport et leur distribution. Chez les macro-crustacs, qui manquent de capacits bien dveloppes pour la rgulation de leur gravit spcifique, les proprits hydrodynamiques sont dans une large mesure dtermines par la taille et la forme de leur corps. Pour 96 espces macroscopiques de crustacs, communment prsentes dans la mer du Nord et l'est de l'Atlantique, les donnes relatives aux dimensions de leur corps (chez les adultes) on t entres dans un modle gomtrique simple (ellipsode de rvolution), ce qui a permis d'valuer leur friction hydrodynamique pour des mouvements vertical et horizontal. Les coefficients de friction pour les mouvements vertical et horizontal apparaissent comme troitement lis l'un  l'autre, la friction verticale tant toujours plus leve. Les coefficients de friction croissent avec la taille, mais les coefficients de friction en volume spcifique dcroissent, ce qui confirme une plus grande libert locomotrice chez les plus grandes espces. Dans l'environnement aquatique, la libert physique est fortement limite par des facteurs hydrodynamiques. Certains changements dans la taille et la forme peuvent accrotre l'indpendance physique et physiologique. Ainsi, les crustacs ont trouv beaucoup de moynes pour chapper aux limitations hydrodynamiques de leur environnement. Une large variation dans la taille et la forme est encore prserve  l'intrieur du subphylum.
20106038|Over 34 000 specimens of marine gammaridean amphipods were collected from 34 sites of varying wave exposure in the intertidal/shallow subtidal zones of Mauritius (1959-2032S 57185747E, Indian Ocean) in April to July, 1995. Substrates included algae, seagrass, coral, sand, and sponges. Sixty-nine species are reported, 41 of which are new records for the island; 19 species are undescribed. One hundred-and-thirty species are now known from Mauritius and of these 32% appear to be endemic. Many Mauritian amphipods are widely distributed in the Indo-Pacific. Fifty-seven percent of the Mauritian amphipods are shared with Madagascar (the closest large land mass). The numbers of species in amphipod families in Mauritius are comparable with those of Hawaii and Fiji. /// D'avril  juillet 1995, plus de 34 000 spcimens d'amphipodes gammarides marins ont t recueillis  l'le Maurice (1959-2032S 5718-5747E) dans 34 sites diversement exposs aux vagues dans la zone intertidale et  faible profondeur. Les substrats comprenaient des algues, des herbiers  phanrogames, des coraux, du sable et des ponges. Soixante-neuf espces sont signales, dont 41 pour la premire fois de l'le; 19 n'taient pas dcrites. Cent-trente espces sont maintenant connues de Maurice, 32% d'entre elles semblant endmiques. Beaucoup de ces amphipodes ont une large distribution dans l'Indo-Pacifique; 57% des espces sont communes avec Madagascar (la grande terre la plus proche). Le nombre des espces d'amphipodes  l'le Maurice est comparable  celui des Hawa et des Fidji.

20105414|The latest systematic revision of the benthic Amphipoda Gammaridea accounts for 494 species along the French coast. The presence of these species is given for 11 continental shelf areas and the Atlantic and Mediterranean bathyal depths. The richest areas are the western part of the English Channel, the southern part of the Bay of Biscay and the Provence and Cte d'Azur coasts. The poorest areas are the eastern English Channel, due to an impoverishment of the fauna in this part of the Channel, and other areas where knowledge appears insufficient, e.g., the Mer d'Iroise, the Atlantic continental shelf from southern Brittany to the Gironde, the Golfe du Lion, and the Corsica coasts. The similarities between the 13 areas show that the amphipod fauna forms four distinct faunistic groups: English Channel plus Mer d'Iroise, Atlantic continental shelf, Mediterranean continental shelf, and the bathyal zone. A comparison between the French Gammaridea fauna with those of the biogeographically neighbouring ones shows that the French fauna appears to be an intersting biogeographical cross between the boreal and cold temperate fauna and the temperate and warm temperate fauna. The results indicate a biogeographical boundary at the western English Channel. Species richness is greater at this boundary than it is in adjacent areas. /// La mise  jour de la liste des espces d'Amphipodes Gammaridea benthiques prsents le long des ctes de France mtropolitaines permet de dnombrer 494 espces. Ce recensement tient compte des dernires rvisions systmatiques et des prospections  l'chelle des zones ctires et bathyales du pourtour mtropolitain. Les inventaires dans 11 rgions du plateau continental et dans les deux zones bathyales atlantique et mditerranenne permettent de mettre en vidence les zones de plus forte richesse en espces (Manche occidentale), sud Gascogne et Cte de Provence-Cte d'Azur, celle de plus faible richesse en espces (Manche orientale) et celles pour lesquelles le potentiel de connaissance est manifestement insuffisant: Mer d'Iroise, rgion des Pertuis Atlantiques, Languedoc-Roussillon et Corse. Les affinits entre les diffrentes zones montrent qu'il existe quatre grands ensembles faunistiques: Manche et Mer d'Iroise, Atlantique, Mditerrane et zone bathyale. Une comparaison avec les faunes voisines montre que la faune des ctes franaises correspond  un carrefour biogographique entre la faune borale au nord et la faune sub-tropicale au sud et que plusieurs contingents d'espces peuvent tre identifis.

20105959|Female specimens of the copepod Mugilicola smithae were collected from a new locality in northern Kwazulu Natal from Liza alata, L. macrolepis, Myxis capensis and Valamugil seheli, all four species constituting new host records. Studies of whole mounts cleared in 90% lactic acid and of scanning electron microscopy were conducted. The morphological features of Mugilicola smithae are reviewed. The distribution of the genus Mugilicola and host preferences are discussed. /// Des femelles du coppode Mugilicola smithae ont t collectes dans une nouvelle localit au nord du Kwazulu Natal, sur Liza alata, L. macrolepis, Myxis capensis et Valamugil seheli, les quatre espces reprsentant de nouveaux htes. Une tude de montages complets, claircis dans l'acide lactique  90%, et une tude au S.E.M. ont t effectus. Les caractres morphologiques de Mugilicola smithae sont revus. La distribution du genre Mugilicola et les htes prfrentiels sont discuts.
20106396|Zooplankton samples were collected on a four-month schedule (February, March, May, August 1991) off the eastern coast of the Yucatan Peninsula, westernmost portion of the Caribbean Sea. Taxonomic analysis of the pelagic Copepoda yielded 89 species, Undinula vulgaris, Temora turbinata, and Farranula gracilis being the overall dominant forms. They represented more than 60% of the copepod numbers during the four months surveyed. The faunistic influence of the surface Caribbean water was evident during the entire period in the surveyed area. Mean diversity was moderate and did not show relevant month-to-month variations during the surveyed period. Station clustering with the Bray-Curtis Index suggests the absence of a definite coast-ocean gradient in the local copepod community, stations being sorted mainly by density differences. Coastal species were recorded well inside the oceanic zone, and oceanic and even mesopelagic forms occurred very near the coast or over the shelf. These effects may result from continuous mixing of coastal and shelf waters with oceanic water because of (1) the narrowness of the continental shelf off the Mexican Caribbean coast, and (2) the effect of local mesoscale circulation patterns. It is suggested that these processes favour the homogeneity of the local copepod community. /// Se recolectaron muestras de zooplancton durante cuatro meses (Febrero, Marzo, Mayo y Agosto, 1991) en la costa oriental de la Pennsula de Yucatn, Caribe occidental. El anlisis taxonmico de los coppodos gener 89 especies, con Undinula vulgaris, Temora turbinata y Farranula gracilis como las formas dominantes; representaron ms del 60% de los coppodos en los meses estudiados. La influencia faunstica de las aguas del Caribe en la zona fue evidente en todo el periodo. La diversidad promedio fue moderada y no mostr variaciones mensuales relevantes durante el periodo de estudio. El agrupamiento de estaciones con el ndice Bray-Curtis sugiere la ausencia de un gradiente cost-ocano en la fauna local, las estaciones se separaron por diferencias de densidad. Se encontraron especies costeras en la zona ocenica y formas ocenicas e incluso mesopelgicas fueron registradas muy cerca de la costa o sobre la plataforma. Esto puede ser efecto de la mezcla continua de las aguas costeras y nerticas con ocenicas asociada con (1) la estrecha plataforma a lo largo del Caribe Mexicano, y (2) el efecto de los patrones de circulacin a mesoescala en esta zona. Se sugiere que estos procesos favorecen la homogeneidad de la comunidad local de coppodos.
20106413|Three aspects of the reproductive biology (fecundity, size of ovigerous females, and egg size) of the freshwater prawns Macrobrachium acanthurus, M. heterochirus, and M. carcinus, in the Huitzilapan river, Veracruz, Mexico, were studied. Adults of Macrobrachium acanthurus and M. carcinus occupied the lower part of the river in the estuarine area, while reproductive M. heterochirus were distributed from 105 to 535 m altitude. Macrobrachium acanthurus exhibited significant differences in fecundity, mean size of ovigerous females, and egg size, according to the time of year. For M. heterochirus, egg size varied depending on the time of year and on their position in the river. Finally, for M. carcinus, egg size varied only depending on the time of year. /// Tres aspectos de la biologa reproductiva (fecundidad, talla de hembras ovgeras y tamao de huevo) de los camarones de agua dulce Macrobrachium acanthurus, M. heterochirus y M. carcinus, en el ro Huitzilapan, Veracruz, Mexico, fueron estudiados. Adultos de Macrobrachium acanthurus y M. carcinus ocuparon las partes bajas del ro en la zona estuarina, mientras que organismos reproductivos de M. heterochirus se distribuyeron de los 105 a los 535 m de altitud. Macrobrachium acanthurus exhibi diferencias significativas debidas a la poca del ao en fecundidad, talla promedio de hembras ovgeras y tamao de huevo. Para M. heterochirus el tamao del huevo vari dependiendo de la poca del ao y de la posicin dentro del ro. Finalmente, para M. carcinus, el tamao del huevo vari solamente debido a la poca del ao.
20696245|Various authors have reported the occurrence of supernumerary gonopores in many species of Parastacus, which has generated discussion about their sexual system. In this study, we examine the external and internal sexual characters of 102 specimens of the burrowing crayfish, Parastacus pilimanus, captured in the province of Maldonado in southeast Uruguay, with the aim of clarifying its sexual system. In this study, we show that in all the specimens analysed, female and male gonopores co-existed externally, and we verified the presence of only one type of gonad internally: either ovary (intersex females) or testis (intersex males), from which one pair of oviducts and another of sperm ducts originated, connecting the gonad to the respective gonopores. We also verified that all specimens smaller than 27.2 mm cephalothorax length (CL) (N = 73) had the same external morphology. Nevertheless, dissection revealed that their gonads were already differentiated. We established that 54.8% of these specimens were intersex females, while the remaining percentage corresponded to intersex males. Twenty-nine specimens were found with a CL equal to, or above, 27.2 mm. Of these, 34.5% (N = 10) were intersex males with the same external morphological traits that characterize all specimens smaller than 27.2 mm CL. The remaining 19 specimens (65.5%) were intersex females, 15 of which presented secondary sexual characters, probably associated with egg incubation. The evidence gathered suggests that Parastacus pilimanus has permanent intersexuality, similar to Parastacus pugnax and Parastacus varicosus in Uruguay. We conclude by identifying some topics that require further study, in order to understand the adaptive value of this type of intersexuality. Varios autores han reportado la ocurrencia de gonoporos supernumerarios en muchas especies de Parastacus, lo que ha generado discusin acerca del sistema sexual de ellas. En este trabajo nosotros examinamos los caracteres sexuales externos e internos de 102 especimenes del camarn excavador Parastacus pilimanus capturados en el Departamento de Maldonado, sureste de Uruguay, con el objetivo de clarificar su sistema sexual. Aqu nosotros demostramos que todos los especimenes analizados presentaron externamente coexistencia de gonoporos de hembra y de macho, e internamente una gnada nica  ya sea ovario (hembras intersexo) o testculo (machos intersexo)  desde la cual se originan un par de oviductos y otro de espermiductos que la conectan a los respectivos gonoporos. Tambin comprobamos que todos los especimenes de tallas menores a 27,2 mm de longitud cefalotorcica (LCT) (N = 73), tienen la misma morfologa externa. No obstante, las disecciones demostraron que sus gnadas ya estaban diferenciadas. En ellos comprobamos que el 54,8% eran hembras intersexo y el porcentaje restante machos intersexo. De tallas iguales o superiores a 27,2 mm de LCT, encontramos 29 especimenes. De ellos, el 34,5% (N = 10) eran machos intersexo los que presentaron los mismos rasgos morfolgicos externos que caracterizan a todos los especimenes de tallas inferiores a 27,2 mm de LCT. Los 19 especimenes restantes (65,5%) eran hembras intersexo, en 15 de las cuales comprobamos la presencia de caracteres sexuales secundarios, probablemente asociados a la incubacin de los huevos. Las evidencias reunidas sugieren que Parastacus pilimanus, al igual que Parastacus pugnax y Parastacus varicosus de Uruguay, presenta intersexualidad permanente. Nosotros concluimos sugiriendo algunos tpicos que necesitan de mayores estudios para comprender el valor adaptativo de este tipo de intersexualidad.
27743312|Batches of 100 female cypris of the rhizocephalan, Loxothylacus texanus Boschma, 1933 were selected and put into contact with megalopae of crabs of the genus Callinectes. Contacts lasted for 12 h and the organisms infected were then kept individually in plastic containers, and their growth was followed. At the same time, megalopae free of parasites were kept as controls. The infected organisms were monitored daily until the externae of L. texanus emerged. The time interval for emergence of the externae in male hosts was 79-110 days; and the growth rates were 0.19-0.29 mm day1 with an average of 0.24  0.037 mm day1. In females, the emergence interval of externae was 78-100 days; the growth rate was 0.18-0.23 with an average of 0.200.023 mm day1. The mortality of the cypris is high (50-90%), which ensures that in the natural environment a high percentage of larval stages of Callinectes rathbunae Contreras, 1930 is recruited to the healthy population. Some crabs infected in the first stages die, which also ensures that the population of L. texanus is maintained relatively low in the natural environment. L. texanus infects the first stages of C. rathbunae, because this gives the parasite the time necessary to complete its life cycle. The emergence interval of the externa of L. texanus obtained in this study for C. rathbunae, is similar to that reported for the blue crab, Callinectes sapidus Rathbun, 1896, in other studies. /// Se formaron lotes de 100 cipris hembra del rizocfalo Loxothylacus texanus Boschma, 1933 y se pusieron en contacto con megalopas de especies del gnero Callinectes, los contactos duraron 12 horas despus de lo cual los organismos infectados se colocaron de forma individual y se sigui su crecimiento. Al mismo tiempo, se mantuvieron megalopas libres de parsitos como control. Diariamente se revisaron los organismos infectados hasta la emergencia de las externas. El intervalo de tiempo de emergencia de las externas en los hospederos macho fue 79-110 das; mientras que el intervalo de las tasas de crecimiento fue 0,19-0,29 mm da1 con promedio de 0,24  0,037 mm da1; en el caso de las hembras el intervalo de emergencia de las externas fue 78-100 das; el intervalo de las tasas de crecimiento fue 0,18-0,23 con promedio de 0,20  0,023 mm da1. Se puede concluir que la mortalidad de las cipris es elevada (50-90%) lo cual asegura que en el medio natural un gran porcentaje de organismos de los estadios larvales de Callinectes rathbunae Contreras, 1930 se recluten a la poblacin sana, un porcentaje de los organismos infectados en los primeros estadios muere lo cual tambin asegura que la poblacin de L. texanus se mantenga relativamente baja en el medio natural, L. texanus infecta los primeros estadios de C. rathbunae porque esto le confiere el tiempo necesario para completar su ciclo de vida. El tiempo de emergencia de la externa de L. texanus obtenido en este estudio para en C. rathbunae es similar a lo reportado en otros estudios para el cangrejo azul Callinectes sapidus Rathbun, 1896.
20105571|We examined diurnal macrohabitat association patterns among three species of crayfish and two age classes within each species during two seasons in two Missouri Ozarks streams. Autumn quadrat samples were obtained during three years at Jacks Fork River and two years at Big Piney River; summer samples were taken for five years at both rivers. Samples were partitioned among five macrohabitat types (riffles, runs, pools, backwaters, and emergent vegetation patches). Orconectes luteus, O. ozarkae, and O. punctimanus were separated into young of year (YOY) and adults based on carapace length-frequency analysis. Relative use of macrohabitats by crayfish species and age classes was compared using ANOVA and least squares means probability difference analysis (LSMPDA). Orconectes luteus was the predominant species in both streams and was the most widespread among macrohabitats. Orconectes ozarkae used all macrohabitats, but showed an affinity for pools, backwaters, and vegetation patches. Orconectes punctimanus was the least common species and was largely restricted to vegetation patches and backwaters. We documented ontogenetic shifts in macrohabitat use in O. luteus and O. ozarkae. Although there were interspecific differences, YOY crayfish generally were concentrated in macrohabitats along shallow margins of streams. Several distribution patterns of crayfish species/age classes among macrohabitats showed consistency across temporal and spatial bounds. Study results have implications for lotic crayfish conservation and management. /// Nous avons examin les modles d'association diurnes de macrohabitat chez trois espces d'crevisses et deux classes d'ge pour chaque espce pendant deux saisons dans deux courants du Missouri Ozarks. Les chantillons de quadrats d'automne ont t obtenus pendant trois ans dans la Jacks Fork River et deux ans dans la Big Piney River; les chantillons d't ont t prlevs pendant cinq ans dans les deux rivires. Les chantillonnages ont t rpartis dans cinq types de macrohabitat (rapides, ruisseaux, mares, eaux morts, vgtation merge). Orconectes luteus, O. ozarkae, et O. punctimanus ont t rpartis en jeunes de l'anne (YOY) et en adultes  partir de l'analyse de la frquence de longueur de la carapace. L'utilisation relative des macrohabitats par espce d'crevisse et par classe d'ge a t compare par les tests ANOVA et LSMPDA. Orconectes luteus est l'espce dominante dans les deux rivires et est la plus rpandue parmi les macrohabitats. O. ozarkae utilise tous les macrohabitats, mais montre une affinit particulire pour les mares, les eaux mortes et la vgtation merge. O. punctimanus, l'espce la moins commune, se limit  la vgtation merge et aux eaux mortes. Nous nous sommes intresss aux changements ontogniques dans l'utilisation des macrohabitats chez O. luteus et O. ozarkae. Bien qu'il y ait des diffrences interspcifiques, les crevisses YOY sont gnralement concentres dans les habitats situs le long des bords peu profonds des rivires. Plusieurs modles de distribution espce d'crevisse/classe d'ge se sont montrs cohrents dans des limites temporelles et spatiales. Les rsultats de l'tude ont des implications utilisables pour la conservation et la gestion des crevisses.

27743284|A new species of Parastenocarididae is described from southeastern India. It shows all the characters of the recently redefined genus Kinnecaris Jakobi, 1972. K. godavari sp. n. can be distinguished from its 17 congeners by characters of male legs 3 and 4, as well as by the setae of leg 5 in both sexes. This is the first report of the genus from India. Surprisingly, K. godavari sp. n. has very little in common with its known Madagascan congeners, except for the obvious generic characters. /// Eine neue Art der Parastenocarididae wird aus Sdostindien beschrieben. Sie zeigt alle Merkmale der krzlich neu definierten Gattung Kinnecaris Jakobi, 1972. K. godavari sp. n. kann von den anderen 17 Arten der Gattung durch Merkmale der 3 und 4. Beine der Mnnchen und durch die Beborstung der 5. Beine beider Geschlechter unterschieden werden. Dies ist der erste Fund der Gattung in Indien. Auer den Gattungsmerkmalen hat K. godavari sp. n. erstaunlicherweise kaum etwas mit den bekannten madagassischen Arten der Gattung gemeinsam.
23034255|A description of Dangoka japonica nov. gen. nov. sp. and a redescription of Eudactylinella alba Wilson, 1932 are given based on specimens recovered from the branchial lamellae of two Japanese guitarfishes, Rhinobatos schlegelii Mller & Henle, 1841 and R. hynnicephalus Richardson, 1846 (Rhinobatidae), and of two Japanese dasyatid rays, Taeniura meyeni Mller & Henle, 1841 and Daystis akajei (Mller & Henle, 1841) (Dasyatidae), respectively. D. japonica nov. gen. nov. sp. is easily distinguishable from all confamilial species in having in the female a combination of following features: (1) body with rounded prosomal somites, (2) 1-segmented abdomen, (3) caudal ramus with 6 elements, (4) inconspicuous leg 5, (5) chelate maxilliped with dactylus-receiving myxal process, (6) 8-segmented antennule without spine, (7) legs 1-4 with 2-segmented rami. The occurrence of E. alba is the first record from the Pacific Ocean and T. meyeni and D. akajei represent new host records for this species. La description de Dangoka japonica nov. gen. nov. sp. et une redescription de Eudactylinella alba Wilson, 1932 sont donnes  partir de spcimens prlevs sur les lamelles branchiales de deux Rhinobatidae japonais, Rhinobatos schlegelii Mller & Henle, 1841 et R. hynnicephalus Richardson, 1846, et sur deux raies japonaises Dasyatidae, Taeniura meyeni Mller & Henle, 1841 et Dasyatis akajei (Mller & Henle, 1841), respectivement. D. japonica nov. gen. nov. sp. se distingue aisment de toutes les espces de la famille par la femelle qui prsente une combinaison particulire des traits suivants: (1) corps  somites du prosome arrondis, (2) abdomen  un segment, (3) branches furcales  six lments, (4) patte 5 trs rduite (5) maxillipde chliforme avec le oppos  dactyle recevant un fort processus myxal, (6) antennule  8 segments sans pine, et (7) pattes 1-4  rames bi-segmentes. La prsence de E. alba est le premier signalement de l'ocan Pacifique et, T. meyeni et D. akajei reprsentent de nouveaux htes pour cette espce.
20106336|Calcinus verrilli, a hermit crab endemic to Bermuda, is unusual in that it inhabits both gastropod tubes (Vermicularia spp. and Dendropoma spp.) and gastropod shells (Cerithium litteratum). It was found in both shelter types, in five marine environments, categorized as intertidal areas, subtidal areas, "boilers", patch reefs, and rim reefs. We found most males in shells and most females inhabiting tubes. We discovered a size dimorphism, females being larger than males. In the laboratory, when given a choice between shells and tubes, both males and females showed a significant preference for shells. In a Y-maze test of attraction to extracts from tube-forming versus shell-forming gastropods, males showed no discrimination, but females preferred the tube-associated extract. These shelter and size dimorphisms in C. verrilli are best explained by intrasexual competition and differences in the ecology of males and females. /// Calcinus verrilli, un pagure endmique des Bermudes est particulier par son habitat inhabituel, vivant  la fois dans des tubes (Vermicularia spp. et Dendropoma spp.) et des coquilles de gastropodes (Cerithium litteratum). Il a t trouv dans deux types d'abris, dans cinq environnements marins, dsigns comme zones intertidales, zones subtidales, "boilers", plaques rcifales et bordures rcifales. Nous avons trouv la plupart des mles dans les coquilles et la plupart des femelles dans les tubes. Nous avons dcouvert un dimorphisme de taille, les femelles tant plus grandes que les mles. Au laboratoire, lorsqu'un choix est offert entre coquilles et tubes, les mles comme les femelles ont montr une prfrence significative pour les coquilles. Dans un test d'attraction aux extraits soit de tubes, soit de coquillages, les mles n'ont pas montr de diffrence, mais les femelles ont prfr les extraits associs aux tubes. Ces dimorphismes en matire d'abri et de taille sont le mieux expliqus par la comptition intrasexuelle et les diffrences dans l'cologie des mles et des femelles.
27743371|The marine podocopid ostracod, Bradleya japonica Benson, 1972 is redescribed on the basis of appendages and adult valves. This is the first report describing the appendages of the species. The reflectivity of the shells abruptly increases around an incident angle of 70, and the reflectivity reaches to ca. 50% around an incident angle of 85 from the possible life position of this animal. Based on optical and morphological analyses. Bradleya japonica has a shell shape that minimizes reflection from the shell under the downwelling light conditions in which it lives. /// L'ostracode podocopid marin, Bradleya japonica Benson, 1972 est re-dcrit sur la base des appendices et des valves chez l'adulte. Ceci est le premier travail dcrivant les appendices de cette espce. La pouvoir de rflexion de la carapace augmente abruptement pour un angle incident de 70, et la rflectivit atteint environ 50% pour une angle incident de 85, ce qui peut correspondre  la position de l'animal vivant. Sur la base d'analyses optiques et morphologiques, Bradleya japonica a une forme de carapace qui minimise la rflexion sur la carapace sous les conditions de la lumire incidente dans laquelle il vit.

20103244|Prsentation des donnes disponibles sur la longueur totale, la longueur de la carapace, la taille des pinces et le poids vif des plus grands homards connus,  savoir 20 provenant d'Europe, 25 d'Amrique et 9 du Cap. 20105713|The density of Nephrops norvegicus burrows on the lower continental shelf (100-120 m depth) off the Catalan coast (western Mediterranean) was estimated by underwater photography. A total of 68 burrows were identified in 84 m, equivalent to 0.81 burrows per m. The conversion of this value to km gave an estimate of 81  10 burrows in the study area. To obtain the approximate number of animals performing emergence on a diel basis, density estimates were compared with those obtained over 24 h in a previous trawl survey, carried out in the same area at days of maximum and minimum catches. Findings are discussed taking into account already available data for the northeastern Atlantic, the Adriatic Sea, and the Aegean Sea. /// Se estim la densidad de madrigueras de Nephrops norvegicus en la plataforma continental (100-120 m) de la costa catalana (Mediterrneo oeste) mediante el uso de fotografa submarina. Se contaron un total de 68 madrigueras por 84 m de superficie muestreada, lo cual equivale a 0.81 agujero por m. La extrapolacin a km da un total de 81  10 madrigueras en el rea de estudio. Con el fin de obtener el nmero aproximado de animales que realizan emergencia de la madriguera con un ritmo circadiario, se compararon las densidades de madrigueras con la densidad de individuos, obtenida sta ltima sobre las capturas mximas y mnimas de muestreos realizados anteriormente con un arte de arrastre, en la misma zona y para un intervalo de 24 h. Los resultados se discuten teniendo en cuenta la informacin disponible de densidades de madrigueras del Atlntico, Adritico y Egeo.

20101976|Der sogenannte 'Mitteldarm' der Isopoden geht nicht aus dem Endoderm hervor. Er ist mit einer Chitin intima ausgekleidet und bildet einen Teil des Proctodeums. Eine peritrophische Membran fehlt dem darm der Landasseln, ist jedoch im Darm der marinen Isopoden vorhanden und wird hier von einer schmalen zwischen Stomodeum und Proctodeum gelegenen Zone abgeschieden, die den Rest des wirklichen Mitteldarms darstellt.

20103560|The population dynamics of Canthocamptus staphylinus in the littoral zone of Lake Constance are described (fig. 2). Adult animals aestivate as cysts. The main part of the population emerges from the cysts in autumn. During the resting stage and the first spell after emerging, mortality is very low (fig. 3). Reproduction, expressed as numbers of ovigerous females, begins in November and reaches its maximum in January. The new generation becomes adult in May/June and encysts without previous reproduction. According to Sarvala (1979) it may be possible, that in littoral populations dormancy is induced by long day periods and temperatures of over 12 C (figs. 1, 2). In the profundal zone C. staphylinus also forms cysts, however, both light and temperature are not likely to induce this stage in depths of over 60 m.
20107756|Three new species of the genus Megokris, M. manihine sp. n. and M. halli sp. n. from the South China Sea and the East China Sea, and M. motohburiorum sp. nov. from the Philippines, are described. In these three new species, the rostral teeth as well as the dorsal carinae on abdominal somites 2-6 are very similar to the corresponding structures in Megokris granulosus (Haswell, 1879) from Torres Strait, Queensland, and M. pescadoreensis (Schmitt, 1931) from Taiwan. However, the thelycum and petasma are characteristically different: in M. halli sp. n., the anterior plate of the thelycum bears a longitudinal middle protuberance, which is largely concave laterally in its middle region, and elevated with a round projection in its posterior part; and the anterior plate of the thelycum does not reach the posterior margin of the seminal receptacle. In M. manihine sp. n., the anterior plate of the thelycum bears a median longitudinal protuberance with a median ridge, the posterior part of which is conspicuously elevated with a pair of lateral swellings; the anterior plate of the thelycum does not reach the posterior edge of the seminal receptacle. In M. motohburiorum sp. n., the prominent median protuberance of thelycum is narrow in its anterior half and broadened with an elevation in its posterior half, while the posterior margin is rounded; the anterior plate of the thelycum is connected with the posterior edge of the seminal receptacle. /// Trois nouvelles espces du genre Megokris, M. manihine sp. n. et M. halli sp. n., de la mer de Chine mridionale et de la mer de Chine orientale, ainsi que M. motohburiorum sp. nov., des Philippines, sont dcrites. Chez ces trois espces nouvelles, les dents rostrales ainsi que les carnes dorsales situes sur les somites abdominaux 2-6 sont trs similaires aux structures correspondantes prsentes chez Megokris granulosus (Haswell, 1879) de Torres Strait, Queensland, et chez M. pescadoreensis (Schmitt, 1931) de Taiwan. Cependant, le thelycum et le petasma sont typiquement diffrents: chez M. halli sp. n., la plaque antrieure du thelycum porte une protubrance longitudinale mdiane, qui est trs concave latralement dans sa rgion mdiane et prsente une projection arrondie dans sa partie postrieure; la plaque antrieure du thelycum n'atteint pas le bord postrieur du rceptacle sminal. Chez M. manihine sp. n., la plaque antrieure du thelycum porte une protubrance longitudinale mdiane, avec une ride mdiane, dont la partie postrieure prsente une paire de prominences latrales; la plaque antrieure du thelycum n'atteint pas le bord postrieur du rceptacle sminal. Chez M. motohburiorum sp. nov., la protubrance prominente mdiane du thelycum est troite dans sa moiti antrieure, puis plus large avec une prominence dans sa moiti postrieure tandis que le bord postrieur est arrondi; la plaque antrieure du thelycum est relie au bord postrieur du rceptacle sminal.
20696244|In this study some reproductive aspects of Potamon fluviatile are described. Data were obtained by studying the gonad structure of both sexes using histological methods. The ovary consists of a pair of long, sac-like organs, with a thin ovarian wall surrounding the oocytes and eggs. The ovarian epithelium creates several oogenetic pouches containing growing oocytes and mature eggs, while oogonia are concentrated in a germarium within the ovarian lumen. Eggs are ovulated from the oogenetic pouches into the central ovarian lumen, transferred into the oviduct, and fertilized with sperm stored in the spermatheca. The male reproductive system consists of paired testes, united by a commissure, and genital ducts. Gametes leave the testicular tubules and reach the proximal region of the vas deferens, where the epithelium shows secretory activity. In questo studio sono stati decritti alcuni aspetti della biologia riproduttiva di Potamon fluviatile, attraverso analisi prevalentemente morfologiche ed istologiche sulle gonadi di entrambi i sessi. L'ovario  costituito da una coppia di organi a forma di sacco, con un epitelio sottile che crea delle invaginazioni a forma di tasca con la funzione di accogliere sia oociti in fase di maturazione che uova mature, mentre gli oogoni sono organizzati all'interno del lume ovarico in gruppi ben definiti (germaria). Le uova, una volta rilasciate dalle tasche ovariche, passano nel lume e da qui, attraverso gli ovidutti, vengono depositate nella camera addominale e fecondate con gli spermatozoi conservati nella spermateca. Il sistema riproduttivo maschile, invece, consiste in una coppia di testicoli, uniti da un sottile tessuto connettivo, e da due dotti deferenti, la cui porzione prossimale mostra un'attivit secretoria e dove i gameti, dopo aver lasciato i tubuli testicolari, vengono conservati fino alla loro emissione.
20102415|1. The morphogenesis of the complex eye of Porcellio scaber shows a gradient of differentiation in a caudal-cranial direction. 2. The starting point for this gradient of differentiation is a single ommatidium in the second row of the complete eye, which is already visible in young animals still in the amnion. 3. New ommatidia are formed at intervals, usually two ommatidia at a time. 4. Knowledge of the stages of ommatidial development of Porcellio scaber permits an approximate determination of age for the first five-and-a-half months post natum.
20103647|Morphological variation related to size and sexual maturity is examined in the xanthid crab Trapezia ferruginea, an obligate associate of the coral Pocillopora. Morphological variation in males is related primarily to size while in females it is related to both size and sexual maturity. It was not possible to identify a pubertal molt in males but examination of internal anatomy suggests that they become sexually mature at about 6-7 mm carapace length. Females undergo a marked pubertal molt at about 6-7 mm carapace length although females as small as 5.3 mm may undergo a pubertal molt and be ovigerous. The adaptive significance of changes in morphology with increasing size and sexual maturity is discussed.
20102387|Diese Verffentlichung behandelt die Larven von Spirontocaris s.l. (einschliesslich Lebbeus, Eualus, Heptacarpus und Thoralus). Die Larven-Stadien von S. spinus, S. lilljeborgii, E. gaimardii, E. pusiolus und E. occultus werden beschrieben und die verffentlichten Beschreibungen anderer Larven der Gruppe kritisch besprochen. Die an den Larven gewonnenen Erkenntnisse sprechen sehr zugunsten einer Unterteilung von Spirontocaris s.l. und dafr, dass Spirontocaris s. str., Lebbeus und Thoralus als Gattungen anzusehen sind. Eualus enthlt Larven von zwei verschiedenen Gruppen. Die Kenntnis der Larven von Heptacarpus ist auf Stadium I beschrnkt und unzureichend, um eine Trennung von Eualus- und Thoralus-Larven zu ermglichen.
23034289|New records are provided for four species of caridean shrimp (Alpheidae and Palaemonidae) from Sonora, Sinaloa, and Oaxaca, along the west coast of Mexico. Alpheus tenuis Kim & Abele, 1988 extends its northern range to Puerto Peasco, Sonora. Alpheus martini Kim & Abele, 1988 is recorded for the first time outside of Panama (Alcatraz Island, Sonora). Pontonia simplex Holthuis, 1951 is recorded from Teacapan, Sinaloa, in the pen shell Atrina maura (Sowerby, 1835), which constitutes a new host record; additionally, its live colour pattern is described. The range of Pontonia margarita Smith, 1869 is extended along the Mexican coast south to Oaxaca. Alpheus tenuis Kim & Abele, 1988 tend sa distribution au nord jusqu' Puerto Peasco, Sonora et Alpheus martini Kim & Abele, 1988, jusqu' l'le d'Alcatraz, Sonora. Un nouveau registre et un nouvel hte (Teacapan, Sinaloa, dans le jambonneau lampe Atrina maura (Sowerby, 1835)) sont cits pour Pontonia simplex Holthuis, 1951, et la description des couleurs est donne pour des spcimens vivants. La distribution de Pontonia margarita Smith, 1869, est tendue vers le sud jusqu' Oaxaca.
27743295|The general absence of harpacticoid copepods in studies on biodiversity and ecology of the freshwater meiofauna can be ascribed, in part, to the difficulties in properly identifying these small animals. Here, we report the occurence of nine species of the order Harpacticoida occurring in the Zzere River basin, central Portugal: 1 species of Phyllognathopus, 1 of Parastenocaris, 2 of Elaphoidella, 2 of Attheyella, and 3 of Bryocemptus. Parastenocaris and Phyllognathopus dwell in the psammon habitat and Parastenocaris can also be found in thick biofilms covering hard substances. All members of the Canthocaptidae recorded, with the exception of Attheyella (Neomrazekiella) trispinosa, lived in both interstitial and epibenthic habitants. A. (N.) trispinosa occurred only when the substrate was covered with filamentous algae, bryophytes, or other macrophytes. In order to facilitate future ecological studies on the Portuguese harpacticoid fauna, we describe the diagnostic morphological characters of the females of the species sampled, and illustrate the morphological characters of females of seven species of those. We make additional reference to morphological characters of males that were common in the samples or showed variability relative to descriptions in the literature. A key to the genera and species, based on female morphology, is supplied for the area surveyed. /// A ausncia generalizda de coppodes harpacticdes nos estudos de biodiversidade e ecologia de meiofauna de guas continentais pode ser parcialmente atribuda a dificuldades de identicao correcta destes organismos de pequenas dimenses. Neste estudo referimos o ocorrncia de nove espcies da ordem Harpacticoida colhidas na bacia do Rio Zzere: 1 espcie de Phyllognathopus, 1 de Parastenocaris, 2 espcies de Elaphoidella, 2 de Attheyella e 3 de Bryocamptus. Parastenocarise Pyllognathopus so habitantes do psammon e Parastenocaris foi tambm encontrado em biofilmes espessos que cobrem o substracto rochoso. Exceptuando Attheyella (Neomrazekiella) trispinosa, todos os membros da famlia Canthocamptidae habitam os habitats intersticial e epibentnico. A. (N.) trispinosa s foi registada em locais onde o substracto estava coberto por algas filamentosas, brifitos ou outras macrfitas. Com o intuito de facilitar futuros estudos ecolgicos da fauna de harpacticides Portugueses, descrevemos os caracteres morfologicas diagnosticantes das fmeas das espcies amostradas e ilustramos os caracteres das fmeas de sete das espcies descritas. Fazemos tambm referncia a caracteres morfolgicos de machos abundantes nas amostras ou que apresentam variabilidade relativamente a descries publicadas. A chave de identificao apresentada com base na morfologia de fmeas visa permitir uma identificao rpida dos harpacticides da rea amostrada.

20103013|Um die Bedeutung der Sinne fr den Nahrungserwerb zu klren, wurden die quantitativen Vernderungen einiger der mit dem Nahrungserwerb in Verbindung stehenden Verhaltensweisen (Fortbewegungsgeschwindigkeit, Greifbewegungen) untersucht. 20106320|Rhythms of locomotor activity in constant darkness, under a 24-hour skeleton photoperiod, and under 4-hour and 24-hour light-dark cycles were studied in the pill bug, Armadillidium vulgare (Isopoda). The animals showed clear daily rhythmicity under the 24-hour light-dark cycle but exhibited weak rhythmicity under the skeleton photoperiod and in constant darkness. Unmasking of free-running rhythms was not observed under the 4-hour light-dark cycle. The results indicate that pill bugs must possess an endogenous circadian pacemaker but that this pacemaker is either very weak or has a very weak connection with the mechanisms responsible for locomotor activity. The modulatory effect of light on the rhythm of locomotor activity is almost entirely due to negative masking. /// Ritmos de atividade locomotora foram estudados no tatuzinho, Armadillidium vulgare, em condies de escurido contnua, esqueleto de fotoperodo de 24 horas, e ciclos de luz e escurido de 4 horas e de 24 horas. Os animais exibiram ritmicidade robusta quando expostos ao ciclo de luz e escurido de 24 horas mas ritmicidade muito fraca quando expostos ao esqueleto de fotoperodo ou  escurido contnua. Desmascaramento de ritmos em livre curso no foi observado sob a condio de ciclo de luz e escurido de 4 horas. Os resultados indicam que o tatuzinho deve possuir um relgio circadiano endgeno mas que este relgio  muito fraco ou tem conexo muito fraca com os mecanismos responsveis por atividade locomotora. O efeito modulatrio da luz sobre of ritmo de atividade locomotora  quase inteiramente devido a mascaramento negativo.
20105550|We investigated the morpho-functional relationships underlying shell use and the role of shells as a resource in Pagurus prideaux and Paguristes eremita, collected along a bathymetric cline in the Sicilian Channel (southern Italy). These relationships were influenced by the presence of epibiont anemones, which colonize gastropod shells inhabited by hermit crabs. Sea-anemones appeared to play a different role in the shell use of the two species of crabs. In P. prideaux, relationships with Adamsia palliata determined the use of globose shells (mainly Naticidae with a height/width ratio &lt1) and of small and damaged shells; in this case, the shell primarily played the role of a substrate for the settlement of anemones, and consequently its inhabiting and protective function tended to become less important. In P. eremita, relationships with the anemone Calliactis sp. and tube dwelling epibionts are correlated with the use of large, heavy shells with respect to the size of the crabs and also of well conserved shells; these shells offer an extensive surface for anemone settlement. In this case, the shell played a double role: an inhabiting-protective resource for the crab as well as a substrate for the anemone. Further experimental work will aim at testing these hypotheses, in an attempt at validating the proposed models and explaining the observed patterns. /// Le relazioni morfo-funzionali alla base dell'uso della conchiglia nei paguri sono state studiate lungo un gradiente batimetrico in due specie mediterranee, Pagurus prideaux e Paguristes eremita. Tali relazioni sono influenzate dalla presenza delle anemoni epibionti che colonizzano le conchiglie abitate dai paguri. Nelle due specie di paguro studiate le anemoni hanno ruoli differenti. In P. prideaux l'anemone Adamsia palliata determina la selezione di conchiglie globose (essenzialmente naticidi), con un rapporto altezza/larghezza&lt1, di piccole dimensioni rispetto al paguro e molto danneggiate. La conchiglia permane come substrato per l'anemone ma perde la funzione abitativa e protettiva nei confronti del paguro. In P. eremita la relazione con l'anemone Calliactis sp.  correlata all'uso di conchiglie in ottimo stato di conservazione e di grandi dimensioni rispetto al paguro. Tali conchiglie offrono ampie superfici per l'insediamento delle anemoni e al tempo stesso assolvono al tipico ruolo abitativo. Ulteriori lavori sperimentali permetteranno di dimostrare la validit dei modelli proposti e spiegare i pattern osservati.
20102923|Die geographische Verbreitung von Triops und Lepidurus in Australien wird beschrieben und diskutiert. Triops kommt berall im Zentrum, im Westen und in Teilen des Ostens vor, ist jedoch abwesend in Tasmanien, im ussersten Sd-Westen und Sd-Osten und augenscheinlich auch im Nrdlichen Australien. Lepidurus kommt im Sd-Westlichen und Sd-stlichen Australien vor, einschliesslich Tasmanien. Die Rassenvorkommen berlappen in einem grossen Areal des Sd-Ostens. Die Korrelationen zwischen Verbreitung und einige klimatische Faktoren sowie einigen Beobachtungen allgemein-kologischer Natur werden errtert.

29779500|The response of embryos of the Chinese mitten crab (Eriocheir sinensis) in terms of survival to cryoprotectants was investigated for basic knowledge to enhance cryopreservation success of E. sinensis embryos. Five stages of embryonic development (cleavage, blastula, gastrula, eyed stage, and heart-beating stage embryos corresponding to 7, 14, 20, 26, and 31 days post-spawning) were chosen and exposed to various cryoprotectants, namely methanol (MeOH), propylene glycol (PG), dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), and dimethylformamide (DMF), at three concentrations (10, 15, 20%) for an experimental period of 30 min. at culture temperature (16C). The toxicity tolerance of E. sinensis embryos varied with developmental stage and cryoprotectant concentration. Cleavage and blastula embryos were very sensitive to cryoprotectant concentrations above 10%. Gastrula, eyed stage, and heart-beating stage embryos tolerated cryoprotectants to 20%, although a higher survival percentage was observed in heart beating stage embryos than in gastrula and eyed stage embryos. The survival percentage declined with an increase in cryoprotectant concentration. PG and DMF were relatively less toxic as compared to DMSO and MeOH. Based on the sensitivity to cryoprotectant exposure, heart beating stage embryos of E. sinensis are an appropriate stage for further cryopreservation. La rponse des embryons du crabe chinois (Eriocheir sinensis) en terme de survie aux cryoprotecteurs a t tudie de faon  acqurir les connaissances de base afin d'augmenter le succs de la cryoprservation des embryons de E. sinensis. Cinq stades du dveloppement embryonnaire (segmentation, blastula, gastrula, apparition de l'il et dbut des battements cardiaques correspondant  7, 14, 20, 26 et 31 jours aprs la ponte) ont t slectionns et exposs  diffrents cryoprotecteurs, dont le methanol (MeOH), propylene glycol (PG), dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), et dimethylformamide (DMF),  trois concentrations (10, 15, 20%) pour une priode exprimentale de 30 min  la temprature de culture (16C). La tolrance des embryons de E. sinensis a vari avec le stade de dveloppement et la concentration du cryoprotecteur. Les embryons en segmentation et blastula ont t trs sensibles aux concentrations de cryoprotecteur au dessus de 10%. Les stades gastrula, apparition de l'il et dbut des battements cardiaques ont tolr des cryoprotecteurs jusqu' 20%, bien qu'un pourcentage de survie plus lev ait t observ chez le stade dbut des battements cardiaques par rapport aux embryons en gastrula ou apparition de l'il. Le pourcentage de survie diminue lors d'une augmentation de la concentration de cryoprotecteur. PG et DMF ont t relativement moins toxiques par rapport au DMSO et MeOH. Sur la base de leur sensibilit  l'exposition de cryoprotecteurs les embryons au stade dbut des battements cardiaques sont un stade appropri pour une aller plus loin dans la cryoprservation.

Dem Wirt angeheftet, entspricht ihr Innenmedium jedoch der Konzentration des Wirtsserums. Physiologischer Zustand des Parasiten, Tiefe und Position der Parasiten-Penetration, und die Art der Reaktion des Wirtsgewebes auf den eindringenden Parasiten sind weitere Faktoren, deren Zusammenwirken eine erhebliche Variabilitt der Innenkonzentration von L. cyprinacea bewirken knnen. Im allgemeinen verursachen Konzentrationen von 20% Meerwasser oder mehr jedoch erhhte Sterblichkeit und Abnahme der Eiproduktion angehefteter Parasiten. Wegen der hohen Sterblichkeit von Nauplien und Copepoditen whrend jeder Hutung ist die Vollendung des Lebenszyklus nur mglich in Konzentrationen unterhalb von 15% Meerwasser.

20105791|The systematic validity of the differentiation between the two European spider crabs Maja crispata Risso, 1827 and Maja squinado (Herbst, 1788) is clarified. The intra- and interspecific variability of morphological characters is examined in juvenile and adult specimens and the results are discussed. Due to ontogenetic changes there is neither a single, constant morphological character nor a constant character combination which allows a complete separation of all postlarval stages of the two species. The best diagnostic characters are the median dorsal carapace spine row combined with a spine located at the basal antennal joint. Multivariate analyses of morphometric characters offered for the first time appropiate quantitative methods for a complete separation of adults and an almost complete separation of juveniles of the two species which have not been available previously. /// In der vorliegenden Untersuchung wird die systematische Gltigkeit der Unterscheidung zwischen den zwei europischen Seespinnenarten Maja crispata Risso, 1827 und Maja squinado (Herbst, 1788) geklrt. Die intra- und interspezifische Variabilitt morphologischer Merkmale wird bei juvenilen und adulten Exemplaren untersucht und diskutiert. Aufgrund ontogenetischer Vernderungen gibt es weder ein einzelnes konstantes Merkmal, noch eine Merkmalskombination, um eine vollstndige Trennung aller Postlarvalstadien zu gewhrleisten. Das beste diagnostische Unterscheidungskriterium stellt die mediane dorsale Dornenreihe des Carapax in Verbindung mit dem Antennenbasaldorn dar. Erstmals konnten durch multivariate Analysen morphometrischer Merkmale geeignete quantitative Methoden fr eine vollstndige Unterscheidung adulter sowie eine nahezu vollstndige Unterscheidung juveniler Tiere gefunden werden; diese standen bisher nicht zur Verfgung.

Les Balanes s'chelonnaient depuis des petites cypris non attaches jusqu'aux plus grands spcimens fixs, de 6,0  7,0 mm de diamtre de base, ce qui indiquait que la fixation avait eu lieu prs du lieu de capture et que les plus grands Balanides taient tablis depuis 15  20 jours. P. marmoratus and Pilumnus hirtellus were the most frequent decapod species on the mussel beds with 25.9% occurrence. /// La rpartition spatiale de la faune de crustacs dcapodes associe aux moulires de Brachidontes pharaonis (Mollusca, Bivalvia) des ctes levantines de Turquie a t tudie en septembre 2005. Des chantillons en triple ont t collects au moyen d'un chantillonneur carr couvrant 400 cm2 dans neuf stations intertidales situes entre la baie d'Iskenderun et la baie d'Antalya. Un total de treize espces, reprsent par 61 individus a t identifi. Parmi ceux-ci, Pachygrapsus marmoratus tait l'espce dominante avec 19 individus. P. marmoratus et Pilumnus hirtellus taient les espces de dcapodes les plus souvent prsentes dans les moulires avec une frquence de 25,9%.

20102166|Feldproben und Laborexperimente mit Sphaeroma quoyanum zeigen, da der Verdauungstrakt hauptschlich mit Partikeln gefllt ist, welche im umgebenden Wasser suspendiert sein knnten. Die Primrmethode des Nahrungserwerbs von S. quoyanum involviert Filterbrsten an den ersten drei Beinpaaren. Die Brsten fllen sich mit Partikeln aus den Wasserstrmungen, welche die Pleopoden erzeugen. Die Brsten werden entleert durch die Maxillipeden. S. quoyanum grbt in einer Art, welche die Ingestion von Substratpartikeln und mglicherweise in ihnen vorhandenen Giften minimisiert. Von anderen Sphaeroma Arten ist Filter-Nahrungserwerb bis jetzt nicht bekannt, aber anatomische Befunde deuten darauf hin, da mehrere andere Holzbohrer mglicherweise Filtrierer sind. Filter-Nahrungserwerb wird als Adaptation an das Leben in einer Wohnrhre angesehen, welche in der Gattung Sphaeroma entstanden ist.
